quotes.text: There is no short cut to achievement. Life requires thorough preparation - veneer isn't worth anything.
quotes.author: George Washington Carver

quotes.text: I think music is the greatest art form that exists, and I think people listen to music for different reasons, and it serves different purposes. Some of it is background music, and some of it is things that might affect a person's day, if not their life, or change an attitude. The best songs are the ones that make you feel something.
quotes.author: Eddie Vedder

quotes.text: Nowadays love is a matter of chance, matrimony a matter of money and divorce a matter of course.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.text: You don't have to burn books to destroy a culture. Just get people to stop reading them.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.text: Success is always something completely different to people. I feel like I've succeeded, if I'm doing something that makes me happy and I'm not lying to anybody.
quotes.author: Kristen Stewart

quotes.text: Without hope we are lost.
quotes.author: Mahmoud Darwish

quotes.text: The real important things are kindness and a sense of humor. I've been fortunate to have dated and could have easily married women who have those qualities, and time and circumstances didn't work out. Timing plays a big part.
quotes.author: Hill Harper

quotes.text: Reading is a basic tool in the living of a good life.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.text: Listen to your inner-voice: Surround yourself with loving, nurturing people. Fall in love with your art and find yourself. Music is the great communicator.
quotes.author: Glenn Hughes

quotes.text: My life path has been a blessing and a great learning experience. Skateboarding is my passion and I don't see that changing. When I'm not skating, I love to surf. I'm open to the new experiences and opportunities.
quotes.author: Ryan Sheckler

quotes.text: May your coming year be filled with magic and dreams and good madness. I hope you read some fine books and kiss someone who thinks you're wonderful, and don't forget to make some art -- write or draw or build or sing or live as only you can. And I hope, somewhere in the next year, you surprise yourself.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.text: I love you. I am who I am because of you. You are every reason, every hope, and every dream I've ever had, and no matter what happens to us in the future, everyday we are together is the greatest day of my life. I will always be yours.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Notebook

quotes.text: Success is measured by your discipline and inner peace.
quotes.author: Mike Ditka

quotes.text: What thoughts are to the individual, art is to the community as a whole. That's where you reflect on who you are, who you hope to be, what you've gone through, and where you hope to go.
quotes.author: Wendell Pierce

quotes.text: That is the saving grace of humor, if you fail no one is laughing at you.
quotes.author: A. Whitney Brown

quotes.text: When one realizes that his life is worthless he either commits suicide or travels.
quotes.author: Edward Dahlberg

quotes.text: I'm a people person, very approachable. I go out every night, tons of functions. I love all facets of this industry... Music, film, TV, books, art. I love being around creative people.
quotes.author: Guy Oseary

quotes.text: The one thing I don't consume during 'Today' - which surprises many people - is coffee. I find that a lot of water helps wake me up, without the buzz. I love coffee, but usually reserve a double espresso as an afternoon pick-me-up before settling in to do the weekend 'Nightly News.'
quotes.author: Lester Holt

quotes.text: Do not read, as children do, to amuse yourself, or like the ambitious, for the purpose of instruction. No, read in order to live.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.text: When you're around enormously successful people you realise their success isn't an accident - it's about work.
quotes.author: Ryan Tedder

quotes.text: I hope somebody falls in love with me - other than my fiancee. But that's what you want. As a player you want a team that really wants you; head coach, GM, owner, everybody that really wants you in their place and the players believe in you. I'm looking forward to making somebody fall in love with me.
quotes.author: Robert Griffin III

quotes.text: I really hate sitcoms on television with canned laughter and stuff. What really makes me laugh is the real-life stuff. I've got a dry sense of humor.
quotes.author: Katie Price

quotes.text: Life is like a landscape. You live in the midst of it but can describe it only from the vantage point of distance.
quotes.author: Charles Lindbergh

quotes.text: The art of life is to live in the present moment, and to make that moment as perfect as we can by the realization that we are the instruments and expression of God Himself.
quotes.author: Emmet Fox

quotes.text: I love a vintage look that's also a bit rock n' roll.
quotes.author: Cara Delevingne

quotes.text: He can run faster than Severus Snape confronted with shampoo.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quotes.text: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: It takes 20 years to make an overnight success.
quotes.author: Eddie Cantor

quotes.text: Even in the hardest circumstances, dreams can give you the courage to live, and I hope I can share that message with children in need.
quotes.author: Kim Yuna

quotes.text: When I was young, my favorite picture book was 'Fletcher and Zenobia,' written by Edward Gorey and illustrated by Victoria Chess. It's long out of print now, but its mix of macabre humor and 1960s psychedelia made it a perfect children's book for the times.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.text: Never die easy. Why run out of bounds and die easy? Make that linebacker pay. It carries into all facets of your life. It's okay to lose, to die, but don't die without trying, without giving it your best.
quotes.author: Walter Payton

quotes.text: Even in modern art, artists have used methods based on calculation, inasmuch as these elements, alongside those of a more personal and emotional nature, give balance and harmony to any work of art.
quotes.author: Max Bill

quotes.text: Wine comes in at the mouth And love comes in at the eye; That's all we shall know for truth Before we grow old and die.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.text: If ever there is tomorrow when we're not together... there is something you must always remember. You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think. But the most important thing is, even if we're apart... I'll always be with you.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.text: The line between failure and success is so fine that we scarcely know when we pass it: so fine that we are often on the line and do not know it.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.text: Friends from the press, China needs to learn more about the world, and the world also needs to learn more about China. I hope you will continue to make more efforts and contributions to deepening the mutual understanding between China and the countries of the world.
quotes.author: Xi Jinping

quotes.text: My wife has a good sense of humor, and instead of calling me psychic with my novels, she simply refers to me as being 'psycho.' That's because multiple things in my books have come true.
quotes.author: Brad Thor

quotes.text: Life has evolved to thrive in environments that are extreme only by our limited human standards: in the boiling battery acid of Yellowstone hot springs, in the cracks of permanent ice sheets, in the cooling waters of nuclear reactors, miles beneath the Earth's crust, in pure salt crystals, and inside the rocks of the dry valleys of Antarctica.
quotes.author: Jill Tarter

quotes.text: Great art speaks a language which every intelligent person can understand. The people who call themselves modernists today speak a different language.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.text: If a person loves only one other person and is indifferent to all others, his love is not love but a symbiotic attachment, or an enlarged egotism.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.text: Grief does not change you, Hazel. It reveals you.
quotes.author: John Green,  The Fault in Our Stars

quotes.text: The Christian does not think God will love us because we are good, but that God will make us good because He loves us.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: All that we see or seem is but a dream within a dream.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.text: If you carefully consider what you want to be said of you in the funeral experience, you will find your definition of success.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.text: Hope lies in having more faith in the power of God to heal us than in the power of anything to hurt or destroy us. In realizing that as children of God we are bigger than our problems, we have the power at last to confront them.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.text: I'll do humor about myself, I'll poke fun and everything, but that's me and I can do it to me. I think it's cruel to do it to somebody else.
quotes.author: Delta Burke

quotes.text: There is something terribly morbid in the modern sympathy with pain. One should sympathise with the colour, the beauty, the joy of life. The less said about life's sores the better.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: The momentous thing in human life is the art of winning the soul to good or evil.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.text: I think relationships are work, but love is a gift.
quotes.author: Anne Hathaway

quotes.text: Every man has his secret sorrows which the world knows not; and often times we call a man cold when he is only sad.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.text: I remember one day sitting at the pool and suddenly the tears were streaming down my cheeks. Why was I so unhappy? I had success. I had security. But it wasn't enough. I was exploding inside.
quotes.author: Ingrid Bergman

quotes.text: I'm going to sit back, light up, and hope I don't chew the cigarette to pieces.
quotes.author: Vin Scully

quotes.text: I've never met a person who has more integrity than my husband. I respect that. There's his humor and intelligence, too, and he's really cute, all those things - but if you don't respect your partner, you'll get sick of him.
quotes.author: Michelle Pfeiffer

quotes.text: I remember a specific moment, watching my grandmother hang the clothes on the line, and her saying to me, 'you are going to have to learn to do this,' and me being in that space of awareness and knowing that my life would not be the same as my grandmother's life.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: Through art, you create your own world.
quotes.author: Daphne Guinness

quotes.text: Lot's wife, of course, was told not to look back where all those people and their homes had been. But she did look back, and I love her for that, because it was so human.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.text: When we love, we always strive to become better than we are. When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better too.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho,  The Alchemist

quotes.text: You may lose your wife, you may lose your dog, your mother may hate you. None of those things matter. What matters is that you achieve success and become free. Then you can do whatever you like.
quotes.author: Kevin O'Leary

quotes.text: Our hope in life beyond death is a hope made possible, not by some general sentimental belief in life after death, but by our participation in the life of Christ.
quotes.author: Stanley Hauerwas

quotes.text: There's something about Southern women that is so unique yet so universal. Strong southern women are allowed to be soft and feminine and have a sense of humor. But what I love about Southern women in particular is their universality.
quotes.author: Connie Britton

quotes.text: In education, technology can be a life-changer, a game changer, for kids who are both in school and out of school. Technology can bring textbooks to life. The Internet can connect students to their peers in other parts of the world. It can bridge the quality gaps.
quotes.author: Queen Rania of Jordan

quotes.text: Every mind which has given itself to self-expression in art is aware of a directing agency outside its conscious control which it has agreed to label 'inspiration'.
quotes.author: Norman Lindsay

quotes.text: It is in the thirties that we want friends. In the forties we know they won't save us any more than love did.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.text: You cannot find peace by avoiding life.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.text: Perhaps one did not want to be loved so much as to be understood.
quotes.author: George Orwell,  1984

quotes.text: Taxation is the price we pay for failing to build a civilized society. The higher the tax level, the greater the failure. A centrally planned totalitarian state represents a complete defeat for the civilized world, while a totally voluntary society represents its ultimate success.
quotes.author: Mark Skousen

quotes.text: Hope, the best comfort of our imperfect condition.
quotes.author: Edward Gibbon

quotes.text: My stories are very somber, so I think I need the comic ingredient. Besides, life has so much humor.
quotes.author: Manuel Puig

quotes.text: Being a survivor doesn't mean being strong - it's telling people when you need a meal or a ride, company, whatever. It's paying attention to heart wisdom, feelings, not living a role, but having a unique, authentic life, having something to contribute, finding time to love and laugh. All these things are qualities of survivors.
quotes.author: Bernie Siegel

quotes.text: There is a lot that horses and art share in common. I have found that most horse people are art lovers, and vice versa.
quotes.author: Alice Walton

quotes.text: I honestly, sincerely love what I do.
quotes.author: Mary Hart

quotes.text: I've been surrounded by a lot of people who felt that external success would result in them feeling good about themselves. But it just seems extremely unfulfilling to me.
quotes.author: Alanis Morissette

quotes.text: My hope is that we continue to nurture the places that we love, but that we also look outside our immediate worlds.
quotes.author: Annie Leibovitz

quotes.text: Tony and I had a good on and off screen relationship, we are two very different people, but we did share a sense of humor, we now live in different parts of the world but when we find ourselves in the same place it is more or less as if there had been no years in between.
quotes.author: Roger Moore

quotes.text: I'm just a regular person who believes life is simple, and I like a simple life.
quotes.author: Manny Pacquiao

quotes.text: Art is not necessary at all. All that is necessary to make this world a better place to live in is to love - to love as Christ loved, as Buddha loved.
quotes.author: Isadora Duncan

quotes.text: They are always saying God loves us. If that's love I'd rather have a bit of kindness.
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.text: When you're in jail, a good friend will be trying to bail you out. A best friend will be in the cell next to you saying, 'Damn, that was fun'.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.text: Chance is perhaps the pseudonym of God when he does not want to sign.
quotes.author: Théophile Gautier

quotes.text: There's a fine line between genius and insanity. I have erased this line.
quotes.author: Oscar Levant

quotes.text: When I look in the mirror, I see someone who's happy with how he looks, because I was never one of the handsome Hollywood people. And I've had success as I've gotten older, because I'm able to play characters. I no longer get the girl, but I get the part.
quotes.author: Michael Caine

quotes.text: Why do people play the lottery, or why do people gamble, period? You know, it's with the hope of winning something more.
quotes.author: Derek Kilmer

quotes.text: The thing about For Better or Worse is the only thing that made me an okay director for that is that I have a sense of humor, and it was supposed to be funny.
quotes.author: Jason Alexander

quotes.text: It's in literature that true life can be found. It's under the mask of fiction that you can tell the truth.
quotes.author: Gao Xingjian

quotes.text: When you think about Dada and the great moments in Modern Art, it's always the sense of when you're not sure that art is most likely to be occurring.
quotes.author: Richard Phillips

quotes.text: Sometimes you're afraid to fall in love with a chick, but she sucks you in anyway.
quotes.author: Sammy Hagar

quotes.text: So, I guess we are who we are for alot of reasons. And maybe we'll never know most of them. But even if we don't have the power to choose where we come from, we can still choose where we go from there. We can still do things. And we can try to feel okay about them.
quotes.author: Stephen Chbosky,  The Perks of Being a Wallflower

quotes.text: I had come to the point when I realized it was unlikely that my film career was going to move beyond a certain level of role. And I was - because I had graphic instances of it - handicapped by the success of Star Trek. A director would say, 'I don't want Jean-Luc Picard in my movie' - and this was compounded by X-Men as well.
quotes.author: Patrick Stewart

quotes.text: Over the years, I had nurtured the hope to be able to fly; to handle a machine as it rose higher and higher in the stratosphere was my dearest dream.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.text: I have a dark sense of humor.
quotes.author: Olivia Munn

quotes.text: Everyone has their own different life experiences which make them who they are. No two people's life experiences are the same. And mine are just unique to me.
quotes.author: Keshia Knight Pulliam

quotes.text: When art dresses in worn-out material it is most easily recognized as art.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: I went to a psychoanalyst. He explained things about my love life that I found very impressive... almost scary.
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.text: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho,  The Alchemist

quotes.text: I wanted a perfect ending. Now I've learned, the hard way, that some poems don't rhyme, and some stories don't have a clear beginning, middle, and end. Life is about not knowing, having to change, taking the moment and making the best of it, without knowing what's going to happen next.Delicious Ambiguity.
quotes.author: Gilda Radner

quotes.text: Two wrongs don't make a right, but they make a good excuse.
quotes.author: Thomas Szasz

quotes.text: We all learn lessons in life. Some stick, some don't. I have always learned more from rejection and failure than from acceptance and success.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.text: Man's only true happiness is to live in hope of something to be won by him. Reverence something to be worshipped by him, and love something to be cherished by him, forever.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.text: I read the script and decide if a particular character looks fun to play. I look for complexity and a sense of humor. Those are crucial, real things to life.
quotes.author: Steve Buscemi

quotes.text: No one really wants to admit they are lonely, and it is never really addressed very much between friends and family. But I have felt lonely many times in my life.
quotes.author: Bill Murray

quotes.text: People like to think of you as a certain person, or a certain type of person, and they do love to give you a label. We like luggage labels, and we like people labels.
quotes.author: Clare Balding

quotes.text: Art is always and everywhere the secret confession, and at the same time the immortal movement of its time.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.text: Lock up your libraries if you like; but there is no gate, no lock, no bolt that you can set upon the freedom of my mind.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf,  A Room of One's Own

quotes.text: Creativity is the key to success in the future, and primary education is where teachers can bring creativity in children at that level.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.text: Few people know so clearly what they want. Most people can't even think what to hope for when they throw a penny in a fountain.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.text: The comics that are just conversing with you up there and drawing on their own life, yeah, I guess so. I guess some do political humor, some do topical humor, but the ones that I like, the ones that are appealing to me, were guys who were just talking to you about their life.
quotes.author: Ray Romano

quotes.text: I still have a Gypsy sense of adventure. I don't think I have slept in the same bed for more than three or four months my whole life. I am always planting vegetables that I never get to eat and flowers that I never see flower. I have always moved around the world.
quotes.author: Helen Mirren

quotes.text: Love is not altogether a delirium, yet it has many points in common therewith.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.text: Parents are usually more careful to bestow knowledge on their children rather than virtue, the art of speaking well rather than doing well; but their manners should be of the greatest concern.
quotes.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quotes.text: You can't force love, I realized. It's there or it isn't. If it's not there, you've got to be able to admit it. If it is there, you've got to do whatever it takes to protect the ones you love.
quotes.author: Richelle Mead,  Frostbite

quotes.text: Fear cannot be without hope nor hope without fear.
quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

quotes.text: To this day, I've found that it doesn't matter what a guy looks like if he's really funny. His sense of humor makes him attractive. On the other hand, you don't hear men saying, 'No she's not pretty, but is she ever funny!'
quotes.author: Catherine O'Hara

quotes.text: I believe that a simple and unassuming manner of life is best for everyone, best both for the body and the mind.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: I love going to the movie theatre, seeing live comedy, and going to amusement parks.
quotes.author: Jennette McCurdy

quotes.text: Mathematics is the art of giving the same name to different things.
quotes.author: Henri Poincare

quotes.text: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed, citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.text: Socialism has no moral justification whatsoever; poor people are not morally superior to rich people, nor are they owed anything by rich people simply because of their lack of success. Charity is not a socialist concept - it is a religious one, an acknowledgment of God's sovereignty over property, a sovereignty the Left utterly rejects.
quotes.author: Ben Shapiro

quotes.text: I sincerely hope I can contribute to the progress there has been in relations between Jews and Catholics since the Second Vatican Council in a spirit of renewed collaboration.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.text: I don't think my sense of humor has changed at all; I was born with this, for better or for worse.
quotes.author: Ivan Reitman

quotes.text: The real test of friendship is: can you literally do nothing with the other person? Can you enjoy those moments of life that are utterly simple?
quotes.author: Eugene Kennedy

quotes.text: I love mankind; it's people I can't stand.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.text: Art is accusation, expression, passion. Art is a fight to the finish between black charcoal and white paper.
quotes.author: Gunter Grass

quotes.text: I am no bird; and no net ensnares me: I am a free human being with an independent will.
quotes.author: Charlotte Brontë,  Jane Eyre

quotes.text: When you are courting a nice girl an hour seems like a second. When you sit on a red-hot cinder a second seems like an hour. That's relativity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: First they ignore you, then they ridicule you, then they fight you, and then you win.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Every soldier must know, before he goes into battle, how the little battle he is to fight fits into the larger picture, and how the success of his fighting will influence the battle as a whole.
quotes.author: Bernard Law Montgomery

quotes.text: Of the big horror movies of the '70s, you have 'The Omen,' 'The Sentinel,' 'Rosemary's Baby,' 'The Stepford Wives,' 'Burnt Offerings' - these are all romantic fatalist movies where there's a sort of glimmer of hope... but darkness wins.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.text: Part of my humor is the fact that I love coming out of left field. I don't want people to expect what is going to happen next.
quotes.author: Howie Mandel

quotes.text: Your outlook upon life, your estimate of yourself, your estimate of your value are largely colored by your environment. Your whole career will be modified, shaped, molded by your surroundings, by the character of the people with whom you come in contact every day.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.text: To put yourself in another's place requires real imagination, but by doing so each Girl Scout will be able to love among others happily.
quotes.author: Juliette Gordon Low

quotes.text: It is a myth that art has to be sold. It is not like stocking a grocery store where people fill a pushcart. Art is a product that has no apparent need. The salesperson builds the need in the mind of the buyer.
quotes.author: Jack White

quotes.text: The only thing worse than a boy who hates you: a boy that loves you.
quotes.author: Markus Zusak,  The Book Thief

quotes.text: So we beat on, boats against the current, borne back ceaselessly into the past.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald,  The Great Gatsby

quotes.text: Focused, hard work is the real key to success. Keep your eyes on the goal, and just keep taking the next step towards completing it. If you aren't sure which way to do something, do it both ways and see which works better.
quotes.author: John Carmack

quotes.text: I really feel like life will dictate itself. You should allow it to unfold as naturally as possible. Just go with the flow. When you're really desperate, you say a few prayers and hope for the best. That's the way I've always lived my life.
quotes.author: Shania Twain

quotes.text: You probably found 'How to Survive a Robot Uprising' in the humor section. Let's just hope that is where it belongs.
quotes.author: Daniel H. Wilson

quotes.text: When push comes to shove, it ain't the science that's going to lift you up - it's the belief, the spiritual side of life, that's going to lift you up, no matter what religion you are.
quotes.author: Kirstie Alley

quotes.text: The elusive nature of love... it can be such a fleeting thing. You see it there and it's just fluttering and it's gone.
quotes.author: Mick Jagger

quotes.text: There are so many awful things in this world, but I wanted readers to share with me the small, beautiful, enjoyable things. Things like cute clothes, beautiful art and pretty flowers; items that are overflowing with beauty. If you just become obsessed with your own problems, you miss these things. When you discover them, you become happy.
quotes.author: Novala Takemoto

quotes.text: Failures, repeated failures, are finger posts on the road to achievement. One fails forward toward success.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.text: All parents hope and pray that their children will make wise decisions. Children who are obedient and responsible bring to their parents unending pride and satisfaction.
quotes.author: James E. Faust

quotes.text: Daddy was hilarious. He could take the most mundane event and tell it so that we all on the floor laughing. He trained me in the joys of humor.
quotes.author: Karen DeCrow

quotes.text: Bitterness imprisons life; love releases it.
quotes.author: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quotes.text: I like the idea of being warm and secure. That's what home should be. That you have a sense of warmth, security, love, and you love the things around you and surround yourself with beauty.
quotes.author: Andre Leon Talley

quotes.text: Writing stopped being fun when I discovered the difference between good writing and bad and, even more terrifying, the difference between it and true art. And after that, the whip came down.
quotes.author: Truman Capote

quotes.text: Well, don't expect us to be too impressed. We just saw Finnick Odair in his underwear.
quotes.author: Suzanne Collins,  Mockingjay

quotes.text: Whatever you are, be a good one.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Success is a journey, not a destination. The doing is often more important than the outcome.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.text: I had to stop going to auditions thinking, 'Oh, I hope they like me.' I had to go in thinking I was the answer to their problem.
quotes.author: George Clooney

quotes.text: Cathy was the first widely syndicated humor strip created by a woman. The strip was pretty revolutionary at the time not only because it starred a female, but also because it was so emotionally honest about all the conflicting feelings many women had in 1976.
quotes.author: Cathy Guisewite

quotes.text: I'm a big believer than a great bit is a great bit - if I go and see someone I love, like Robert Klein. I want to hear some classics and some new stuff. But a great stand-up bit takes a long time to really polish and perfect, and they're beautiful things when they're done.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.text: Medicine is a science of uncertainty and an art of probability.
quotes.author: William Osler

quotes.text: Everything you need for better future and success has already been written. And guess what? All you have to do is go to the library.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.text: I hope all you young girls see yourself up there... we were just like you.
quotes.author: Mia Hamm

quotes.text: Humor can be an incredible lacerating and effective weapon. And that is the way I use it.
quotes.author: Carl Hiaasen

quotes.text: No man is worth his salt who is not ready at all times to risk his well-being, to risk his body, to risk his life, in a great cause.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: I love Thanksgiving because it's a holiday that is centered around food and family, two things that are of utmost importance to me.
quotes.author: Marcus Samuelsson

quotes.text: What other people may find in poetry or art museums, I find in the flight of a good drive.
quotes.author: Arnold Palmer

quotes.text: Some humans would do anything to see if it was possible to do it. If you put a large switch in some cave somewhere, with a sign on it saying 'End-of-the-World Switch. PLEASE DO NOT TOUCH', the paint wouldn't even have time to dry.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett,  Thief of Time

quotes.text: In a good bookroom you feel in some mysterious way that you are absorbing the wisdom contained in all the books through your skin, without even opening them.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Success and failure are both part of life. Both are not permanent.
quotes.author: Shah Rukh Khan

quotes.text: When you put something out there into the world, there's all these words you don't want to hear, that you hope people don't say. I don't like anything that starts with 're' - like retro, reinvent, recreate - I hate that. It's always like living in the past - copying, emulating.
quotes.author: Jack White

quotes.text: Life itself is a quotation.
quotes.author: Jorge Luis Borges

quotes.text: Loving someone liberates the lover as well as the beloved. And that kind of love comes with age.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: I did study the art of being a barber because I wanted to figure out what my routine would be. Do you start in the front or back? Top or bottom? Swivel the chair or walk around? What I did discover is there's no such thing as the perfect haircut!
quotes.author: Sean Patrick Thomas

quotes.text: So, I love you because the entire universe conspired to help me find you.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho,  The Alchemist

quotes.text: Those who believe in telekinetics, raise my hand.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.text: I know of no single formula for success. But over the years I have observed that some attributes of leadership are universal and are often about finding ways of encouraging people to combine their efforts, their talents, their insights, their enthusiasm and their inspiration to work together.
quotes.author: Queen Elizabeth II

quotes.text: I hope people remember me as a guy who brought magic to the people. You know, pushed the boundaries of wonder.
quotes.author: David Blaine

quotes.text: If you can understand the humor in the drawing part you'll probably get the humor in the audio part.
quotes.author: Eric San

quotes.text: In life, there is always that special person who shapes who you are, who helps to determine the person you become.
quotes.author: Molly Ringwald

quotes.text: Americans, who make more of marrying for love than any other people, also break up more of their marriages, but the figure reflects not so much the failure of love as the determination of people not to live without it.
quotes.author: Morton Hunt

quotes.text: Washington, D.C., has everything that Rome, Paris and London have in the way of great architecture - great power bases. Washington has obelisks and pyramids and underground tunnels and great art and a whole shadow world that we really don't see.
quotes.author: Dan Brown

quotes.text: Most people are other people. Their thoughts are someone else's opinions, their lives a mimicry, their passions a quotation.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: No student ever attains very eminent success by simply doing what is required of him: it is the amount and excellence of what is over and above the required, that determines the greatness of ultimate distinction.
quotes.author: Charles Kendall Adams

quotes.text: I get asked to read new works a lot, in the hope that I will give a quotation and I will only give a 'puff' for a book I truly love.
quotes.author: Peter James

quotes.text: I'm not an expert on the Malaysian sense of humor.
quotes.author: Ben Stiller

quotes.text: My identity was a big issue when I was a teenager, and I had a lot of questions, like: 'Who am I?' 'Who do I belong to?' But when I was still quite young, I decided that belonging is a tough process in life, and I'd better say I belonged to myself and the world rather than belonging to one nationality or another.
quotes.author: Hiam Abbass

quotes.text: I love Christopher Bailey and Burberry, Mulberry for bags, and Hudson for jeans.
quotes.author: Cara Delevingne

quotes.text: Music is God's gift to man, the only art of Heaven given to earth, the only art of earth we take to Heaven.
quotes.author: Walter Savage Landor

quotes.text: Success is often achieved by those who don't know that failure is inevitable.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.text: When we have lost everything, including hope, life becomes a disgrace, and death a duty.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.text: I think what is important for things to be funny is if you the listener, or the reader, get a chance to supply the humor of it yourself.
quotes.author: Ian Frazier

quotes.text: The hardest thing in life to learn is which bridge to cross and which to burn.
quotes.author: David Russell

quotes.text: As far as love is concerned, possession, power, fusion and disenchantment are the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse.
quotes.author: Zygmunt Bauman

quotes.text: He who would do good to another must do it in Minute Particulars: general Good is the plea of the scoundrel, hypocrite, and flatterer, for Art and Science cannot exist but in minutely organized Particulars.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.text: We are only as strong as we are united, as weak as we are divided.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quotes.text: Wicked people never have time for reading. It's one of the reasons for their wickedness.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.text: It's a good place when all you have is hope and not expectations.
quotes.author: Danny Boyle

quotes.text: However, frat-boy humor is funny and it always will be.
quotes.author: Craig Kilborn

quotes.text: I love sleep. My life has the tendency to fall apart when I'm awake, you know?
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.text: If you were to destroy the belief in immortality in mankind, not only love but every living force on which the continuation of all life in the world depended, would dry up at once.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.text: Dying is an art, like everything else. I do it exceptionally well. I do it so it feels like hell. I do it so it feels real. I guess you could say I've a call.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.text: True leaders don't invest in buildings. Jesus never built a building. They invest in people. Why? Because success without a successor is failure. So your legacy should not be in buildings, programs, or projects; your legacy must be in people.
quotes.author: Myles Munroe

quotes.text: Do not spoil what you have by desiring what you have not; remember that what you now have was once among the things you only hoped for.
quotes.author: Epicurus

quotes.text: But if you don't watch me, I will try and sneak in some humor. I see humor everywhere in life around me.
quotes.author: Marion Ross

quotes.text: There are three ingredients in the good life: learning, earning and yearning.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.text: One mustn't ask apple trees for oranges, France for sun, women for love, life for happiness.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.text: A secondhand wardrobe hand clothes doesn't make one an artist. Neither do a hair-trigger temper, melancholic nature, propensity for tears, hating your parents, or HIV. I hate to say it - none of these make one an artist. They can help, but just as being gay doesn't make one witty... the only thing that makes one an artist is making art.
quotes.author: David Rakoff

quotes.text: I like the night. Without the dark, we'd never see the stars.
quotes.author: Stephenie Meyer,  Twilight

quotes.text: Success in management requires learning as fast as the world is changing.
quotes.author: Warren Bennis

quotes.text: One lives in the hope of becoming a memory.
quotes.author: Antonio Porchia

quotes.text: If somebody is not on the same page with me humor wise, I can't give them that.
quotes.author: Stephan Pastis

quotes.text: It's the game of life. Do I win or do I lose? One day they're gonna shut the game down. I gotta have as much fun and go around the board as many times as I can before it's my turn to leave.
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.text: If you don't like it, learn to love it!
quotes.author: Ric Flair

quotes.text: It is the spectator, and not life, that art really mirrors.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: The first step toward success is taken when you refuse to be a captive of the environment in which you first find yourself.
quotes.author: Mark Caine

quotes.text: There is hope in dreams, imagination, and in the courage of those who wish to make those dreams a reality.
quotes.author: Jonas Salk

quotes.text: In sitcoms, the women are so beautiful, understanding and well-bred. They have humor, but sort of display it with a twinkle of the eye and not a guffaw. But there's no juice in that for me.
quotes.author: Bea Arthur

quotes.text: Life is too short to not have fun; we are only here for a short time compared to the sun and the moon and all that.
quotes.author: Coolio

quotes.text: I have never denied my background or my culture. I have taught my child to embrace her Mexican heritage, to love my first language, Spanish, to learn about Mexican history, music, folk art, food, and even the Mexican candy I grew up with.
quotes.author: Salma Hayek

quotes.text: It is the function of art to renew our perception. What we are familiar with we cease to see. The writer shakes up the familiar scene, and, as if by magic, we see a new meaning in it.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.text: Women are meant to be loved, not to be understood.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde,  Lord Arthur Savile's Crime and Other Stories

quotes.text: Finding good partners is the key to success in anything: in business, in marriage and, especially, in investing.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.text: The capacity for hope is the most significant fact of life. It provides human beings with a sense of destination and the energy to get started.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.text: Athletes tend to have less of a sense of humor than most people. They are heroes to so many. That might be part of it.
quotes.author: Jeff Ross

quotes.text: For the past 33 years, I have looked in the mirror every morning and asked myself: 'If today were the last day of my life, would I want to do what I am about to do today?' And whenever the answer has been 'No' for too many days in a row, I know I need to change something.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: God tells me that I need to provide for my family, discipline and teach my children, and love my wife as Christ loves the church. If I don't do that, I'm being unfaithful and sinful.
quotes.author: Kevin DeYoung

quotes.text: In France, cooking is a serious art form and a national sport.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.text: Never memorize something that you can look up.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien,  The Fellowship of the Ring

quotes.text: Make treating yourself a priority and always remember your life is happening now. Don't put off all your dreams and pleasures to another day. In any balanced personal definition of success there has to be a powerful element of living life in the present.
quotes.author: Mireille Guiliano

quotes.text: Extreme hopes are born from extreme misery.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.text: It's odd how violence and humor so often go together, isn't it?
quotes.author: Dan Simmons

quotes.text: Life is full of beauty. Notice it. Notice the bumble bee, the small child, and the smiling faces. Smell the rain, and feel the wind. Live your life to the fullest potential, and fight for your dreams.
quotes.author: Ashley Smith

quotes.text: I still believe that love is the most powerful force in the world, even though I am yet to experience it fully.
quotes.author: Rufus Wainwright

quotes.text: I believe the target of anything in life should be to do it so well that it becomes an art.
quotes.author: Arsene Wenger

quotes.text: We all die. The goal isn't to live forever, the goal is to create something that will.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Diary

quotes.text: Success on any major scale requires you to accept responsibility... in the final analysis, the one quality that all successful people have... is the ability to take on responsibility.
quotes.author: Michael Korda

quotes.text: A whole stack of memories never equal one little hope.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.text: With reporting, if you work hard, you can usually pull something out. But writing humor doesn't respond to working hard, necessarily. I mean, you could just sit there and look at the page all day and maybe something will come.
quotes.author: Ian Frazier

quotes.text: We cannot stop the winter or the summer from coming. We cannot stop the spring or the fall or make them other than they are. They are gifts from the universe that we cannot refuse. But we can choose what we will contribute to life when each arrives.
quotes.author: Gary Zukav

quotes.text: The love of liberty and the sense of human dignity are the basic elements of the Anarchist creed.
quotes.author: Federica Montseny

quotes.text: I would be willing to do almost anything to make Art happy. I care about our friendship. The only thing I won't do is change the essence of my work.
quotes.author: Paul Simon

quotes.text: Hold fast to dreams,For if dreams dieLife is a broken-winged bird,That cannot fly.
quotes.author: Langston Hughes

quotes.text: We fell in love, despite our differences, and once we did, something rare and beautiful was created. For me, love like that has only happened once, and that's why every minute we spent together has been seared in my memory. I'll never forget a single moment of it.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Notebook

quotes.text: The only thing I have learnt over the years is that if you enjoy your work and put in the best efforts, it will show. If you follow this process, things work out. But if you go chasing a formula, success will elude you.
quotes.author: Mahesh Babu

quotes.text: He that lives upon hope will die fasting.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: I really love middle-grade. Middle-grade books have a little more of a magical, light-hearted feel. You can be a little bit more quirky, you can have a little more humor. It doesn't get so dark and deep.
quotes.author: James Dashner

quotes.text: Love never reasons, but profusely gives; it gives like a thoughtless prodigal its all, and then trembles least it has done to little.
quotes.author: Hannah More

quotes.text: Cleanliness is the scourge of art.
quotes.author: Craig Brown

quotes.text: How lucky I am to have known somebody and something that saying goodbye to is so damned awful.
quotes.author: Evans G. Valens,  The Other Side of the Mountain: The Story of Jill Kinmont

quotes.text: Indifference and neglect often do much more damage than outright dislike.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

quotes.text: Destroying things is much easier than making them.
quotes.author: Suzanne Collins,  The Hunger Games

quotes.text: Most great people have attained their greatest success just one step beyond their greatest failure.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: The sudden disappointment of a hope leaves a scar which the ultimate fulfillment of that hope never entirely removes.
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.text: Negative humor is forgotten immediately. It's the stuff that makes us feel better about our lives that lives long. Much more satisfying. Enter children's books.
quotes.author: Berkeley Breathed

quotes.text: There is a plan and a purpose, a value to every life, no matter what its location, age, gender or disability.
quotes.author: Sharron Angle

quotes.text: There has always been this narrator in me - I loved ideas, and part of the great love affair I would have with ideas consisted of talking about them.
quotes.author: Jason Silva

quotes.text: They say Princes learn no art truly, but the art of horsemanship. The reason is, the brave beast is no flatterer. He will throw a prince as soon as his groom.
quotes.author: Ben Jonson

quotes.text: Nothing succeeds like the appearance of success.
quotes.author: Christopher Lasch

quotes.text: I always entertain great hopes.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: My dad instilled in me a great sense of humor. I wasn't bullied at school because my outward attitude was confident, and that helps.
quotes.author: Warwick Davis

quotes.text: Life is very interesting... in the end, some of your greatest pains, become your greatest strengths.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.text: The thing about Chicago is that it really isn't like any other place. The architecture and the layout of the city are the best. I'm from the Midwest, and consider myself a Midwesterner. I feel most at home there. I love California. I have great friends in California. I just have always considered Illinois to be home.
quotes.author: Vince Vaughn

quotes.text: The artist must create a spark before he can make a fire and before art is born, the artist must be ready to be consumed by the fire of his own creation.
quotes.author: Auguste Rodin

quotes.text: We should all start to live before we get too old. Fear is stupid. So are regrets.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: Enjoying success requires the ability to adapt. Only by being open to change will you have a true opportunity to get the most from your talent.
quotes.author: Nolan Ryan

quotes.text: Hope is like peace. It is not a gift from God. It is a gift only we can give one another.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.text: I think that sense of humor is important in marriage. A sense of humor gets people through marriage.
quotes.author: Connie Britton

quotes.text: For God so loved the World that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life.
quotes.author: Jesus Christ

quotes.text: There's got to be something you want to tell and that's the engine which spurs all of the work you have to do in order to create the story, but you have to love some sort of nugget of what you're telling to be a filmmaker.
quotes.author: Bradley Cooper

quotes.text: I was an awful critic. I operated on the assumption that there was an absolute scale of values against which art could be measured. I didn't trust my own subjective responses.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.text: Nobody has ever measured, not even poets, how much the heart can hold.
quotes.author: Zelda Fitzgerald

quotes.text: When I look at my room, I see a girl who loves books.
quotes.author: John Green,  Looking for Alaska

quotes.text: I, with a deeper instinct, choose a man who compels my strength, who makes enormous demands on me, who does not doubt my courage or my toughness, who does not believe me naïve or innocent, who has the courage to treat me like a woman.
quotes.author: Anaïs Nin

quotes.text: As my father used to tell me, the only true sign of success in life is being able to do for a living that which makes you happy.
quotes.author: Al Yankovic

quotes.text: With optimism, you look upon the sunny side of things. People say, 'Studs, you're an optimist.' I never said I was an optimist. I have hope because what's the alternative to hope? Despair? If you have despair, you might as well put your head in the oven.
quotes.author: Studs Terkel

quotes.text: The great thing about 'Weeds' is that everything we do is never quite serious enough to be taken seriously. It always has humor behind it, and it think it makes it definitely more fun for the audience.
quotes.author: Alexander Gould

quotes.text: Loving oneself isn't hard, when you understand who and what 'yourself' is. It has nothing to do with the shape of your face, the size of your eyes, the length of your hair or the quality of your clothes. It's so beyond all of those things and it's what gives life to everything about you. Your own self is such a treasure.
quotes.author: Phylicia Rashad

quotes.text: I wanted to write a very simple story about a boy, a wolf, a girl, a bear and a forest, so I thought I might set it in the past. I didn't realise that it went back to when I was 10: I used to love the Stone Age when I was a kid and wanted to live in it, and I got rid of my bed and slept on the floor, but I didn't remember it.
quotes.author: Michelle Paver

quotes.text: Layer by layer art strips life bare.
quotes.author: Robert Musil

quotes.text: For instance, on the planet Earth, man had always assumed that he was more intelligent than dolphins because he had achieved so much—the wheel, New York, wars and so on—whilst all the dolphins had ever done was muck about in the water having a good time. But conversely, the dolphins had always believed that they were far more intelligent than man—for precisely the same reasons.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams,  The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy

quotes.text: I think it's way harder when you have success, 'cause people tend to not treat you the same or look at you the same because they see the success or the money you make.
quotes.author: Meek Mill

quotes.text: You all know that I have been sustained throughout my life by three saving graces - my family, my friends, and a faith in the power of resilience and hope. These graces have carried me through difficult times and they have brought more joy to the good times than I ever could have imagined.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Edwards

quotes.text: The waltz is a very important part of my life. It's a very important way for me to express my positiveness, bringing humor to the world.
quotes.author: Andre Rieu

quotes.text: Youth is not a time of life; it is a state of mind; it is not a matter of rosy cheeks, red lips and supple knees; it is a matter of the will, quality of the imagination, a vigor of the emotions; it is the freshness of the deep springs of life.
quotes.author: Samuel Ullman

quotes.text: Real art is basic emotion. If a scene is handled with simplicity - and I don't mean simple - it'll be good, and the public will know it.
quotes.author: John Wayne

quotes.text: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul and makes us reach for more, that plants a fire in our hearts and brings peace to our minds. And that's what you've given me. That's what I'd hoped to give you forever
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.text: Once upon a time there was a boy who loved a girl, and her laughter was a question he wanted to spend his whole life answering.
quotes.author: Nicole Krauss,  The History of Love

quotes.text: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
quotes.author: Conrad Hilton

quotes.text: But Hopes are Shy Birds flying at a great distance seldom reached by the best of Guns.
quotes.author: John James Audubon

quotes.text: Every black film feels like it's Tyler Perry, and that just needs to stop. But people seem to slowly be looking for what else is out there - 'Is there something else besides this type of humor?' 'I'm tired of seeing men in dresses.'
quotes.author: Issa Rae

quotes.text: The care of human life and happiness, and not their destruction, is the first and only object of good government.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: There's design, and there's art. Good design is total harmony. There's no better designer than nature - if you look at a branch or a leaf, it's perfect. It's all function. Art is different. It's about emotion. It's about suffering and beauty - but mostly suffering!
quotes.author: Diane von Furstenberg

quotes.text: Lord save us all from old age and broken health and a hope tree that has lost the faculty of putting out blossoms.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Be fun! I don't like homes or rooms that don't have a sense of humor or have some sense of whimsy or a personality. Your home should reflect who you are, and what you love. I would never have something in my home because it's the thing to have. I have to love it and it needs some connection to me.
quotes.author: Bryan Batt

quotes.text: With me, what you see is what you get. Yes, call me naive, but I love life. I am happy, and for that, I make no apologies. I do like to see the best in people, and when someone is nice to my face, I tend to believe them.
quotes.author: Joyce Giraud

quotes.text: I love pointy nails! A cute way to add a pop of color to your nails is to make a V-shape at the ends of them in a pastel color.
quotes.author: Bella Thorne

quotes.text: Performance has to be mainstream art. This is what I'm fighting for.
quotes.author: Marina Abramovic

quotes.text: Going to church doesn’t make you a Christian any more than going to a garage makes you an automobile.
quotes.author: Billy Sunday,  Billy Sunday, the Man and His Message: With His Own Words Which Have Won Thousands for Christ

quotes.text: Friendship is unnecessary, like philosophy, like art.... It has no survival value; rather it is one of those things which give value to survival.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis,  The Four Loves

quotes.text: A good friend will always stab you in the front.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: Fear can be good when you're walking past an alley at night or when you need to check the locks on your doors before you go to bed, but it's not good when you have a goal and you're fearful of obstacles. We often get trapped by our fears, but anyone who has had success has failed before.
quotes.author: Queen Latifah

quotes.text: God grant me the courage not to give up what I think is right even though I think it is hopeless.
quotes.author: Chester W. Nimitz

quotes.text: People in Russia adapt to misery by a deep, deep humor.
quotes.author: Ian Frazier

quotes.text: I always say that the times in my life when I've been happiest are the times when I've seen, like, a sunset.
quotes.author: Chris Evans

quotes.text: Love is the delightful interval between meeting a beautiful girl and discovering that she looks like a haddock.
quotes.author: John Barrymore

quotes.text: I feel like skateboarding is as much of a sport as a lifestyle, and an art form, so there's so much that that transcends in terms of music, fashion, and entertainment.
quotes.author: Tony Hawk

quotes.text: If the world were merely seductive, that would be easy. If it were merely challenging, that would be no problem. But I arise in the morning torn between a desire to improve the world and a desire to enjoy the world. This makes it hard to plan the day.
quotes.author: E.B. White

quotes.text: I have an idea of who I want to be, I have a vision of my own success.
quotes.author: Wiz Khalifa

quotes.text: All kids need is a little help, a little hope and somebody who believes in them.
quotes.author: Magic Johnson

quotes.text: Bands from Akron have a sense of humor and don't tend to take themselves too seriously.
quotes.author: Dan Auerbach

quotes.text: When I was young I thought that money was the most important thing in life; now that I am old I know that it is.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: To be happy with a man you must understand him a lot and love him a little. To be happy with a woman you must love her a lot and not try to understand her at all.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.text: In visual perception a color is almost never seen as it really is - as it physically is. This fact makes color the most relative medium in art.
quotes.author: Josef Albers

quotes.text: I would always rather be happy than dignified.
quotes.author: Charlotte Brontë,  Jane Eyre

quotes.text: Some of the best lessons we ever learn are learned from past mistakes. The error of the past is the wisdom and success of the future.
quotes.author: Dale Turner

quotes.text: The theological virtue of hope is the patient and trustful willingness to live without closure, without resolution, and still be content and even happy because our Satisfaction is now at another level, and our Source is beyond ourselves.
quotes.author: Richard Rohr

quotes.text: If you look at the game and everything, it's not quite like looking at an animated film, because that's total character. This, this is really movement, but it's got funny little things if you look for the humor. They're actually getting to the character.
quotes.author: Don Bluth

quotes.text: Even a happy life cannot be without a measure of darkness, and the word happy would lose its meaning if it were not balanced by sadness. It is far better take things as they come along with patience and equanimity.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.text: I'd rather be a failure at something I love than a success at something I hate.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.text: Our best teachers do more than impart facts and figures - they inspire and encourage students and instill a true desire to learn. That's a fine art in itself.
quotes.author: Sonny Perdue

quotes.text: The secret of success is constancy to purpose.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.text: Tomorrow hopes we have learned something from yesterday.
quotes.author: John Wayne

quotes.text: I often have said that to be a college president, you need a thick skin, a good sense of humor, and nerves like sewer pipes.
quotes.author: Gordon Gee

quotes.text: Science is a way of life. Science is a perspective. Science is the process that takes us from confusion to understanding in a manner that's precise, predictive and reliable - a transformation, for those lucky enough to experience it, that is empowering and emotional.
quotes.author: Brian Greene

quotes.text: There are many little ways to enlarge your child's world. Love of books is the best of all.
quotes.author: Jackie Kennedy

quotes.text: Making art is not the matter of a moment, and nor is making an exhibition; curating follows art.
quotes.author: Hans-Ulrich Obrist

quotes.text: Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a harder battle.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: Success means having the courage, the determination, and the will to become the person you believe you were meant to be.
quotes.author: George A. Sheehan

quotes.text: Hope is a waking dream.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: I love 'Dexter.' The dark sense of humor is wonderful.
quotes.author: Stephen J. Cannell

quotes.text: You are educated. Your certification is in your degree. You may think of it as the ticket to the good life. Let me ask you to think of an alternative. Think of it as your ticket to change the world.
quotes.author: Tom Brokaw

quotes.text: He who loves with purity considers not the gift of the lover, but the love of the giver.
quotes.author: Thomas a Kempis

quotes.text: I used to stay up all night playing 'Resident Evil 2,' and it wouldn't stop until the sun came up. Then I'd walk outside at dawn's first light, looking at the empty streets of London, and it was like life imitating art. It felt like I'd stepped into an actual zombie apocalypse.
quotes.author: Edgar Wright

quotes.text: Deep in the meadow, hidden far awayA cloak of leaves, a moonbeam rayForget your woes and let your troubles layAnd when it's morning again, they'll wash awayHere it's safe, here it's warmHere the daisies guard you from every harmHere your dreams are sweet and tomorrow brings them trueHere is the place where I love you.
quotes.author: Suzanne Collins,  The Hunger Games

quotes.text: Our daily decisions and habits have a huge impact upon both our levels of happiness and success.
quotes.author: Shawn Achor

quotes.text: In the end, that's what this election is about. Do we participate in a politics of cynicism or a politics of hope?
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: I can't live without a sense of humor. I need to be laughing and entertained at all times.
quotes.author: Carlos Ponce

quotes.text: Make it a habit to tell people thank you. To express your appreciation, sincerely and without the expectation of anything in return. Truly appreciate those around you, and you'll soon find many others around you. Truly appreciate life, and you'll find that you have more of it.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.text: There is no love that is not an echo.
quotes.author: Theodor Adorno

quotes.text: For art to exist, for any sort of aesthetic activity to exist, a certain physiological precondition is indispensable: intoxication.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: I've never fooled anyone. I've let people fool themselves. They didn't bother to find out who and what I was. Instead they would invent a character for me. I wouldn't argue with them. They were obviously loving somebody I wasn't.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: Humor has bailed me out of more tight situations than I can think of. If you go with your instincts and keep your humor, creativity follows. With luck, success comes, too.
quotes.author: Jimmy Buffett

quotes.text: There is no medicine like hope, no incentive so great, and no tonic so powerful as expectation of something tomorrow.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.text: There was a time I was very much blaming the way I felt on L.A, that it was a vacuum of creativity, of humor or anything organic, and I was really angry at the place. But then today I feel completely different - I love L.A.!
quotes.author: Naomi Watts

quotes.text: I remember my mother's prayers and they have always followed me. They have clung to me all my life.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Love doesn't just sit there, like a stone; it has to be made, like bread, remade all the time, made new.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.text: Admiration for a quality or an art can be so strong that it deters us from striving to possess it.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: A clever person solves a problem. A wise person avoids it.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Anyone who wants to sell you overnight success or wealth is not interested in your success; they are interested in your money.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.text: Be prepared, work hard, and hope for a little luck. Recognize that the harder you work and the better prepared you are, the more luck you might have.
quotes.author: Ed Bradley

quotes.text: I'm a Larry David fan, right? And it seems to me that Jewish history from the Talmud on has been a self-deprecating, self-critical kind of humor.
quotes.author: Peter Eisenman

quotes.text: The only rule is don't be boring and dress cute wherever you go. Life is too short to blend in.
quotes.author: Paris Hilton

quotes.text: I'm not really easy to live with! There needs to be unlimited patience and unconditional love. Men I've known before loved my independent spirit and were proud of my success, to the point that they'd become jealous of the time I devote to my career.
quotes.author: Milla Jovovich

quotes.text: Yes, the Bible should be taught in our schools because it is necessary to understand the Bible if we are to truly understand our own culture and how it came to be. The Bible has influenced every part of western culture from our art, music, and history, to our sense of fairness, charity, and business.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: I don't want to go to heaven. None of my friends are there.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: Talent alone won't make you a success. Neither will being in the right place at the right time, unless you are ready. The most important question is: 'Are your ready?'
quotes.author: Johnny Carson

quotes.text: Hopeful thinking can get you out of your fear zone and into your appreciation zone.
quotes.author: Martha Beck

quotes.text: There's a hysterical, tired sense of humor that comes after working 14 hours a day, six days a week. I like those things because they take the pressure off the constant stress.
quotes.author: Tom Berenger

quotes.text: Friendship is the shadow of the evening, which increases with the setting sun of life.
quotes.author: Jean de La Fontaine

quotes.text: When I really love someone, I can only show it by making aggressive and bad-taste remarks.
quotes.author: Slavoj Zizek

quotes.text: The great art of life is sensation, to feel that we exist, even in pain.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.text: A friend of mine said something powerful at his grandfather's funeral. He said that the greatest lesson from his grandfather's life was that he died empty, because he accomplished everything he wanted, with no regrets. I think that, along with leaving a legacy, would be the greatest sign of success.
quotes.author: Marvin Sapp

quotes.text: There can be hope only for a society which acts as one big family, not as many separate ones.
quotes.author: Anwar Sadat

quotes.text: I think God has a sense of humor, and the way my lessons come from God is very funny. I have to laugh at myself even if it's a tough lesson.
quotes.author: Yvette Nicole Brown

quotes.text: In everyone's life, at some time, our inner fire goes out. It is then burst into flame by an encounter with another human being. We should all be thankful for those people who rekindle the inner spirit.

quotes.text: I've always wanted to be a mom because I want to give a kid all of the magical gifts my mom gave to me, such as love and friendship. She and I had this incredible connection that was so unbelievable.

quotes.text: All things are artificial, for nature is the art of God.
quotes.author: Thomas Browne

quotes.text: Facts do not cease to exist because they are ignored.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley,  Complete Essays 2, 1926-29

quotes.text: I hope she'll be a fool -- that's the best thing a girl can be in this world, a beautiful little fool.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald,  The Great Gatsby

quotes.text: Success to me is being a good person, treating people well.
quotes.author: David LaChapelle

quotes.text: One loves to possess arms, though they hope never to have occasion for them.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: I don't think humor is forced upon my universe; it's a part of it.
quotes.author: Manuel Puig

quotes.text: My biggest success is getting over the things that have tried to destroy and take me out of this life. Those are my biggest successes. It has nothing to do with work.

quotes.text: Pasta isn't just for Italian food anymore. Now there are tasty pasta recipes found in Asian cuisine, and it's emerging as a newfound love for vegans.
quotes.author: Marcus Samuelsson

quotes.text: We live in an age when the traditional great subjects - the human form, the landscape, even newer traditions such as abstract expressionism - are daily devalued by commercial art.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.text: Some women choose to follow men, and some women choose to follow their dreams. If you're wondering which way to go, remember that your career will never wake up and tell you that it doesn't love you anymore.

quotes.text: Reader, suppose you were an idiot. And suppose you were a member of Congress. But I repeat myself.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Success is a journey, not a destination.
quotes.author: Ben Sweetland

quotes.text: On the first day of school, you got to be real careful where you sit. You walk into the classroom and just plunk your stuff down on any old desk, and the next thing you know the teacher is saying, 'I hope you all like where you're sitting, because these are your permanent seats.'
quotes.author: Jeff Kinney

quotes.text: I don't feel that I'm strictly Danish; I don't feel that my sense of humor is strictly Danish or my human sensibility is strictly Danish.
quotes.author: Susanne Bier

quotes.text: I would argue that nothing gives life more purpose than the realization that every moment of consciousness is a precious and fragile gift.
quotes.author: Steven Pinker

quotes.text: Beauty, sweet love, is like the morning dew, Whose short refresh upon tender green, Cheers for a time, but till the sun doth show And straight is gone, as it had never been.
quotes.author: Samuel Daniel

quotes.text: Feelings aroused by the touch of someone's hand, the sound of music, the smell of a flower, a beautiful sunset, a work of art, love, laughter, hope and faith - all work on both the unconscious and the conscious aspects of the self, and they have physiological consequences as well.
quotes.author: Bernie Siegel

quotes.text: Fathers and mothers have lost the idea that the highest aspiration they might have for their children is for them to be wise... specialized competence and success are all that they can imagine.
quotes.author: Allan Bloom

quotes.text: Behaving morally because of a hope of reward or a fear of punishment is not morality. Morality is not bribery or threats. Religion is bribery and threats. Humans have morality. We don't need religion.
quotes.author: Penn Jillette

quotes.text: I love puns. I've been known to turn the car around just to take advantage of a good pun situation. It really is the highest form of humor.
quotes.author: Karin Slaughter

quotes.text: The most glorious moments in your life are not the so-called days of success, but rather those days when out of dejection and despair you feel rise in you a challenge to life, and the promise of future accomplishments.

quotes.text: History has remembered the kings and warriors, because they destroyed; art has remembered the people, because they created.
quotes.author: William Morris

quotes.text: There are no good girls gone wrong - just bad girls found out.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.text: Never love anyone who treats you like you're ordinary.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: Success is just being happy. And I try so many different things. I do a lot of different things. Because I think God has helped me to love myself. I know who God is, and I love God.
quotes.author: Herschel Walker

quotes.text: The youth is the hope of our future.
quotes.author: Jose Rizal

quotes.text: People who know me know I have a sense of humor that can really push the envelope.
quotes.author: Carmen Electra

quotes.text: Don't listen to what anybody says except the people who encourage you. If it's what you want to do and it's within yourself, then keep going and try to do it for the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Jake Gyllenhaal

quotes.text: Part of growing up is realizing you learn to love so many people. It's about forming those relationships and finding what will last forever.
quotes.author: Dylan O'Brien

quotes.text: Politics is the art of the possible.
quotes.author: Otto von Bismarck

quotes.text: The optimist underestimates how difficult it is to achieve real change, believing that anything is possible and it's possible now. Only by confronting head-on the reality that all progress is going to be obstructed by vested interests and corrupted by human venality can we create realistic programmes that actually have a chance of success.
quotes.author: Julian Baggini

quotes.text: Any people anywhere, being inclined and having the power, have the right to rise up, and shake off the existing government, and form a new one that suits them better. This is a most valuable - a most sacred right - a right, which we hope and believe, is to liberate the world.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: I love the vulgar. I kind of have the humor of a 17-year-old boy.
quotes.author: Judy Gold

quotes.text: I know that many of you do wear such a cross of Christ, not in any ostentatious way, not in a way that might harm you at your work or recreation, but a simple indication that you value the role of Jesus Christ in the history of the world, that you are trying to live by Christ's standards in your own daily life.
quotes.author: Keith O'Brien

quotes.text: Every age has its storytelling form, and video gaming is a huge part of our culture. You can ignore or embrace video games and imbue them with the best artistic quality. People are enthralled with video games in the same way as other people love the cinema or theatre.
quotes.author: Andy Serkis

quotes.text: Football is an art, like dancing is an art - but only when it's well done does it become an art.
quotes.author: Arsene Wenger

quotes.text: It means 'Shadowhunters: Looking Better in Black Than the Widows of our Enemies Since 1234'.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Bones

quotes.text: In the depth of winter, I finally learned that within me there lay an invincible summer.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.text: It's only after we've lost everything that we're free to do anything.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Fight Club

quotes.text: When a small child, I thought that success spelled happiness. I was wrong, happiness is like a butterfly which appears and delights us for one brief moment, but soon flits away.

quotes.text: We must restore hope to young people, help the old, be open to the future, spread love. Be poor among the poor. We need to include the excluded and preach peace.

quotes.text: Every time I do a movie like 'Finding Neverland' or 'Chocolat' or 'Shakespeare' in Love,' we deal with the creative process, but there's humor and fun along the way. I always love that kind of movie.
