quotes.text: I seriously feel like the best days are ahead, and I like the idea of getting to do everything I did before but with more knowledge, experience, and street smarts. There's a certain love, appreciation, and gratitude that you have at 40 that you don't have when you're younger, and it makes every accomplishment feel so much better.
quotes.author: Jennifer Lopez

quotes.text: Ballet is an incredibly difficult, beautiful art form that takes a lot of training, a lot of time, and a lot of hard work.
quotes.author: Sutton Foster

quotes.text: Over the years, I've become barraged by comments from people, such as, 'Beam me up, Scotty!' and I became defensive. I felt they were derisive and engendered an attitude. I am grateful for the success, but didn't want to be mocked.
quotes.author: William Shatner

quotes.text: Philip Larkin has a tough honesty and sense of humor that I find irresistible, as a contemporary poet.
quotes.author: Robert Morgan

quotes.text: You need to make a commitment, and once you make it, then life will give you some answers.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: What does love look like? It has the hands to help others. It has the feet to hasten to the poor and needy. It has eyes to see misery and want. It has the ears to hear the sighs and sorrows of men. That is what love looks like.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.text: You wouldn't have the same art on the walls at every restaurant or the same waiter uniforms. Neither should you have the same service style at every restaurant.
quotes.author: Danny Meyer

quotes.text: The ever quickening advances of science made possible by the success of the Human Genome Project will also soon let us see the essences of mental disease. Only after we understand them at the genetic level can we rationally seek out appropriate therapies for such illnesses as schizophrenia and bipolar disease.
quotes.author: James D. Watson

quotes.text: I hope we shall crush in its birth the aristocracy of our monied corporations which dare already to challenge our government to a trial by strength, and bid defiance to the laws of our country.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: Do feminists have a sense of humor? Yes.
quotes.author: Gloria Allred

quotes.text: I tell myself that God gave my children many gifts - spirit, beauty, intelligence, the capacity to make friends and to inspire respect. There was only one gift he held back - length of life.
quotes.author: Rose Kennedy

quotes.text: Money is not a motivating factor. Money doesn't thrill me or make me play better because there are benefits to being wealthy. I'm just happy with a ball at my feet. My motivation comes from playing the game I love. If I wasn't paid to be a professional footballer I would willingly play for nothing.
quotes.author: Lionel Messi

quotes.text: Part of what I do and what I want to do is I want to bring art into the everyday life. If you can take ordinary just walking in the street and you're confronted by something, that might change your day - it might inspire you.
quotes.author: Kenny Scharf

quotes.text: Substitute 'damn' every time you're inclined to write 'very;' your editor will delete it and the writing will be just as it should be.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Success isn't about the end result, it's about what you learn along the way.
quotes.author: Vera Wang

quotes.text: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.text: 'The Sundial' is written with the kind of humor that would make a guillotine laugh.
quotes.author: Victor LaValle

quotes.text: I was living an extremely burdensome life, because every time I prayed, I became more clearly aware of my faults. On the one hand, God was calling me. On the other, I was following the way of the world. Doing what God wanted made me happy; but I felt bound by the things of this world.

quotes.text: Art is like baby shoes. When you coat them with gold, they can no longer be worn.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.text: We can all agree that government can't solve the obesity crisis alone. It's an ongoing issue that will require a collaborative effort across private and public sectors if we want to see some long-term success.
quotes.author: Marcus Samuelsson

quotes.text: What greater aspiration and challenge are there for a mother than the hope of raising a great son or daughter?
quotes.author: Rose Kennedy

quotes.text: I like dark humor. My favorite movie of all time is 'Harold and Maude.'
quotes.author: Leslie Mann

quotes.text: Life finds its purpose and fulfillment in the expansion of happiness.
quotes.author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quotes.text: I love to go to the zoo. But not on Sunday. I don't like to see the people making fun of the animals, when it should be the other way around.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.text: Reason clears and plants the wilderness of the imagination to harvest the wheat of art.
quotes.author: Austin O'Malley

quotes.text: If more of us valued food and cheer and song above hoarded gold, it would be a merrier world.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.text: Look, if you ask a child, 'Would you rather have a fulfilled mother or a stay-at-home Sylvia Plath,' they'll pick Sylvia Plath every time. But I think it's really important that children don't feel their parents' emotional lives depend on their success.
quotes.author: Ayelet Waldman

quotes.text: I only hope that we don't lose sight of one thing - that it was all started by a mouse.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: I try to cope with everything through humor.
quotes.author: Gail Porter

quotes.text: My whole life is about winning. I don't lose often. I almost never lose.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.text: A dream is what makes people love life even when it is painful.
quotes.author: Theodore Zeldin

quotes.text: Architecture is basically the design of interiors, the art of organizing interior space.
quotes.author: Philip Johnson

quotes.text: Unless someone like you cares a whole awful lot,Nothing is going to get better. It's not.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss,  The Lorax

quotes.text: Science without religion is lame, religion without science is blind.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The worst part of success is, to me, adapting to it. It's scary.
quotes.author: Kendrick Lamar

quotes.text: The human body experiences a powerful gravitational pull in the direction of hope. That is why the patient's hopes are the physician's secret weapon. They are the hidden ingredients in any prescription.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.text: I can't not find humor in elements of most parts of life, but at the same time nothing ever seems perpetually funny to me.
quotes.author: Greg Kinnear

quotes.text: Everyone suffers some injustice in life, and what better motivation than to help others not suffer in the same way.
quotes.author: Bella Thorne

quotes.text: No art is less spontaneous than mine. What I do is the result of reflection and the study of the great masters.
quotes.author: Edgar Degas

quotes.text: Some books should be tasted, some devoured, but only a few should be chewed and digested thoroughly.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.text: One of the key elements of human behavior is, humans have a greater fear of loss than enjoyment of success. All the academic studies will show you that the fear of loss of capital is far greater than the enjoyment of gains.

quotes.text: We all hope for breakthrough rebirth moments.
quotes.author: Dane Cook

quotes.text: Humor can inform and break down stigma, which is a huge issue in the military.
quotes.author: Garry Trudeau

quotes.text: Life is short and we have never too much time for gladdening the hearts of those who are travelling the dark journey with us. Oh be swift to love, make haste to be kind.

quotes.text: My motivation for being a good drummer was born out of fear, which, in a way, seems so antithetical to what art should be.
quotes.author: Damien Chazelle

quotes.text: Let every man feel that he is the architect and builder of his own life, and that he proposes to make a success of it by working.
quotes.author: Heber J. Grant

quotes.text: If the skies fall, one may hope to catch larks.
quotes.author: Francois Rabelais

quotes.text: Brits have a better sense of humor in most ways. It's darker, more cutting.
quotes.author: Stephan Pastis

quotes.text: I'll tell you, in my life I've never once have seen a Hispanic panhandler, because in our community, it would be viewed as shameful to be out on the street begging. Those are all conservative values - faith, family, hard work, responsibility.
quotes.author: Ted Cruz

quotes.text: I love the man that can smile in trouble, that can gather strength from distress, and grow brave by reflection. 'Tis the business of little minds to shrink, but he whose heart is firm, and whose conscience approves his conduct, will pursue his principles unto death.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.text: I think we're much smarter than we were. Everybody knows that abstract art can be art, and most people know that they may not like it, even if they understand there's another purpose to it.
quotes.author: Roy Lichtenstein

quotes.text: All the world is made of faith, and trust, and pixie dust.
quotes.author: J.M. Barrie,  Peter Pan

quotes.text: This is a good sign, having a broken heart. It means we have tried for something.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert,  Eat, Pray, Love

quotes.text: Before anything else, preparation is the key to success.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.text: Hope, like faith, is nothing if it is not courageous; it is nothing if it is not ridiculous.
quotes.author: Thornton Wilder

quotes.text: Humor reminds you, when you're flattened by sorrow, that you're still human.
quotes.author: Elizabeth McCracken

quotes.text: The world has never yet seen a truly great and virtuous nation because in the degradation of woman the very fountains of life are poisoned at their source.
quotes.author: Lucretia Mott

quotes.text: It is necessary to fall in love... if only to provide an alibi for all the random despair you are going to feel anyway.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.text: In life, as in art, the beautiful moves in curves.
quotes.author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.text: Get busy living or get busy dying.
quotes.author: Stephen King,  Different Seasons

quotes.text: You talk when you cease to be at peace with your thoughts.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran,  The Prophet

quotes.text: It's really a wonder that I haven't dropped all my ideals, because they seem so absurd and impossible to carry out. Yet I keep them, because in spite of everything, I still believe that people are really good at heart.
quotes.author: Anne Frank,  The Diary of a Young Girl

quotes.text: Success is almost totally dependent upon drive and persistence. The extra energy required to make another effort or try another approach is the secret of winning.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.text: Hope, deceiving as it is, serves at least to lead us to the end of our lives by an agreeable route.
quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.text: You write the way you think about the world. My motto in times of trouble - and I'm speaking of life, not writing - is 'no humor too black.'
quotes.author: Elizabeth McCracken

quotes.text: Loud is a way of life.
quotes.author: Steven Adler

quotes.text: Love cannot endure indifference. It needs to be wanted. Like a lamp, it needs to be fed out of the oil of another's heart, or its flame burns low.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.text: Does art have a future? Performance genres like opera, theater, music and dance are thriving all over the world, but the visual arts have been in slow decline for nearly 40 years. No major figure of profound influence has emerged in painting or sculpture since the waning of Pop Art and the birth of Minimalism in the early 1970s.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.text: I heard what you said. I’m not the silly romantic you think. I don’t want the heavens or the shooting stars. I don’t want gemstones or gold. I have those things already. I want…a steady hand. A kind soul. I want to fall asleep, and wake, knowing my heart is safe. I want to love, and be loved.
quotes.author: Shana Abe

quotes.text: May you live every day of your life.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.text: The secret of success is learning how to use pain and pleasure instead of having pain and pleasure use you. If you do that, you're in control of your life. If you don't, life controls you.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Hope is itself a species of happiness, and, perhaps, the chief happiness, which this world affords.
quotes.author: William Samuel Johnson

quotes.text: I have the humor of a 9-year-old boy, and sometimes I've had laughing fits on-air.
quotes.author: Megyn Kelly

quotes.text: No matter how you're feeling, a little dog gunna love you.
quotes.author: Waka Flocka Flame

quotes.text: Art saved me; it got me through my depression and self-loathing, back to a place of innocence.
quotes.author: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.text: It is sometimes an appropriate response to reality to go insane.
quotes.author: Philip K. Dick,  VALIS

quotes.text: Honesty and loyalty are key. If two people can be honest with each other about everything, that's probably the biggest key to success.
quotes.author: Taylor Lautner

quotes.text: We hope that through these trade arrangements, through collaboration in training, in manpower development, and what have you, ASEAN in, say, ten years' time, will be a very different ASEAN.
quotes.author: Sellapan Ramanathan

quotes.text: I think the thrust of any child is to try to fit in and be part of it. And I can't tell you how many times my humor, you know, what I thought was humor ended up making me the outsider. Like I'd be, I go, 'It's a joke.' And they'd go, 'Well, what was funny?' And they just thought I was insane.
quotes.author: Howie Mandel

quotes.text: A shady business never yields a sunny life.
quotes.author: B. C. Forbes

quotes.text: It's tangible, it's solid, it's beautiful. It's artistic, from my standpoint, and I just love real estate.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.text: Movies become art after editing. Instead of just reproducing reality, they juxtapose images of it. That implies expression; that's art.
quotes.author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

quotes.text: Never go to bed mad. Stay up and fight.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.text: Reading is one form of escape. Running for your life is another.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.text: Here’s to books, the cheapest vacation you can buy.
quotes.author: Charlaine Harris

quotes.text: Some people care too much. I think it's called love.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne,  Winnie-the-Pooh

quotes.text: Give a girl the right shoes, and she can conquer the world.
quotes.author: Bette Midler

quotes.text: I have had extremely good relations with the United States and with both parties (Republicans and Democrats), and I hope to continue to have these good relations, which I, again repeating, do not consider to be mutually exclusive with having good relations with Venezuela or Ecuador or whichever country in South America.
quotes.author: Juan Manuel Santos

quotes.text: The biggest void that people can have in their lives is a sense of humor. Spending your life with someone who doesn't have that wouldn't be palatable.
quotes.author: Howie Mandel

quotes.text: The Hercules' was a monumental undertaking. It is the largest aircraft ever built... I put the sweat of my life into this thing.
quotes.author: Howard Hughes

quotes.text: My thoughts on gay marriage are that everyone has the right to love and be loved, and that's the position I take.
quotes.author: Nick Jonas

quotes.text: During the Middle Ages they understood that words accompanied by imagery are much more memorable. By making the margins of a book colorful and beautiful, illuminations help make the text unforgettable. It's unfortunate that we've lost the art of illumination.
quotes.author: Joshua Foer

quotes.text: I do not want people to be very agreeable, as it saves me the trouble of liking them a great deal.
quotes.author: Jane Austen,  Jane Austen's Letters

quotes.text: Success is where preparation and opportunity meet.
quotes.author: Bobby Unser

quotes.text: I certainly notice the vitality in Belfast, which wasn't there in the Seventies. There was a war going on then. Now there are cranes everywhere. There really is a sense of renewal and hope.
quotes.author: Liam Neeson

quotes.text: My family has been amazing, and they understand how blessed I am. They've been able to keep my sense of humor.
quotes.author: Karen Duffy

quotes.text: Every major question in history is a religious question. It has more effect in molding life than nationalism or a common language.
quotes.author: Hilaire Belloc

quotes.text: Even from their infancy we frame them to the sports of love: their instruction, behavior, attire, grace, learning and all their words azimuth only at love, respects only affection. Their nurses and their keepers imprint no other thing in them.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.text: Nature is inside art as its content, not outside as its model.
quotes.author: Marilyn French

quotes.text: If one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: I'd be happy to live till 80 as long as I was comfortable and in good health. Mind you, ask me again on the eve of my 80th birthday. Even so, I hope we don't all start living to be 120. I'm not sure I'd cope with another 60 years.
quotes.author: Bonnie Tyler

quotes.text: Sure, I am funny and have a good sense of humor. Mostly, though, I just tell the truth. The internal dialogue people have in their heads - I just write it.
quotes.author: Kara Swisher

quotes.text: It is my aim, my destination in life to make the cello as beloved an instrument as the violin and piano.
quotes.author: Mstislav Rostropovich

quotes.text: I love dressing up. It's the best part of being a girl, I think.
quotes.author: Emma Roberts

quotes.text: Even in literature and art, no man who bothers about originality will ever be original: whereas if you simply try to tell the truth (without caring twopence how often it has been told before) you will, nine times out of ten, become original without ever having noticed it.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.text: We have to dare to be ourselves, however frightening or strange that self may prove to be.
quotes.author: May Sarton

quotes.text: If you want to succeed you should strike out on new paths, rather than travel the worn paths of accepted success.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.text: The planet's hope and salvation lies in the adoption of revolutionary new knowledge being revealed at the frontiers of science.
quotes.author: Bruce Lipton

quotes.text: People see me laughing and telling jokes, but they had no idea after the show was over, I had no joy in my life, in my heart.
quotes.author: Steve Harvey

quotes.text: I love people who make me laugh. I honestly think it's the thing I like most, to laugh. It cures a multitude of ills. It's probably the most important thing in a person.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: I have seen many storms in my life. Most storms have caught me by surprise, so I had to learn very quickly to look further and understand that I am not capable of controlling the weather, to exercise the art of patience and to respect the fury of nature.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.text: When someone shows you who they are believe them; the first time.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: You can't stay in your corner of the Forest waiting for others to come to you. You have to go to them sometimes.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne,  Winnie-the-Pooh

quotes.text: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.text: I hope that at the end of the seven years, people will say that I have been of some inspirational value to them at home in terms of inclusiveness and abroad, I look forward to representing Ireland.
quotes.author: Michael D. Higgins

quotes.text: Good acting is thinking in front of the camera. I just do that and apply a sense of humor to it. You have to trust the audience to get it.
quotes.author: Charles Grodin

quotes.text: So many tangles in life are ultimately hopeless that we have no appropriate sword other than laughter.
quotes.author: Gordon W. Allport

quotes.text: To say nothing, especially when speaking, is half the art of diplomacy.
quotes.author: Will Durant

quotes.text: Reality is merely an illusion, albeit a very persistent one.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances: if there is any reaction, both are transformed.
quotes.author: C.G. Jung

quotes.text: I attribute my success to this - I never gave or took any excuse.
quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

quotes.text: Candidate Obama was either exceptionally naive or willfully disingenuous when he vowed to change the way Washington works. The very promise of Hope and Change was rooted in uprooting the Washington modus operandi. But instead of rejecting it, he embraced it all - the secrecy, the closed doors, the political favors, the near-criminal negligence.
quotes.author: Reince Priebus

quotes.text: I like doing comedy, I like doing drama. Naturally I like to do, I like doing dramas, I like conflict, and when I do a comedy, you know, I've found that, like, romantic comedy is the trickiest one, because often it's neither: it's not romantic and it's not funny. So, like, I like a comedy that's biting. It's biting humor or really quirky humor.
quotes.author: Matt Dillon

quotes.text: Whether you are an astronomer or a life scientist, geophysicist, or a pilot, you've got to be there because you believe you are good in your field, and you can contribute, not because you are going to get a lot of fame or whatever when you get back.
quotes.author: Alan Shepard

quotes.text: I love everything that's old, - old friends, old times, old manners, old books, old wine.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.text: Love isn't an emotion or an instinct - it's an art.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.text: Anyone who lives within their means suffers from a lack of imagination.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: Success doesn't necessarily come from breakthrough innovation but from flawless execution. A great strategy alone won't win a game or a battle; the win comes from basic blocking and tackling.
quotes.author: Naveen Jain

quotes.text: When it comes down to it, it's giving people a good night out in a basic way and I think my company guarantees that. There's always something new and something to excite us and surprise us, and that's why people come back, I hope.
quotes.author: Matthew Bourne

quotes.text: My dad was a very funny man - he's the one who taught me life would be awfully hard without humor! I'm sure his Irish wit in some way influenced my decision to become an actress.
quotes.author: Joan Cusack

quotes.text: There are certain things about me that I will never tell to anyone because I am a very private person. But basically, what you see is who I am. I'm independent, I do like to be liked, I do look for the good side of life and people. I'm positive, I'm disciplined, I like my life in order, and I'm neat as a pin.
quotes.author: Mary Tyler Moore

quotes.text: Every happening, great and small, is a parable whereby God speaks to us, and the art of life is to get the message.
quotes.author: Malcolm Muggeridge

quotes.text: You educate a man; you educate a man. You educate a woman; you educate a generation.
quotes.author: Brigham Young

quotes.text: True success is overcoming the fear of being unsuccessful.
quotes.author: Paul Sweeney

quotes.text: The only way of knowing a person is to love them without hope.
quotes.author: Walter Benjamin

quotes.text: Most of the people in my family were pretty funny. Everyone had a good sense of humor. I came to California right after college, wanting to be a musician.
quotes.author: Andy Kindler

quotes.text: Many people come to reinvention when life changes around them, but people come in all different stripes. I'm oriented to change.
quotes.author: Jane Pauley

quotes.text: Bad food is made without pride, by cooks who have no pride, and no love. Bad food is made by chefs who are indifferent, or who are trying to be everything to everybody, who are trying to please everyone... Bad food is fake food... food that shows fear and lack of confidence in people's ability to discern or to make decisions about their lives.
quotes.author: Anthony Bourdain

quotes.text: It is not up to me whether I win or lose. Ultimately, this might not be my day. And it is that philosophy towards sports, something that I really truly live by. I am emotional. I want to win. I am hungry. I am a competitor. I have that fire. But deep down, I truly enjoy the art of competing so much more than the result.
quotes.author: Apolo Ohno

quotes.text: I don't believe in the transformation myth, where if you have more success, life changes for you.
quotes.author: Ben Mendelsohn

quotes.text: When a man becomes a Christian, he becomes industrious, trustworthy and prosperous. Now, if that man, when he gets all he can and saves all he can, does not give all he can, I have more hope for Judas Iscariot than for that man!
quotes.author: John Wesley

quotes.text: Using no control and using humor will build a relationship and make a dent to where the client puts the counselor in their quality world and then begins to relate and seek out the counselor. Effective therapy begins with the acceptance of the therapist into the client's quality world.
quotes.author: William Glasser

quotes.text: How far you go in life depends on your being tender with the young, compassionate with the aged, sympathetic with the striving and tolerant of the weak and strong. Because someday in your life you will have been all of these.
quotes.author: George Washington Carver

quotes.text: He who does not love his own language is worse than an animal and smelly fish.
quotes.author: Jose Rizal

quotes.text: Politics is the art of choosing between the disastrous and the unpalatable.
quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.text: A guy and a girl can be just friends, but at one point or another, they will fall for each other...Maybe temporarily, maybe at the wrong time, maybe too late, or maybe forever
quotes.author: Dave Matthews Band

quotes.text: Never laugh at live dragons.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.text: You've got to eat while you dream. You've got to deliver on short-range commitments, while you develop a long-range strategy and vision and implement it. The success of doing both. Walking and chewing gum if you will. Getting it done in the short-range, and delivering a long-range plan, and executing on that.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.text: So many people grew up with challenges, as I did. There weren't always happy things happening to me or around me. But when you look at the core of goodness within yourself - at the optimism and hope - you realize it comes from the environment you grew up in.

quotes.text: Throughout history, great leaders have known the power of humor.
quotes.author: Allen Klein

quotes.text: A life is not important except in the impact it has on other lives.
quotes.author: Jackie Robinson

quotes.text: Art is a marriage of the conscious and the unconscious.
quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

quotes.text: You know, all that really matters is that the people you love are happy and healthy. Everything else is just sprinkles on the sundae.
quotes.author: Paul Walker

quotes.text: I hope that in this year to come, you make mistakes. Because if you are making mistakes...you're Doing Something.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.text: If you create incredible value and information for others that can change their lives - and you always stay focused on that service - the financial success will follow.
quotes.author: Brendon Burchard

quotes.text: I do protect human rights, and I hope I shall always be looked up as a champion of human rights.
quotes.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quotes.text: It is characteristic of all deep human problems that they are not to be approached without some humor and some bewilderment.
quotes.author: Freeman Dyson

quotes.text: Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can't help them, at least don't hurt them.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: Actually I think Art lies in both directions - the broad strokes, big picture but on the other hand the minute examination of the apparently mundane. Seeing the whole world in a grain of sand, that kind of thing.
quotes.author: Peter Hammill

quotes.text: Whatever you want to do, if you want to be great at it, you have to love it and be able to make sacrifices for it.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Don’t go around saying the world owes you a living. The world owes you nothing. It was here first.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: I believe in everything until it's disproved. So I believe in fairies, the myths, dragons. It all exists, even if it's in your mind. Who's to say that dreams and nightmares aren't as real as the here and now?
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: The secret of our success is that we never, never give up.
quotes.author: Wilma Mankiller

quotes.text: That's all a man can hope for during his lifetime - to set an example - and when he is dead, to be an inspiration for history.

quotes.text: It has always surprised me how little attention philosophers have paid to humor, since it is a more significant process of mind than reason. Reason can only sort out perceptions, but the humor process is involved in changing them.
quotes.author: Edward de Bono

quotes.text: I argue thee that love is life. And life hath immortality.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.text: Friendship is unnecessary, like philosophy, like art... It has no survival value; rather it is one of those things that give value to survival.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.text: Knowledge is love and light and vision.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: A pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity; an optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty.
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.text: Every heart sings a song, incomplete, until another heart whispers back. Those who wish to sing always find a song. At the touch of a lover, everyone becomes a poet.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: We write to taste life twice, in the moment and in retrospect.
quotes.author: Anaïs Nin

quotes.text: Success or failure in business is caused more by the mental attitude even than by mental capacities.

quotes.text: You accept that this civilisation could be abolished and life will begin later on after a few thousand years because that is something that has happened in the history of this planet. When you have peace in yourself and accept, then you are calm enough to do something, but if you are carried by despair there is no hope.

quotes.text: In prehistoric times, mankind often had only two choices in crisis situations: fight or flee. In modern times, humor offers us a third alternative; fight, flee - or laugh.

quotes.text: You're only here for a short visit. Don't hurry, don't worry. And be sure to smell the flowers along the way.
quotes.author: Walter Hagen

quotes.text: The art of acceptance is the art of making someone who has just done you a small favor wish that he might have done you a greater one.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: Love is what we were born with. Fear is what we learned here.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.text: I like work: it fascinates me. I can sit and look at it for hours.
quotes.author: Jerome K. Jerome

quotes.text: These woods are lovely, dark and deep,But I have promises to keep,And miles to go before I sleep,And miles to go before I sleep.
quotes.author: Robert Frost,  Stopping by Woods on a Snowy Evening

quotes.text: Eating and reading are two pleasures that combine admirably.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: Honesty and integrity are absolutely essential for success in life - all areas of life. The really good news is that anyone can develop both honesty and integrity.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: Art is the most beautiful deception of all. And although people try to incorporate the everyday events of life in it, we must hope that it will remain a deception lest it become a utilitarian thing, sad as a factory.

quotes.text: I don't need someone with a hot body. He can be fat or overweight and have a belly. It's very much about style and substance and humor, interest, curiosity and really being smart.

quotes.text: Open your eyes, look within. Are you satisfied with the life you're living?
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.text: The art of love is largely the art of persistence.
quotes.author: Albert Ellis

quotes.text: You're imperfect, and you're wired for struggle, but you are worthy of love and belonging.
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.text: I think you still love me, but we can’t escape the fact that I’m not enough for you. I knew this was going to happen. So I’m not blaming you for falling in love with another woman. I’m not angry, either. I should be, but I’m not. I just feel pain. A lot of pain. I thought I could imagine how much this would hurt, but I was wrong.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami,  South of the Border, West of the Sun

quotes.text: The fault, dear Brutus, is not in our stars, but in ourselves.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare,  Julius Caesar

quotes.text: While formal schooling is an important advantage, it is not a guarantee of success nor is its absence a fatal handicap.
quotes.author: Ray Kroc

quotes.text: To withdraw is not to run away, and to stay is no wise action, when there's more reason to fear than to hope.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.text: Poor David Hume is dying fast, but with more real cheerfulness and good humor and with more real resignation to the necessary course of things, than any whining Christian ever dyed with pretended resignation to the will of God.
quotes.author: Adam Smith

quotes.text: Life is what happens while you are busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: The art of teaching is the art of assisting discovery.
quotes.author: Mark Van Doren

quotes.text: It is really rare to find someone you really, really love and that you want to spend your life with and all that stuff that goes along with being married. I am one of those lucky people. And I think she feels that way too. So the romantic stuff is easy because you want them to be happy.
quotes.author: Harry Connick, Jr.

quotes.text: To this day, just always treat people the way you want to be treated. Whether it's family or friends or co-workers, I think it's the most important thing. Whether you have success or don't have it, whether you're a good person is all that matters.
quotes.author: Brenda Song

quotes.text: God's way of answering the Christian's prayer for more patience, experience, hope and love often is to put him into the furnace of affliction.
quotes.author: Richard Cecil

quotes.text: The comic is the perception of the opposite; humor is the feeling of it.
quotes.author: Umberto Eco

quotes.text: Life is ten percent what happens to you and ninety percent how you respond to it.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.text: History develops, art stands still.
quotes.author: E. M. Forster

quotes.text: Thank you for reminding Canada that I'm a disappointment to them. I like hockey, I love it, but I'm not an avid hockey - let's face it, true Canadian - fan. I've always been more into snowboarding and skateboarding and sort of the alternative sports, I'm not crazy about hockey - but love it!
quotes.author: Dustin Milligan

quotes.text: That's always seemed so ridiculous to me, that people want to be around someone because they're pretty. It's like picking your breakfeast cereals based on color instead of taste.
quotes.author: John Green,  Paper Towns

quotes.text: Success is nothing if you don't have the right people to share it with; you're just gonna end up lonely.
quotes.author: Selena Gomez

quotes.text: I hope I never get so old I get religious.
quotes.author: Ingmar Bergman

quotes.text: The schizophrenic has no sense of humor. His world is a constantly daunting, unfriendly place.
quotes.author: Bob Newhart

quotes.text: Maybe that's what life is... a wink of the eye and winking stars.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.text: Words may be false and full of art; Sighs are the natural language of the heart.
quotes.author: Thomas Shadwell

quotes.text: What light is to the eyes - what air is to the lungs - what love is to the heart, liberty is to the soul of man.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.text: You wanna know what scares people? Success. When you don't make moves and when you don't climb up the ladder, everybody loves you because you're not competition.
quotes.author: Nicki Minaj

quotes.text: Between the fear that something would happen and the hope that still it wouldn't, there is much more space than one thinks. On that narrow, hard, bare and dark space a lot of us spend their lives.
quotes.author: Ivo Andric

quotes.text: As an actor, I'm attracted to drama; as a director, it's humor - because it's the story of my life, and I can't be that serious about it. Being alone is a big theme in all my movies, both as a director and as an actress.
quotes.author: Jodie Foster

quotes.text: The most satisfying thing in life is to have been able to give a large part of one's self to others.
quotes.author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quotes.text: Jazz music is America's past and its potential, summed up and sanctified and accessible to anybody who learns to listen to, feel, and understand it. The music can connect us to our earlier selves and to our better selves-to-come. It can remind us of where we fit on the time line of human achievement, an ultimate value of art.
quotes.author: Wynton Marsalis

quotes.text: When people get married because they think it's a long-time love affair, they'll be divorced very soon, because all love affairs end in disappointment. But marriage is a recognition of a spiritual identity.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.text: Sleep is good, he said, and books are better.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.text: Like success, failure is many things to many people. With Positive Mental Attitude, failure is a learning experience, a rung on the ladder, a plateau at which to get your thoughts in order and prepare to try again.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.text: When we create hope and opportunity in the lives of others, we allow love, decency and promise to triumph over cowardice and hate.
quotes.author: Kirsten Gillibrand

quotes.text: The combination of landing the biggest interview of my career and having a drill in my back reminds me that God only gives us what we can handle and that it helps to have a good sense of humor when we run smack into the absurdity of life.
quotes.author: Robin Roberts

quotes.text: The price of anything is the amount of life you exchange for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: No art is any good unless you can feel how it's put together. By and large it's the eye, the hand and if it's any good, you feel the body. Most of the best stuff seems to be a complete gesture, the totality of the artist's body; you can really lean on it.
quotes.author: Frank Stella

quotes.text: Why, when we know that there's no such thing as perfect, do most of us spend an incredible amount of time and energy trying to be everything to everyone? Is it that we really admire perfection? No - the truth is that we are actually drawn to people who are real and down-to-earth. We love authenticity and we know that life is messy and imperfect.
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.text: The more I know of the world, the more I am convinced that I shall never see a man whom I can really love. I require so much!
quotes.author: Jane Austen,  Sense and Sensibility

quotes.text: Isn't it nice to think that tomorrow is a new day with no mistakes in it yet?
quotes.author: L.M. Montgomery

quotes.text: The art of effective listening is essential to clear communication, and clear communication is necessary to management success.
quotes.author: James Cash Penney

quotes.text: When Nelson Mandela walked free, the world sang with joy. Ever since, South Africa has stood as a beacon of hope for Africa.
quotes.author: Ban Ki-moon

quotes.text: When I teach the formal curriculum, I have the chance to think about it ahead of time. I can rehearse it. I can illustrate it with self-deprecating humor and humble-sounding personal disclosure. I can try to make it comes out just right.
quotes.author: John Ortberg

quotes.text: You have enemies? Good. That means you've stood up for something, sometime in your life.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Art is not what you see, but what you make others see.
quotes.author: Edgar Degas

quotes.text: In my life I've learned that true happiness comes from giving. Helping others along the way makes you evaluate who you are. I think that love is what we're all searching for. I haven't come across anyone who didn't become a better person through love.
quotes.author: Marla Gibbs

quotes.text: There is never just one thing that leads to success for anyone. I feel it always a combination of passion, dedication, hard work, and being in the right place at the right time.
quotes.author: Lauren Conrad

quotes.text: Corporations, consumers, and citizens must begin acting in concert to create a powerful third pillar of social transformation if we hope to meet the social challenges we currently face with equal force. This begins with corporations that choose to alter how they practice capitalism in two ways to serve the greater good.
quotes.author: Simon Mainwaring

quotes.text: Denzel Washington has a great sense of humor. He did all those 'Nutty Professor' movies.
quotes.author: Seth MacFarlane

quotes.text: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.text: What I dream of is an art of balance, of purity and serenity devoid of troubling or depressing subject matter - a soothing, calming influence on the mind, rather like a good armchair which provides relaxation from physical fatigue.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.text: I can still love an ex as a person, regardless if the breakup was bad. I would never wish anything negative on them. It takes more energy to hate them than to wish them well.
quotes.author: Ashley Greene

quotes.text: She was a girl who knew how to be happy even when she was sad. And that’s important—you know
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: The will to persevere is often the difference between failure and success.
quotes.author: David Sarnoff

quotes.text: In acting, there's a type of courage you're recognized for all the time. You lose 100 pounds and play a guy with AIDS, and you get rewarded. But, in life, doing what is courageous is quiet, and no one knows about it. Courage is someone making sacrifices for their family or making selfless decisions for what they hope or feel.
quotes.author: Rob Lowe

quotes.text: I just am a snob when it comes to humor.
quotes.author: Courteney Cox

quotes.text: We need to give each other the space to grow, to be ourselves, to exercise our diversity. We need to give each other space so that we may both give and receive such beautiful things as ideas, openness, dignity, joy, healing, and inclusion.
quotes.author: Max de Pree

quotes.text: Art has the power to transform, to illuminate, to educate, inspire and motivate.
quotes.author: Harvey Fierstein

quotes.text: The more one does and sees and feels, the more one is able to do, and the more genuine may be one's appreciation of fundamental things like home, and love, and understanding companionship.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.text: Doubt thou the stars are fire;Doubt that the sun doth move;Doubt truth to be a liar;But never doubt I love.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare,  Hamlet

quotes.text: Those who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe,  Eleonora

quotes.text: I learned this, at least, by my experiment: that if one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau,  Walden: Or, Life in the Woods

quotes.text: You get a little moody sometimes but I think that's because you like to read. People that like to read are always a little fucked up.
quotes.author: Pat Conroy,  The Prince of Tides

quotes.text: Never mind what others do; do better than yourself, beat your own record from day to day, and you are a success.
quotes.author: William J. H. Boetcker

quotes.text: I hope people remember me for the kind of person that I am, not because of what I do.
quotes.author: Sean Faris

quotes.text: Professional comedians, surprisingly, have a lack of humor. They're insensitive to the insanity of our times.
quotes.author: Mort Sahl

quotes.text: What if you gave someone a gift, and they neglected to thank you for it - would you be likely to give them another? Life is the same way. In order to attract more of the blessings that life has to offer, you must truly appreciate what you already have.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.text: Wherever the art of medicine is loved, there is also a love of humanity.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.text: The art of war is simple enough. Find out where your enemy is. Get at him as soon as you can. Strike him as hard as you can, and keep moving on.
quotes.author: Ulysses S. Grant

quotes.text: Being happy is of the utmost importance. Success in anything is through happiness.
quotes.author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quotes.text: As I hope it doesn't come to the point where I need to take a day off. I feel pretty good right now and I'm not resting or saving for any other game.
quotes.author: Tim Duncan

quotes.text: It never seems to occur to some people, that, like beauty, a sense of humor may sometimes be fatal.
quotes.author: Edgar Rice Burroughs

quotes.text: If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: When you fish for love, bait with your heart, not your brain.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: In mathematics the art of proposing a question must be held of higher value than solving it.
quotes.author: Georg Cantor

quotes.text: When I have a little money, I buy books; and if I have any left, I buy food and clothes.
quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.text: Let us read, and let us dance; these two amusements will never do any harm to the world.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: If there's a golf course in heaven, I hope it's like Augusta National. I just don't want an early tee time.
quotes.author: Gary Player

quotes.text: I didn't think that anything is beyond humor - not profane humor, but a good, honest approach to humor.
quotes.author: Mort Sahl

quotes.text: I love power. But it is as an artist that I love it. I love it as a musician loves his violin, to draw out its sounds and chords and harmonies.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.text: Don't you know that every perfect life would mean the end of art?
quotes.author: Robert Musil

quotes.text: Books so special and rare and yours that advertising your affection feels like a betrayal.
quotes.author: John Green,  The Fault in Our Stars

quotes.text: It is the unknown we fear when we look upon death and darkness, nothing more.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

quotes.text: I have seven children by six different mothers. Maybe success was too good to me.
quotes.author: Eazy-E

quotes.text: One year, my good deed started with deciding to give all my friends makeup from a cruelty-free cosmetics line that I love. I did this with the hope that they would love it as much as I do and end up switching their makeup over to that cruelty-free line forever.
quotes.author: Jenna Morasca

quotes.text: Humor is the ability to see three sides to one coin.
quotes.author: Ned Rorem

quotes.text: It's all about quality of life and finding a happy balance between work and friends and family.
quotes.author: Philip Green

quotes.text: Love is the best school, but the tuition is high and the homework can be painful.
quotes.author: Diane Ackerman

quotes.text: You will always be fond of me. I represent to you all the sins you never had the courage to commit.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde,  The Picture of Dorian Gray

quotes.text: If we knew what it was we were doing, it would not be called research, would it?
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: What's meant to be will always find a way
quotes.author: Trisha Yearwood

quotes.text: I have decided to stick to love...Hate is too great a burden to bear.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.,  A Testament of Hope: The Essential Writings and Speeches

quotes.text: The longer you hang in there, the greater the chance that something will happen in your favor. No matter how hard it seems, the longer you persist, the more likely your success.
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.text: Being insecure - I'm a master, a virtuoso - they can be handing me the keys to the kingdom and all I can think is, I hope I don't drop the key.
quotes.author: M. Night Shyamalan

quotes.text: If someone is genuine, compassionate and kind, that is a turn-on. A sense of humor is a huge turn on, and that goes hand in hand with intelligence.
quotes.author: Jennifer Nettles

quotes.text: Most people have never learned that one of the main aims in life is to enjoy it.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.text: In life, there are those relationships where you really love someone, but they're just not right for you and there's a little bittersweet feel to it.
quotes.author: Jennifer Morrison

quotes.text: When hospitality becomes an art it loses its very soul.
quotes.author: Max Beerbohm

quotes.text: The person who makes a success of living is the one who sees his goal steadily and aims for it unswervingly.
quotes.author: Cecil B. DeMille

quotes.text: You have to find hope. Hope is such a shape shifter. You tend to look in the rearview mirror for hope, but when it's gone, you have to look forward. You have to get in the van and keep driving on.
quotes.author: Jonathan Evison

quotes.text: I love the idea of things being strict and things being uniform. That's the reason why I surround each collection with humor or irony. I want to make sure that it's not too serious and that there is some element that throws it off because otherwise that would make it really boring. There's always a story that's somewhat fantastical.
quotes.author: Thom Browne

quotes.text: Don't go around saying the world owes you a living. The world owes you nothing. It was here first.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: I love Christmas, not just because of the presents but because of all the decorations and lights and the warmth of the season.
quotes.author: Ashley Tisdale

quotes.text: Art is man's constant effort to create for himself a different order of reality from that which is given to him.
quotes.author: Chinua Achebe

quotes.text: Urgent optimism is the desire to act immediately to tackle an obstacle, combined with the belief that we have a reasonable hope of success.
quotes.author: Jane McGonigal

quotes.text: I hope that a move toward clemency with Judge Afiuni would be a step towards the importance of maintaining a properly functioning justice system.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.text: I was a product of a divorced family and I used humor as a weapon to combat sadness. I used comedy to make my mother laugh in light of the darkness that she faced, and to me it became a very powerful tool at a very young age, at six. I saw how therapeutic it could be.
quotes.author: Josh Gad

quotes.text: Nobody made a greater mistake than he who did nothing because he could do only a little.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.text: It'll be the Internet and piracy that will kill film. There's a philosophy that the Internet should be free, but the reality is that piracy will destroy the film industry and film as an art form because it's expensive to make a movie. Maybe you'll have funky little independent movies, and it'll go back and then start up again some other way.
quotes.author: Helen Mirren

quotes.text: I would challenge you to a battle of wits, but I see you are unarmed!
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: I have hated words and I have loved them, and I hope I have made them right.
quotes.author: Markus Zusak,  The Book Thief

quotes.text: Success soon palls. The joyous time is when the breeze first strikes your sails, and the waters rustle under your bows.
quotes.author: Charles Buxton

quotes.text: When I think about the world I would like to leave to my daughter and the grandchildren I hope to have, it is a world that moves away from unequal, unstable, unsustainable interdependence to integrated communities - locally, nationally and globally - that share the characteristics of all successful communities.
quotes.author: William J. Clinton

quotes.text: I think it's part of the responsibility of an artist to shock, to upset, to make people think differently, and to surprise people. And that's where the good humor is, if there's a surprise and there's something unexpected. Something that's not normal, not in the realm of general living expectations.
quotes.author: Bill Plympton

quotes.text: The Wine of Life keeps oozing drop by drop, The Leaves of Life keep falling one by one.
quotes.author: Edward Fitzgerald

quotes.text: I love salon days to pamper myself, do my nails.
quotes.author: Sania Mirza

quotes.text: I think art is not an ornament or refinement at the fringes of human intelligence, I think it's at the center. It's at the core.
quotes.author: Robert Pinsky

quotes.text: Faith is taking the first step even when you can't see the whole staircase.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.text: The superior man makes the difficulty to be overcome his first interest; success only comes later.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Let's drink to the spirit of gallantry and courage that made a strange Heaven out of unbelievable Hell, and let's drink to the hope that one day this country of ours, which we love so much, will find dignity and greatness and peace again.
quotes.author: Noel Coward

quotes.text: Humor is probably the most significant characteristics of the human mind. Far more significant than reason. In fact, reason is actually a very cheap commodity.
quotes.author: Edward de Bono

quotes.text: The story of life is quicker than the blink of an eye, the story of love is hello, goodbye.
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.text: Try as you will, you cannot annihilate that eternal relic of the human heart, love.

quotes.text: The mark of all good art is not that the thing done is done exactly or finely, for machinery may do as much, but that it is worked out with the head and the workman's heart.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: Of all sad words of tongue or pen, the saddest are these, 'It might have been.
quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier,  Maud Muller - Pamphlet

quotes.text: Every saint has a past, and every sinner has a future.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: Success is achieved by developing our strengths, not by eliminating our weaknesses.
quotes.author: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.text: The whole point of Superman, as originally created, was to be the ally of those who had no other allies. It put that magnitude of power, the most powerful guy in the world, in the service of those who had no hope, no chance.

quotes.text: What's great about the geek spirit is that life never seems to stop us, and they never seem to kill our enthusiasm, our optimism and our hunger to experience the world. We keep our sense of humor, we protect our dignity, we talk to our friends about the experience and then we start again fresh the very next day.
quotes.author: Paul Feig

quotes.text: Our life always expresses the result of our dominant thoughts.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.text: Love places someone else in the centre of your being and your own self is blurred.
quotes.author: Mohsin Hamid

quotes.text: An art book is a museum without walls.
quotes.author: Andre Malraux

quotes.text: Sarcasm is the last refuge of the imaginatively bankrupt.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Bones

quotes.text: No relationship is perfect, ever. There are always some ways you have to bend, to compromise, to give something up in order to gain something greater...The love we have for each other is bigger than these small differences. And that's the key. It's like a big pie chart, and the love in a relationship has to be the biggest piece. Love can make up for a lot.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen,  This Lullaby

quotes.text: I'm different, and I have to be a warrior to be that way. But I have had some success; I hope I have touched the lives of some wonderful people, all by being what I see as myself but some others people see as different.
quotes.author: Johnny Weir

quotes.text: Unless our conception of patriotism is progressive, it cannot hope to embody the real affection and the real interest of the nation.
quotes.author: Jane Addams

quotes.text: I think the humor of double puns is incredible.
quotes.author: Richard Lederer

quotes.text: I look back on my life like a good day's work, it was done and I am satisfied with it.
quotes.author: Grandma Moses

quotes.text: Love involves a peculiar unfathomable combination of understanding and misunderstanding.
quotes.author: Diane Arbus

quotes.text: My life is a monument to procrastination, to the art of putting things off until later, or much later, or possibly never.
quotes.author: Craig Brown

quotes.text: I have no special talents. I am only passionately curious.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Always do what you are afraid to do.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: We are taught to consume. And that's what we do. But if we realized that there really is no reason to consume, that it's just a mind set, that it's just an addiction, then we wouldn't be out there stepping on people's hands climbing the corporate ladder of success.
quotes.author: River Phoenix

quotes.text: Being a star has made it possible for me to get insulted in places where the average Negro could never hope to go and get insulted.
quotes.author: Sammy Davis, Jr.

quotes.text: I find humor to be the most attractive characteristic, but I certainly won't cancel anything out, considering when you love someone you love someone, and sometimes you just can't explain it.

quotes.text: Good friends, good books and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life.

quotes.text: If you do what you love, it is the best way to relax.
quotes.author: Christian Louboutin

quotes.text: If my art has nothing to do with people's pain and sorrow, what is 'art' for?

quotes.text: Success depends in a very large measure upon individual initiative and exertion, and cannot be achieved except by a dint of hard work.

quotes.text: I think of myself as a catalyst of action and a messenger of hope, turning people onto themselves and turning people onto their dreams.

quotes.text: To me, Ann Romney sounds like a better candidate than her husband. She put her MS into remission through horseback riding, alternative therapies, and a healthy diet. She knows how to pace herself. She has a sense of humor and an innate honesty, and her hair moves in the wind. Maybe she should run.
quotes.author: Patti Davis

quotes.text: What childishness is it that while there's breath of life in our bodies, we are determined to rush to see the sun the other way around?

quotes.text: Women love always: when earth slips from them, they take refuge in heaven.

quotes.text: Real artists take the misery and sadness of life and translate it into art.

quotes.text: Books are the perfect entertainment: no commercials, no batteries, hours of enjoyment for each dollar spent. What I wonder is why everybody doesn't carry a book around for those inevitable dead spots in life.

quotes.text: If we ever hope to rid the world of the political AIDS of our time, terrorism, the rule must be clear: One does not deal with terrorists; one does not bargain with terrorists; one kills terrorists.

quotes.text: You know those things that you throw the twigs into and it spits them out? That's what I do. The branches are like life, and I throw them into my head and some of it comes out as humor.

quotes.text: Wild oats will get sown some time, and one of the arts of life is to sow them at the right time.
quotes.author: Richard Le Gallienne

quotes.text: Well, Art is Art, isn't it? Still, on the other hand, water is water. And east is east and west is west and if you take cranberries and stew them like applesauce they taste much more like prunes than rhubarb does. Now you tell me what you know.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.text: Love is the magician that pulls man out of his own hat.
quotes.author: Ben Hecht

quotes.text: I am not young enough to know everything.

quotes.text: You can talk with someone for years, everyday, and still, it won't mean as much as what you can have when you sit in front of someone, not saying a word, yet you feel that person with your heart, you feel like you have known the person for forever.... connections are made with the heart, not the tongue.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.text: Man is the only creature who refuses to be what he is.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.text: When I was 5 years old, my mother always told me that happiness was the key to life. When I went to school, they asked me what I wanted to be when I grew up. I wrote down ‘happy’. They told me I didn’t understand the assignment, and I told them they didn’t understand life.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: You weren't born just to live a life and to die; you were born to accomplish something specifically. Matter of fact, success is making it to the end of your purpose; that is success... Success is not just existing. Success is making it to the end of why you were born.

quotes.text: My husband John Lennon was a very special man. A man of humble origin, he brought light and hope to the whole world with his words and music.

quotes.text: In truth, politeness is artificial good humor, it covers the natural want of it, and ends by rendering habitual a substitute nearly equivalent to the real virtue.

quotes.text: I've never been a big nightlife person. I have a pretty low-key life.
quotes.author: Murray Bartlett

quotes.text: When thou art above measure angry, bethink thee how momentary is man's life.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Choose your love, Love your choice.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.text: Love is always patient and kind. It is never jealous. Love is never boastful or conceited. It is never rude or selfish. It does not take offense and is not resentful. Love takes no pleasure in other people’s sins, but delights in the truth. It is always ready to excuse, to trust, to hope, and to endure whatever comes.
quotes.author: Anonymous,  Holy Bible: New International Version

quotes.text: The planet is fine. The people are fucked.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.text: There is an immutable conflict at work in life and in business, a constant battle between peace and chaos. Neither can be mastered, but both can be influenced. How you go about that is the key to success.
quotes.author: Phil Knight

quotes.text: There will always be someone else with a different view than you. I appreciate them and would never say that they are wrong. I hope that they would give me that courtesy also.
quotes.author: Melissa Etheridge

quotes.text: Anybody with a sense of humor is going to put on my album and laugh from beginning to end.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.text: My hometown I grew up in in Michigan is really tiny, and they are so excited for all of my adventures my whole life.
quotes.author: Toni Trucks

quotes.text: The beginning of a friendship, the fact that two people out of the thousands around them can meet and connect and become friends, seems like a kind of magic to me. But maintaining a friendship requires work. I don't mean that as a bad thing. Good art requires work as well.
quotes.author: Charles de Lint

quotes.text: This love is silent.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.text: Whether you think you can, or you think you can't--you're right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: There are thousands of inspirational stories waiting to be told about young women who yearn for a great education. They are stories of struggle and stories of success, and they will inspire others to take action and work to change lives.
quotes.author: Soledad O'Brien

quotes.text: 'Life, Love & Hope' is... I'm thinking 'larger picture.' I'm not trying to preach to anyone. We all get lost and caught up in our everyday problems. Your cellphone doesn't work or you got a parking ticket, you had a bad day at work. You can lose sight of the really important things in life; that's what the song is about.
quotes.author: Tom Scholz

quotes.text: My type of humor is me not caring whether people know what I'm talking about or not.
quotes.author: John Hodgman

quotes.text: That there's no more important decision in life than who you marry.
quotes.author: Brad Paisley

quotes.text: The art challenges the technology, and the technology inspires the art.
quotes.author: John Lasseter

quotes.text: Looking back, I have this to regret, that too often when I loved, I did not say so.
quotes.author: Ray Stannard Baker

quotes.text: Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.,  I Have a Dream: Writings and Speeches That Changed the World

quotes.text: As you become more successful, the gender barrier disappears. The credibility challenges you have during your growing up years starts disappearing when you start demonstrating success.
quotes.author: Kiran Mazumdar-Shaw

quotes.text: To me, it's always been a challenge to look for the light: to look for those spaces in your heart where there is hope and faith and try to embrace that rather than crush it. I've spent so many years trying to crush those feelings of hope, and I certainly succeeded for quite a while.
quotes.author: Dave Gahan

quotes.text: In a way, a lot of my humor comes from presenting things that are dramatic or shocking and then people not having socially appropriate responses, having people denying the drama by failing to react to it, and that's a really classic form of humor.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.text: All life is a manifestation of the spirit, the manifestation of love.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.text: A beautiful lady is an accident of nature. A beautiful old lady is a work of art.
quotes.author: Louis Nizer

quotes.text: Life is like an onion. You peel it off one layer at a time, and sometimes you weep.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.text: I believe there should be no arbitrary date set for withdrawal and yet no permanent, unending deployment. No cut and run, yet measured progress in helping a people who want to be free without an illusion of overnight success.
quotes.author: Rick Renzi

quotes.text: Here is just the beginning of a list of skills that exam results cannot possibly hope to reflect: interpersonal skills, the ability to entertain, how articulate we are as speakers, our ability to work as part of a team, the ability to deal with challenges and invention.
quotes.author: Alexandra Adornetto

quotes.text: Good humor is the health of the soul, sadness is its poison.
quotes.author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

quotes.text: When work is a pleasure, life is a joy! When work is a duty, life is slavery.
quotes.author: Maxim Gorky

quotes.text: The human soul is hungry for beauty; we seek it everywhere - in landscape, music, art, clothes, furniture, gardening, companionship, love, religion, and in ourselves. No one would desire not to be beautiful. When we experience the beautiful, there is a sense of homecoming.
quotes.author: John O'Donohue

quotes.text: If equal affection cannot be, let the more loving be me.
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.text: Make it a rule never to give a child a book you would not read yourself.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: Once you learn to read, you will be forever free.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.text: Real success is not, like, materialistic. It's being where you want to be when you want to be; just living your life how you feel; having an ultimate goal and being able to accomplish it.
quotes.author: Lindsey Wixson

quotes.text: I hope that there's a difference between being childish and childlike and that I'm the latter, if you take my meaning. I often sort of wonder. I don't think I'm a terribly good grown-up; I don't take responsibility easily or well in many areas of life. Finance and stuff like that, I'm absolutely appalling.
quotes.author: Graeme Base

quotes.text: When a chick has a sense of humor, there's nothing more attractive.
quotes.author: Dylan O'Brien

quotes.text: We forget that the water cycle and the life cycle are one.
quotes.author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quotes.text: Art lies by its own artifice.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.text: It is impossible to repent of love. The sin of love does not exist.
quotes.author: Muriel Spark

quotes.text: Well, I believe that the depth of your struggle can determine the height of your success. I was inspired to come out of everything I've been through and end up in a place where I never thought that I would be.
quotes.author: R. Kelly

quotes.text: Depression can seem worse than terminal cancer, because most cancer patients feel loved and they have hope and self-esteem.
quotes.author: David D. Burns

quotes.text: Congratulations, you have a sense of humor. And to those who didn't: Go stick your head in the mud.
quotes.author: Jesse Ventura

quotes.text: You cannot live your life looking at yourself from someone else's point of view.
quotes.author: Penelope Cruz

quotes.text: I adore art... when I am alone with my notes, my heart pounds and the tears stream from my eyes, and my emotion and my joys are too much to bear.
quotes.author: Giuseppe Verdi

quotes.text: Who so loves believes the impossible.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quotes.text: Two people in love, alone, isolated from the world, that's beautiful.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.text: Hope is the thing with feathers That perches in the soul And sings the tune without the words And never stops at all.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.text: And those who were seen dancing were thought to be insane by those who could not hear the music.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: King Louis Philippe once said to me that he attributed the great success of the British nation in political life to their talking politics after dinner.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.text: When my dad founded our church, he used either a globe or a map of the world behind him. It was symbolic of what Christ said: to go forth and preach hope to the world. We believe in the cross, but we just continued with the globe.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: My mom taught me the power of love. I learned to focus on the long-term big picture from my father. His sense of humor and light-hearted approach always make me smile. My husband is a pivotal anchor in my life. His influence encourages me to be independent and take risks.
quotes.author: Padmasree Warrior

quotes.text: Finding some quiet time in your life, I think, is hugely important.
quotes.author: Mariel Hemingway

quotes.text: No matter what is happening in life or in the world - war, natural disaster, poor health, pain, the death of loved ones - if existence is filled with art, music and literature, life will be fulfilling, a joy.
quotes.author: Karen DeCrow

quotes.text: Each moment of a happy lover's hour is worth an age of dull and common life.
quotes.author: Aphra Behn

quotes.text: If my life is going to mean anything, I have to live it myself.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan,  The Lightning Thief

quotes.text: By seizing the opportunities that disruption presents and leveraging hard times into greater success through outworking/outinnovating/outthinking and outworking everyone around you, this just might be the richest time of your life so far.
quotes.author: Robin S. Sharma

quotes.text: Every parent is at some time the father of the unreturned prodigal, with nothing to do but keep his house open to hope.
quotes.author: John Ciardi

quotes.text: If you're feeling blue, lock yourself in a room, stand in front of a mirror, and dance - and laugh at yourself and be sexy. Dance the silliest and ugliest you've ever danced. Make fun of yourself and try to recover your sense of humor.
quotes.author: Salma Hayek

quotes.text: If you wish to strengthen your confidence in God still more, often recall the loving way in which He has acted toward you, and how mercifully He has tried to bring you out of your sinful life, to break your attachment to the things of earth and draw you to His love.
quotes.author: Alphonsus Liguori

quotes.text: There hasn't been anything real since grunge. That was the last movement led by music or an art form.
quotes.author: Daphne Guinness

quotes.text: A man is already halfway in love with any woman who listens to him.
quotes.author: Brendan Behan

quotes.text: Sometimes you climb out of bed in the morning and you think, I'm not going to make it, but you laugh inside — remembering all the times you've felt that way.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.text: Why did you do all this for me?' he asked. 'I don't deserve it. I've never done anything for you.' 'You have been my friend,' replied Charlotte. 'That in itself is a tremendous thing.
quotes.author: E.B. White,  Charlotte's Web

quotes.text: I used to be really cute. I could send you earlier photos where I'm stunning. But I've gained about twenty pounds over the past two years, and the more weight I've put on, the more success I've had. If you drew a diagram of weight gain and me getting more work, a mathematician would draw some conclusions from that.
quotes.author: Zach Galifianakis

quotes.text: If you start in the pit of despair with these profane, awful things, even a glimmer of hope or awareness is going to occur that's much brighter coming from this dark, awful beginning.

quotes.text: I believe that singing is the key to long life, a good figure, a stable temperament, increased intelligence, new friends, super self-confidence, heightened sexual attractiveness, and a better sense of humor.

quotes.text: There is no such thing as perpetual tranquillity of mind while we live here; because life itself is but motion, and can never be without desire, nor without fear, no more than without sense.
quotes.author: Thomas Hobbes

quotes.text: Whenever we witness art in a building, we are aware of an energy contained by it.
quotes.author: Arthur Erickson

quotes.text: Do you have to have a reason for loving?

quotes.text: Do not let your fire go out, spark by irreplaceable spark in the hopeless swamps of the not-quite, the not-yet, and the not-at-all. Do not let the hero in your soul perish in lonely frustration for the life you deserved and have never been able to reach. The world you desire can be won. It exists.. it is real.. it is possible.. it's yours.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand,  Atlas Shrugged

quotes.text: I want to stand as close to the edge as I can without going over. Out on the edge you see all kinds of things you can't see from the center.

quotes.text: Real success is not on the stage, but off the stage as a human being, and how you get along with your fellow man.

quotes.text: Anytime someone says your God is ugly and you release your God and join their God, there is no hope for your freedom until you once more believe in your own concept of the 'deity.'

quotes.text: I will say that as I get older and calmer and quieter in my own self, the one quality in a woman that I find more and more attractive is kindness. quotes.text: The method of political science is the interpretation of life; its instrument is insight, a nice understanding of subtle, unformulated conditions.

quotes.text: Great thoughts come from the heart.

quotes.text: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.text: You know, you could live a thousand lifetimes and not deserve him.

quotes.text: Success does not mean happiness. Check out any celebrity magazine to look for examples to disabuse you of thinking that being beautiful, successful or rich will make you happy.

quotes.text: My contribution I hope is to get people to eat full-flavored food. If I could come away with that alone, that would be a fantastic accomplishment. I'm also very proud of being a very American chef.

quotes.text: Through humor, you can soften some of the worst blows that life delivers. And once you find laughter, no matter how painful your situation might be, you can survive it.

quotes.text: I never understand when people say, 'School days are the best of your life.' So it's all downhill from 16? How depressing.

quotes.text: Who ever loved that loved not at first sight?
quotes.author: Christopher Marlowe

quotes.text: The best index to a person's character is how he treats people who can't do him any good, and how he treats people who can't fight back.

quotes.text: There is a theory which states that if ever anyone discovers exactly what the Universe is for and why it is here, it will instantly disappear and be replaced by something even more bizarre and inexplicable. There is another theory which states that this has already happened.

quotes.text: When you're struggling with something, look at all the people around you and realize that every single person you see is struggling with something, and to them, it's just as hard as what you're going through.

quotes.text: Where is human nature so weak as in the bookstore?
