quotes.text: My mum was a wonderful mother. She died, aged 80, of Alzheimer's disease, which was dreadful to watch. I remember she said to me: 'Believe in yourself because no one else is going to do it for you.' I'm sure a lot of my success is due to her words of advice.
quotes.author: Bonnie Tyler

quotes.text: One of the things I like best about 'Biggest Loser' is being around people who are trying to make the right choices. When you feel defeated about your weight and your health, like there's no hope, and you still make the choice to fight for it, to make the change happen no matter what people say or think, that's inspiring to me.
quotes.author: Alison Sweeney

quotes.text: A strong sense of humor, a really awesome personality, and maturity is also really important in a boyfriend. I tend to only be attracted to older guys for that reason. I just love guys who have a really strong sense of who they are.

quotes.text: The measure of life is not its duration, but its donation.

quotes.text: Art is man's expression of his joy in labor.
quotes.author: Henry A. Kissinger

quotes.text: Any time not spent on love is wasted.
quotes.author: Torquato Tasso

quotes.text: I think that if I ever have kids, and they are upset, I won't tell them that people are starving in China or anything like that because it wouldn't change the fact that they were upset. And even if somebody else has it much worse, that doesn't really change the fact that you have what you have.

quotes.text: Talent hits a target no one else can hit. Genius hits a target no one else can see.

quotes.text: The fame of heroes owes little to the extent of their conquests and all to the success of the tributes paid to them.

quotes.text: My dad is so unique in what he does. It's not like I'm taking a torch from him and doing his thing. I hope I've carried from him a little bit of a sense of irony, a little bit of a wink.

quotes.text: There comes a time in every man's life, and I've had plenty of them.

quotes.text: The history of art is the history of revivals.

quotes.text: Being in love is the only transcendent experience.
quotes.author: Armistead Maupin

quotes.text: All little girls should be told they are pretty, even if they aren't.

quotes.text: If your goal is to make money, becoming an entrepreneur is a sucker's bet. Sure, some entrepreneurs make a lot of money, but if you calculate the amount of stress-inducing work and time it takes and multiply that by the low likelihood of success and eventual payoff, it is not a great way to get rich.

quotes.text: I hope to be the go-to person on international trade and industry. I think no one before me or after me will ever have so much knowledge about America's ports.

quotes.text: Don't wish me happiness - I don't expect to be happy it's gotten beyond that, somehow. Wish me courage and strength and a sense of humor - I will need them all.

quotes.text: I should have no objection to go over the same life from its beginning to the end: requesting only the advantage authors have, of correcting in a second edition the faults of the first.

quotes.text: The beauty one can find in art is one of the pitifully few real and lasting products of human endeavor.

quotes.text: Think of all the beauty still left around you and be happy.

quotes.text: Nothing that’s worthwhile is ever easy. Remember that.

quotes.text: The heart was made to be broken.

quotes.text: Here's all you have to know about men and women: women are crazy, men are stupid. And the main reason women are crazy is that men are stupid.

quotes.text: I generally avoid temptation unless I can't resist it.

quotes.text: On 'Sufferer,' I'm talking about the younger generation that has no other option for success than to find a gun somewhere. I try to appeal to them: 'I know you a sufferer, but it doesn't mean that you can't or shouldn't expect any better.' It's a lot different than from what I usually say, like, 'Get busy, shake that thing.'
quotes.author: Sean Paul

quotes.text: I hope I'm in a position to make stuff that I really want to make as opposed to stuff that I just have to make for money reasons, or to sustain a certain marquee value.

quotes.text: One of the things that binds us as a family is a shared sense of humor.

quotes.text: I feel like unforgiveness, bitterness and resentment, it blocks the flows of God's blessings in life.
quotes.author: Ja Rule

quotes.text: I don't believe in art. I believe in artists.

quotes.text: I don't see success as the goal. Obedience is the goal.

quotes.author: Maeve Binchy

quotes.text: In the household in which I was raised, the themes were pretty simple. 'Work hard. Don't quit. Be appreciative, be thankful, be grateful, be respectful. Also, never whine, never complain. And always, for crying out loud, keep a sense of humor.'

quotes.text: Resentments and grudges are two of the main culprits that perpetuate cycles of self-abuse and victimhood. Stowed away inside you like parasites, they deplete you of your God-given life force and separate you from your inherent worth, your joy, and the love in your heart.

quotes.text: My love of fine art increased - the more of it I saw, the more of it I wanted to see.
quotes.author: J. Paul Getty

quotes.text: Love seeks one thing only: the good of the one loved. It leaves all the other secondary effects to take care of themselves. Love, therefore, is its own reward.

quotes.text: If a cluttered desk is a sign of a cluttered mind, of what, then, is an empty desk a sign?

quotes.text: Learning to celebrate success is a key component of learning how to win in the market.

quotes.text: I love being able to sing for my job. I am blessed beyond words and I hope my fans can feel that while I'm on stage!

quotes.text: Art depends on luck and talent.

quotes.text: I don't go looking for trouble. Trouble usually finds me.

quotes.text: Murals in restaurants are on a par with the food in museums.

quotes.text: It's not true that I had nothing on. I had the radio on.

quotes.text: It's not about market share. If you have a successful company, you will get your market share. But to get a successful company, what do you have to have? The same metrics of success that your customer does.

quotes.text: I think of my peace paintings as one long poem, with each painting being a single stanza.

quotes.text: The richest love is that which submits to the arbitration of time.
quotes.author: Lawrence Durrell

quotes.text: Didn't Lionel Richie just make a country album? No one is giving him a hard time... and God bless him - I love Lionel and should be able to do what he wants to do, like Madonna should, too. Both are having success and I applaud them. If you don't like it, don't buy it. The ageism criticism is getting old.
quotes.author: Guy Oseary

quotes.text: The chemistry of love is something which is extremely extremely unbelievable. This is something we have planned for more than two years, so I hope that we are going to start in the beginning of next year.
quotes.author: Lennart Nilsson

quotes.text: If it gets laughs, it's funny.
quotes.author: Rachel Dratch

quotes.text: The consuming desire of most human beings is deliberately to plant their whole life in the hands of some other person. I would describe this method of searching for happiness as immature. Development of character consists solely in moving toward self-sufficiency.

quotes.text: The Japanese have a wonderful sense of design and a refinement in their art. They try to produce beautiful paintings with the minimum number of strokes.

quotes.text: If you expect nothing from somebody you are never disappointed.

quotes.text: Everyone else trains just as hard as well and that there really is no such a thing as overnight success.
quotes.author: Julie Benz

quotes.text: Everyone wants clean air and clean water, but my hope is that we will not regulate it to the point where we drive businesses and industries out of this country, to the point where entrepreneurs cannot start or expand their businesses because they simply can't afford to do so.

quotes.text: Humor distorts nothing, and only false gods are laughed off their earthly pedestals.
quotes.author: Agnes Repplier

quotes.text: To overcome poverty and the flaws of the economic crisis in our society, we need to envision our social life. We have to free our mind, imagine what has never happened before and write social fiction. We need to imagine things to make them happen. If you don't imagine, it will never happen.
quotes.author: Muhammad Yunus

quotes.text: Art is an invention of aesthetics, which in turn is an invention of philosophers... What we call art is a game.

quotes.text: It's useless to hold a person to anything he says while he's in love, drunk, or running for office.

quotes.text: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
quotes.author: Colin R. Davis

quotes.text: I have always thought of poems as stepping stones in one's own sense of oneself. Every now and again, you write a poem that gives you self-respect and steadies your going a little bit farther out in the stream. At the same time, you have to conjure the next stepping stone because the stream, we hope, keeps flowing.
quotes.author: Seamus Heaney

quotes.text: I think God has a tremendous sense of humor.
quotes.author: Rainn Wilson

quotes.text: A life without a lonely place, that is, without a quiet center, becomes destructive.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.text: The philistine provides the best definition of art. Anything that makes him rage is first class.
quotes.author: Louis Dudek

quotes.text: Falling in love consists merely in uncorking the imagination and bottling the common sense.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.text: I did not attend his funeral, but I sent a nice letter saying I approved of it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: What is a friend? A single soul dwelling in two bodies.

quotes.text: There's a spectrum of those moments of connection and the moments we fail to connect, going from super-large successes to failures. Success would be love, I guess, and failure could still be love, but the bad side; and loss.

quotes.author: John Ciardi

quotes.text: I've learned to have a sense of humor about myself. Lord knows everyone else does!

quotes.text: My life really began when I married my husband.

quotes.text: Art is subject to arbitrary fashion.

quotes.text: Only love interests me, and I am only in contact with things that revolve around love.
quotes.author: Marc Chagall

quotes.text: He's more myself than I am. Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.

quotes.text: People aren't either wicked or noble. They're like chef's salads, with good things and bad things chopped and mixed together in a vinaigrette of confusion and conflict.

quotes.text: I feel as though my life is bathed in golden sunlight. And the really wonderful thing is that I know it.

quotes.text: The world is not comprehensible, but it is embraceable: through the embracing of one of its beings.

quotes.text: I can't imagine a man really enjoying a book and reading it only once.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: Happy Days was about a family... although the show was shot in the 70s, it was about a family in the 50s. I realized that kids were watching their parents grow up and the parents were watching themselves grow up. That was the key to the success of our show.
quotes.author: Tom Bosley

quotes.text: I hope I'm wrong, but I am afraid that Iraq is going to turn out to be the greatest disaster in American foreign policy - worse than Vietnam, not in the number who died, but in terms of its unintended consequences and its reverberation throughout the region.
quotes.author: Madeleine Albright

quotes.text: Comedy, we may say, is society protecting itself - with a smile.
quotes.author: J. B. Priestley

quotes.text: Throughout my life, my mom has been the person that I've always looked up to.
quotes.author: Mike Krzyzewski

quotes.text: When artists make art, they shouldn't question whether it is permissible to do one thing or another.
quotes.author: Sol LeWitt

quotes.text: The giving of love is an education in itself.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Waiting is painful. Forgetting is painful. But not knowing which to do is the worst kind of suffering.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho,  By the River Piedra I Sat Down and Wept

quotes.text: I have found the paradox, that if you love until it hurts, there can be no more hurt, only more love.
quotes.author: Daphne Rae,  Love Until It Hurts

quotes.text: The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.text: If you don't work hard, then you aren't going to have the success that you want. But if you work hard and dig in, then you are going to have the success that you want.

quotes.text: We hope President Obama will now respect the will of the people, change course, and commit to making the changes they are demanding. To the extent he is willing to do this, we are ready to work with him.
quotes.author: John Boehner

quotes.text: A joke's a very serious thing.
quotes.author: Charles Churchill

quotes.text: I spend several days at a time without enough sleep. At first, normal activities become annoying. When you are too tired to eat, you really need some sleep. A few days later, things become strange. Loud noises become louder and more startling, familiar sounds become unfamiliar, and life reinvents itself as a surrealist dream.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.text: The artist belongs to his work, not the work to the artist.
quotes.author: Novalis

quotes.text: The more one judges, the less one loves.
quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

quotes.text: Courage is what it takes to stand up and speak; courage is also what it takes to sit down and listen.
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.text: God created war so that Americans would learn geography.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it.

quotes.text: What we did ten years ago with the Playstation was a phenomenal success story for the company. That product had a ten year life cycle, which has never been done in this industry.
quotes.author: Ian Jackson

quotes.text: Certain it is that a great responsibility rests upon the statesmen of all nations, not only to fulfill the promises for reduction in armaments, but to maintain the confidence of the people of the world in the hope of an enduring peace.

quotes.text: My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive; and to do so with some passion, some compassion, some humor, and some style.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Here's what I tell anybody and this is what I believe. The greatest gift we have is the gift of life. We understand that. That comes from our Creator. We're given a body. Now you may not like it, but you can maximize that body the best it can be maximized.
quotes.author: Mike Ditka

quotes.text: Art is magic delivered from the lie of being truth.
quotes.author: Theodor Adorno

quotes.text: The only abnormality is the incapacity to love.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.text: Without pain, how could we know joy?' This is an old argument in the field of thinking about suffering and its stupidity and lack of sophistication could be plumbed for centuries but suffice it to say that the existence of broccoli does not, in any way, affect the taste of chocolate.
quotes.author: John Green,  The Fault in Our Stars

quotes.text: The mind is its own place, and in itself can make a heaven of hell, a hell of heaven..
quotes.author: John Milton,  Paradise Lost

quotes.text: Sometimes success will get in the way of maturity - at least temporarily.
quotes.author: Ricky Williams

quotes.text: I feel like if you enjoyed the 119 hours that precede the finale of 'Lost,' is that whole experience ruined by the fact that you might not agree with everything that we did in the finale? I would hope not! I would hope that you would appreciate the fact that you were entertained for 119 hours even if you didn't love the finale.
quotes.author: Carlton Cuse

quotes.text: Your attitude is like a box of crayons that color your world. Constantly color your picture gray, and your picture will always be bleak. Try adding some bright colors to the picture by including humor, and your picture begins to lighten up.

quotes.text: Be thou the rainbow in the storms of life. The evening beam that smiles the clouds away, and tints tomorrow with prophetic ray.

quotes.text: All great art is born of the metropolis.

quotes.text: Love is the greatest refreshment in life.

quotes.text: If you're reading this...Congratulations, you're alive.If that's not something to smile about,then I don't know what is.
quotes.author: Chad Sugg,  Monsters Under Your Head

quotes.text: You don't love someone for their looks, or their clothes, or for their fancy car, but because they sing a song only you can hear.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: Out beyond ideas of wrongdoing and rightdoing there is a field.I'll meet you there.When the soul lies down in that grassthe world is too full to talk about.

quotes.text: I would love to make my music and be completely anonymous, but that doesn't work. You can't have success and be faceless.

quotes.text: The present is the ever moving shadow that divides yesterday from tomorrow. In that lies hope.

quotes.text: Smiling is definitely one of the best beauty remedies. If you have a good sense of humor and a good approach to life, that's beautiful.

quotes.text: The meaning of life is contained in every single expression of life. It is present in the infinity of forms and phenomena that exist in all of creation.
quotes.author: Michael Jackson

quotes.text: In an artwork you're always looking for artistic decisions, so an ashtray is perfect. An ashtray has got life and death.

quotes.text: Absence - that common cure of love.

quotes.text: Success comes to you with luck and a lot of hard work, but it doesn't give you the right to be any better than anybody else.

quotes.text: Together we can make a world where cancer no longer means living with fear, without hope, or worse.

quotes.text: I love a man with a great sense of humor and who is intelligent - a man who has a great smile. He has to make me laugh. I like a man who is very ambitious and driven and who has a good heart and makes me feel safe. I like a man who is very strong and independent and confident - that is very sexy - but at the same time, he's very kind to people.
quotes.author: Nicole Scherzinger

quotes.text: Life is all about having a good time.

quotes.text: Love is the power to see similarity in the dissimilar.

quotes.text: We delight in the beauty of the butterfly, but rarely admit the changes it has gone through to achieve that beauty.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Above all, don't lie to yourself. The man who lies to himself and listens to his own lie comes to a point that he cannot distinguish the truth within him, or around him, and so loses all respect for himself and for others. And having no respect he ceases to love.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky,  The Brothers Karamazov

quotes.text: With success came an ever-growing burden of responsibility. I lived with a near-constant low-level anxiety that I would make a mistake that would not only threaten my career, but also my brothers' - not to mention the livelihoods of many people who work with us or for us.

quotes.text: I am a beneficiary of the American people's generosity, and I hope we can have comprehensive immigration legislation that allows this country to continue to be enriched by those who were not born here.
quotes.author: Madeleine Albright

quotes.text: I have never believed much in luck, and my sense of humor has tended to walk on the dark side.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.text: Live life for the moment because everything else is uncertain!
quotes.author: Louis Tomlinson

quotes.text: Procrastination is the art of keeping up with yesterday.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.text: People who throw kisses are hopelessly lazy.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.text: Happiness is a warm puppy.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.text: I wanted you to see what real courage is, instead of getting the idea that courage is a man with a gun in his hand. It's when you know you're licked before you begin, but you begin anyway and see it through no matter what.- Atticus Finch
quotes.author: Harper Lee,  To Kill a Mockingbird

quotes.text: Learning to appreciate those things that aren't related to success has proved the biggest lesson.
quotes.author: Chet Faker

quotes.text: When it's said and done, the one thing I want to leave on this earth is hope. I have felt hopelessness, and it's a terrible feeling. Hopelessness will destroy you. I want to bring hope to other people.

quotes.text: I don't think that I could have survived in my family without a naughty sense of humor; yeah, absolutely. I think my brother and I both get our senses of humor from our parents. I mean, my mother was absolutely hilarious and foul. She had the most ridiculously off color sense of humor, so that was sort of what we grew up with.
quotes.author: Rachael MacFarlane

quotes.text: I wanted to be an independent woman, a woman who could pay for her bills, a woman who could run her own life - and I became that woman.
quotes.author: Diane von Furstenberg

quotes.text: Sometimes being a friend means mastering the art of timing. There is a time for silence. A time to let go and allow people to hurl themselves into their own destiny. And a time to prepare to pick up the pieces when it's all over.

quotes.text: Gravitation is not responsible for people falling in love.

quotes.text: It is hard enough to remember my opinions, without also remembering my reasons for them!

quotes.text: Accept who you are. Unless you're a serial killer.

quotes.text: America's popular heroes have seldom been its great thinkers, and even less its scientists. The success of TV's 'Big Bang Theory,' which seems to give the lie to this claim, is more the exception that proves the rule.

quotes.text: Beauty products always cheer me up and give me hope. If it makes you feel pretty, why not?

quotes.text: If we went by the world's definition of who I'm supposed to be because I look weird... 'Well, surely, this guy can't have a productive life, surely, he doesn't have a sense of humor. quotes.text: The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.text: All my life, my heart has yearned for a thing I cannot name.
quotes.author: Andre Breton

quotes.text: One, remember to look up at the stars and not down at your feet. Two, never give up work. Work gives you meaning and purpose and life is empty without it. Three, if you are lucky enough to find love, remember it is there and don't throw it away.

quotes.text: Eleanor was right. She never looked nice. She looked like art, and art wasn't supposed to look nice; it was supposed to make you feel something.

quotes.text: If you're looking for sympathy you'll find it between shit and syphilis in the dictionary.

quotes.text: I don't know the question, but sex is definitely the answer.

quotes.text: I think if I've learned anything about friendship, it's to hang in, stay connected, fight for them, and let them fight for you. quotes.author: Jon Katz

quotes.text: I didn't know how to deal with success. If there was a Rock Star 101, I would have liked to take it. It might have helped me.

quotes.text: I hope I'm not a tourist attraction - I'm sure that they come here really because St. Andrews is just amazing, a beautiful place.

quotes.text: So once I thought of the villain with a sense of humor, I began to think of a name and the name "the Joker" immediately came to mind. There was the association with the Joker in the deck of cards, and I probably yelled literally, 'Eureka!' because I knew I had the name and the image at the same time.

quotes.text: Time is the coin of your life. It is the only coin you have, and only you can determine how it will be spent. Be careful lest you let other people spend it for you.

quotes.text: Writing your own jokes, you just kind of keep working on something until you think it might work, and then you try it out and hope for the best.

quotes.text: When humor works, it works because it's clarifying what people already feel. It has to come from someplace real.

quotes.text: My greatest beauty secret is being happy with myself. I don't use special creams or treatments - I'll use a little bit of everything. It's a mistake to think you are what you put on yourself. I believe that a lot of how you look is to do with how you feel about yourself and your life. Happiness is the greatest beauty secret.

quotes.text: The human foot is a masterpiece of engineering and a work of art.

quotes.text: Not my daughter, you bitch!

quotes.text: Success is full of promise till one gets it, and then it seems like a nest from which the bird has flown.

quotes.author: Bryce Harper

quotes.text: I want someone who can keep me on my toes, has a good sense of humor and a good heart.

quotes.text: I'm direct, I'm unpretentious and I'm pretty dogged, and I hope I've got a capacity to laugh at myself and not take myself too seriously.

quotes.text: There are so many things to talk about between black people, Hispanic people, white people, gay people, men, women, it's all based on fear. quotes.author: Marlon Wayans

quotes.text: Isn't life a series of images that change as they repeat themselves?

quotes.text: Only do what your heart tells you.

quotes.text: And the day came when the risk to remain tight in a bud was more painful than the risk it took to blossom.

quotes.text: Suspense is very important. Even though this is humor and they're short stories, that theory of building suspense is still there.

quotes.text: When you realize who the good people are in your life, you're so lucky.

quotes.text: Originality is the fine art of remembering what you hear but forgetting where you heard it.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.text: Love is when you meet someone who tells you something new about yourself.

quotes.text: The most absurd and reckless aspirations have sometimes led to extraordinary success.

quotes.text: I testify that inspiration can be the spring for every person's hope, guidance, and strength. It is one of the magnified treasures of life. It involves coming to the infinite knowledge of God.

quotes.text: You learn to speak by speaking, to study by studying, to run by running, to work by working; in just the same way, you learn to love by loving.

quotes.text: So, please, oh please, we beg, we pray, go throw your TV set away, and in its place you can install, a lovely bookcase on the wall.
quotes.author: Roald Dahl

quotes.text: Either write something worth reading or do something worth writing.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: There comes a time when the world gets quiet and the only thing left is your own heart. So you'd better learn the sound of it. Otherwise you'll never understand what it's saying.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen,  Just Listen

quotes.text: Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.

quotes.text: Your chances of success in any undertaking can always be measured by your belief in yourself.

quotes.text: Hope is like a harebell trembling from its birth.

quotes.text: Art cannot result from sophisticated, frivolous, or superficial effects.

quotes.text: Books may well be the only true magic.

quotes.text: It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: If we are to judge of love by its consequences, it more nearly resembles hatred than friendship.
quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.text: I don't want to wake up and be bored. That's probably my greatest fear is to have nothing to do. What better job is there than to play quarterback for an NFL team, and certainly one that I've been on for a long time and had success with? I don't plan on giving it up any time soon.

quotes.text: Running fills a need so we make fewer demands on others. Running reveals the roots of negative thinking, so the weeds can be pulled. Running reconnects the soul to the source, inspiring hope and creativity.

quotes.text: Transparency, honesty, kindness, good stewardship, even humor, work in businesses at all times.
quotes.author: John Gerzema

quotes.text: Here is the tragedy: when you are the victim of depression, not only do you feel utterly helpless and abandoned by the world, you also know that very few people can understand, or even begin to believe, that life can be this painful. There is nothing I can think of that is quite as isolating as this.
quotes.author: Giles Andreae

quotes.text: The modern work of art, as I have said, is a symbol.
quotes.author: Herbert Read

quotes.text: Love looks through a telescope; envy, through a microscope.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.text: He who controls the past controls the future. He who controls the present controls the past.
quotes.author: George Orwell,  1984

quotes.text: Being crazy isn't enough.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: Love and esteem are the first principles of friendship; it is always imperfect if either of these two are wanting.
quotes.author: Eustace Budgell

quotes.text: Success is attaining your dream while helping others to benefit from that dream materializing.
quotes.author: Sugar Ray Leonard

quotes.text: I love Madrid. I am happy to be here. I have been here three years and hope to be here longer. But I am proud of where I come from and never forget the people I grew up with.
quotes.author: Zinedine Zidane

quotes.author: Tom DeLonge

quotes.text: The resistance that you fight physically in the gym and the resistance that you fight in life can only build a strong character.

quotes.text: Art will never be able to exist without nature.
quotes.author: Pierre Bonnard

quotes.text: We love because it's the only true adventure.
quotes.author: Nikki Giovanni

quotes.text: Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living, it's a way of looking at life through the wrong end of a telescope.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: The best time to frame an answer to the letters of a friend, is the moment you receive them. Then the warmth of friendship, and the intelligence received, most forcibly cooperate.
quotes.author: William Shenstone

quotes.text: I don't want to be married to someone who feels inferior to my success or because I make more money than he does.
quotes.author: Grace Kelly

quotes.text: But maybe music was not intended to satisfy the curious definiteness of man. Maybe it is better to hope that music may always be transcendental language in the most extravagant sense.
quotes.author: Charles Ives

quotes.text: Ontologically, chocolate raises profoundly disturbing questions: Does not chocolate offer natural revelation of the goodness of the Creator just as chilies disclose a divine sense of humor? Is the human born with an innate longing for chocolate? Does the notion of chocolate preclude the concept of free will?
quotes.author: David Augsburger

quotes.text: Animation is not the art of drawings that move but the art of movements that are drawn.
quotes.author: Norman McLaren

quotes.text: Love will draw an elephant through a key-hole.
quotes.author: Samuel Richardson

quotes.text: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.text: You gain strength, courage and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face. You are able to say to yourself, 'I have lived through this horror. I can take the next thing that comes along.' You must do the thing you think you cannot do.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt,  You Learn by Living: Eleven Keys for a More Fulfilling Life

quotes.text: Very different from eros is philia, a serene love much more akin to friendship, with its reciprocal kindnesses. You love each other for the happy experiences and pleasures you share.
quotes.author: Francois Lelord

quotes.text: Success comes from taking the initiative and following up... persisting... eloquently expressing the depth of your love. What simple action could you take today to produce a new momentum toward success in your life?
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Your life has to consist of more than 'Black people should unite.' You hope they do, but not twenty-four hours a day.
quotes.author: Gil Scott-Heron

quotes.text: I love the Swedish people for their detective novels, their archipelago, their sense of humor, their carbonated vodka, and most especially, for their wonderful hospitality.
quotes.author: Michael Levitt

quotes.text: Your life will be no better than the plans you make and the action you take. You are the architect and builder of your own life, fortune, destiny.
quotes.author: Alfred A. Montapert

quotes.text: I enjoy going out by myself... always have, always will. I don't have security guards, and, for the most part, I enjoy meeting new people. I see myself as a regular guy who likes playing video games with his nieces and nephews and poker with his family. I don't have an art collection or take exotic vacations. I enjoy being at home.
quotes.author: Vince Vaughn

quotes.text: Self-love is the source of all our other loves.
quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

quotes.text: Fantasy is hardly an escape from reality. It's a way of understanding it.
quotes.author: Lloyd Alexander

quotes.text: There are a lot of musicians I've met on Twitter where it was like, 'Hey, I like your music' - and then I ended up meeting them and it turned into a friendship.
quotes.author: Grimes

quotes.text: If I wasn't even famous or had any success, I would still wake up and put tons of make-up on, and put on a cool outfit. That's always been who I've been my whole life, so that's never gonna change. I love fashion. I love getting dressed up. I love Halloween, too.

quotes.text: You can't make people change, but the organizers of WorldFest hope that people consider being vegetarian for both moral and health reasons.
quotes.author: Grace Slick

quotes.text: Sometimes the only way to deal with horrific things in life is through a dark sense of humor.
quotes.author: Margaret Cho

quotes.text: I realize that humor isn't for everyone. It's only for people who want to have fun, enjoy life, and feel alive.
quotes.author: Anne Wilson Schaef

quotes.text: Architecture is a visual art, and the buildings speak for themselves.
quotes.author: Julia Morgan

quotes.text: Love is love's reward.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.text: They love their hair because they're not smart enough to love something more interesting.
quotes.author: John Green,  Looking for Alaska

quotes.text: It is impossible to preserve my friendship with people who are allegedly leaders when they are attacking their own people, shooting at them, using tanks and other forms of heavy weaponry.

quotes.text: I don't think ethical people deal with intimidation as a method to achieve success. Undermining someone's self-esteem isn't a method to achieve success.
quotes.author: Dominique Moceanu

quotes.text: I was the guy who was friends with everybody. Yes, I had my core group of friends, but I wasn't part of a clique that excluded people. I hope they thought I was a nice guy. I tried to be just friendly and outgoing. I was class president. I'm supposed to run my class reunion in 2013.
quotes.author: Austin Stowell

quotes.text: Confidence and a good sense of humor can usually win a chick over.
quotes.author: Danny McBride

quotes.text: Wherever you are, be there totally. If you find your here and now intolerable and it makes you unhappy, you have three options: remove yourself from the situation, change it, or accept it totally. If you want to take responsibility for your life, you must choose one of those three options, and you must choose now. Then accept the consequences.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.text: I refuse to confide and don't like it when people write about art.
quotes.author: Balthus

quotes.text: Love has a tide!
quotes.author: Helen Hunt Jackson

quotes.text: Laughter is timeless. Imagination has no age. And dreams are forever.
quotes.author: Walt Disney Company

quotes.text: He never went out without a book under his arm, and he often came back with two.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo,  Les Misérables

quotes.text: Experience is merely the name men gave to their mistakes.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde,  The Picture of Dorian Gray

quotes.text: Monsters are real, and ghosts are real too. They live inside us, and sometimes, they win.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.text: what matters most is how well you walk through the fire
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.text: I'm friends with Taylor Swift, and I am tired of people asking me questions about our friendship. When I post a picture of us on Instagram, I'm posting a picture of me and my friend.
quotes.author: Sarah Hyland

quotes.text: There are people who can achieve huge success in life, while adding a bit of fun and a splash of colour to this increasingly grey world.
quotes.author: Peter James

quotes.text: I would say just start writing. You've got to write every day. Copy someone that you like if you think that perhaps could become your sound, too. I did that with Hemingway, and I thought I was writing just like Hemingway. Then all of a sudden it occurred to me - he didn't have a sense of humor. I don't know anything he's written that's funny.
quotes.author: Elmore Leonard

quotes.text: I've known my best friend since I was a baby, and I don't know what I would do without her. She is always straight with me and can make me laugh hysterically. Everyone should have someone like that in their life.
quotes.author: Jasmine Guinness

quotes.text: I just really love being in my pajamas.
quotes.author: Rachel Bilson

quotes.text: You never have to change anything you got up in the middle of the night to write.
quotes.author: Saul Bellow

quotes.text: And by the way, everything in life is writable about if you have the outgoing guts to do it, and the imagination to improvise. The worst enemy to creativity is self-doubt.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath,  The Unabridged Journals of Sylvia Plath

quotes.text: When I was working on my first novel, 'The Quilter's Apprentice,' I knew I wanted to write about friendship, especially women's friendship and how women use friendship to sustain themselves and nurture each other.
quotes.author: Jennifer Chiaverini

quotes.text: Personality is the most important thing to an actress's success.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.text: My message to you all is of hope, courage and confidence. Let us mobilize all our resources in a systematic and organized way and tackle the grave issues that confront us with grim determination and discipline worthy of a great nation.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

quotes.text: Although Kurt Vonnegut may not be considered a humor writer, 'Breakfast of Champions' is one of the funniest books I've ever read.
quotes.author: Justin Halpern

quotes.text: Festivals are fun for kids, fun for parents and offer a welcome break from the stresses of the nuclear family. The sheer quantities of people make life easier: loads of adults for the adults to talk to and loads of kids for the kids to play with.
quotes.author: Tom Hodgkinson

quotes.text: I would never know how good I was if I didn't have Bob Arum. Bob Arum is white, Jewish; He was working for prosecutor's office. I'm black, an ex-convict, ex-number runner. Who would be most likely to succeed? It would be Bob 100-1. Yet I beat Bob on everything we ever done, with love.
quotes.author: Don King

quotes.text: If you can't fly then run, if you can't run then walk, if you can't walk then crawl, but whatever you do you have to keep moving forward.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.text: I don't mind living in a man's world, as long as I can be a woman in it.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe,  Marilyn

quotes.text: Above all, be the heroine of your life, not the victim.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.text: I would have told him that I appreciated his friendship through the years and that I had learned a lot from him. I really loved Frank like you do a brother.
quotes.author: Jimmy Carl Black

quotes.text: The success I have achieved in bodybuilding, motion pictures, and business would not have been possible without the generosity of the American people and the freedom here to pursue your dreams.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: Darkness comes. In the middle of it, the future looks blank. The temptation to quit is huge. Don't. You are in good company... You will argue with yourself that there is no way forward. But with God, nothing is impossible. He has more ropes and ladders and tunnels out of pits than you can conceive. Wait. Pray without ceasing. Hope.
quotes.author: John Piper

quotes.text: Everybody's got a different sense of humor. It's just different styles.
quotes.author: Colin Quinn

quotes.text: True wisdom comes to each of us when we realize how little we understand about life, ourselves, and the world around us.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: The art of leadership is saying no, not saying yes. It is very easy to say yes.
quotes.author: Tony Blair

quotes.text: People's love of sweets and guilty feelings about overindulgence are pretty universal.
quotes.author: Will Cotton

quotes.text: Life is a disease: sexually transmitted, and invariably fatal.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.text: Time flies like an arrow; fruit flies like a banana.
quotes.author: Anthony G. Oettinger

quotes.text: You cannot protect yourself from sadness without protecting yourself from happiness.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.text: We want 'Doll & Em' to be something we're proud of. We'd love to do another series, but it's not the be-all and end-all. Our friendship is the be-all and end-all.
quotes.author: Dolly Wells

quotes.text: Success is more difficult to handle than failure.
quotes.author: Ravi Zacharias

quotes.text: My favorite fruit is grapes. Because with grapes, you always get another chance. 'Cause, you know, if you have a crappy apple or a peach, you're stuck with that crappy piece of fruit. But if you have a crappy grape, no problem - just move on to the next. 'Grapes: The Fruit of Hope.'
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.text: I'm not sure. But that bless-his/her-heart kind of melancholic humor is among my favorite things in the world. I guess it exposes a kind of humanity - or that's the hope, at least - a kind of grudging respect for human frailty. Unless it's actually kicking human frailty while it's down - I'm not sure.
quotes.author: David Rakoff

quotes.text: When you can do the common things of life in an uncommon way, you will command the attention of the world.
quotes.author: George Washington Carver

quotes.text: Only in art will the lion lie down with the lamb, and the rose grow without thorn.
quotes.author: Martin Amis

quotes.text: I love the smell of juice boxes in the morning.
quotes.author: Robert Duvall

quotes.text: Many people, myself among them, feel better at the mere sight of a book.
quotes.author: Jane Smiley,  Thirteen Ways of Looking at the Novel

quotes.text: Don't ever tell anybody anything. If you do, you start missing everybody.
quotes.author: J.D. Salinger,  The Catcher in the Rye

quotes.text: Kiss me, and you will see how important I am.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath,  The Unabridged Journals of Sylvia Plath

quotes.text: Friendship often ends in love; but love in friendship - never.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.text: The more defects a man may have, the older he is, the less lovable, the more resounding his success.
quotes.author: Marquis de Sade

quotes.text: There are no greater treasures than the highest human qualities such as compassion, courage and hope. Not even tragic accident or disaster can destroy such treasures of the heart.
quotes.author: Daisaku Ikeda

quotes.text: The thing that makes 'Dirty Jobs' different is that it's one of the few shows that portrays work in a way that doesn't highlight the drudgery. Instead, it highlights the humor.
quotes.author: Mike Rowe

quotes.text: Jesus lived a life that was full of joy and contradictions and fights, you know? If they were to paint a picture of Jesus without contradictions, the gospels would be fake, but the contradictions are a sign of authenticity.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.text: Were I called on to define, very briefly, the term Art, I should call it 'the reproduction of what the Senses perceive in Nature through the veil of the soul.' The mere imitation, however accurate, of what is in Nature, entitles no man to the sacred name of 'Artist.'
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.text: I love the line of Flaubert about observing things very intensely. I think our duty as writers begins not with our own feelings, but with the powers of observing.
quotes.author: Mary Oliver

quotes.text: Remember: the time you feel lonely is the time you most need to be by yourself. Life's cruelest irony.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland,  Shampoo Planet

quotes.text: They say a person needs just three things to be truly happy in this world: someone to love, something to do, and something to hope for.
quotes.author: Tom Bodett

quotes.text: What I want is to be needed. What I need is to be indispensable to somebody. Who I need is somebody that will eat up all my free time, my ego, my attention. Somebody addicted to me. A mutual addiction.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Choke

quotes.text: Everyone should be able to do one card trick, tell two jokes, and recite three poems, in case they are ever trapped in an elevator.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket,  Horseradish

quotes.text: Some tourists think Amsterdam is a city of sin, but in truth it is a city of freedom. And in freedom, most people find sin.
quotes.author: John Green,  The Fault in Our Stars

quotes.text: On the relationship side, if you teach people to respond actively and constructively when someone they care about has a victory, it increases love and friendship and decreases the probability of depression.
quotes.author: Martin Seligman

quotes.text: Honesty is the most single most important factor having a direct bearing on the final success of an individual, corporation, or product.
quotes.author: Ed McMahon

quotes.text: I usually give a book 40 pages. If it doesn't grab me by then, adios. With young adult books, you can usually tell by Page 4 if it's worth the time. The author establishes the conflict early, sometimes in the first sentence. The themes of hope, family, friendship and overcoming hardship appeal to most everyone.
quotes.author: Regina Brett

quotes.text: We are not actually in charge of life, yet behave as if we are the masters of our own destiny. The realization of this fact is quite a hard one. The ridiculousness of our pomposity and presumption can only result in anger or humor.
quotes.author: Billy Childish

quotes.text: A library is not a luxury but one of the necessities of life.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.text: To injure an opponent is to injure yourself. To control aggression without inflicting injury is the Art of Peace.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.text: On my tombstone, I want written: 'He never did 'Love Boat!'
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.text: Life is a book and there are a thousand pages I have not yet read.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare,  Clockwork Princess

quotes.text: My daddy said, that the first time you fall in love, it changes you forever and no matter how hard you try, that feeling just never goes away.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Notebook

quotes.text: Think before you speak. Read before you think.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz,  The Fran Lebowitz Reader

quotes.text: One look at an email can rob you of 15 minutes of focus. One call on your cell phone, one tweet, one instant message can destroy your schedule, forcing you to move meetings, or blow off really important things, like love, and friendship.

quotes.text: People seldom see the halting and painful steps by which the most insignificant success is achieved.
quotes.author: Anne Sullivan

quotes.text: I hope I can compete in one or two Olympics in my career. Of course I would like to win a medal, but just being there would be awesome.
quotes.author: Patrick Chan

quotes.text: I think bands, when they're on the road, they keep their sanity by developing an internal sense of humor.
quotes.author: Ric Ocasek

quotes.text: I think what is interesting in life is all the cracks and all the flaws and all the moments that are not perfect.
quotes.author: Clemence Poesy

quotes.text: Those who gave thee a body, furnished it with weakness; but He who gave thee Soul, armed thee with resolution. Employ it, and thou art wise; be wise and thou art happy.

quotes.text: I was single for a really long time, then I realized I had abandonment issues. Then I found love online.
quotes.author: Patti Stanger

quotes.text: Why fit in when you were born to stand out?
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: The nicest thing for me is sleep, then at least I can dream.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: It may happen sometimes that a long debate becomes the cause of a longer friendship. Commonly, those who dispute with one another at last agree.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.text: Women attribute their success to working hard, luck, and help from other people. Men will attribute that - whatever success they have, that same success - to their own core skills.
quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.text: If people are good only because they fear punishment, and hope for reward, then we are a sorry lot indeed.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Rock Hudson wasn't my type. He's a great guy and had a great sense of humor.
quotes.author: Tab Hunter

quotes.text: Not to sound bad, but some girls are dumb. It's because they spend so much of their life trying to have the right look. On the other hand, some girls are just really smart. There are girls you can have conversations with that are healthy conversations. You can argue real life issues and solve problems together. That is what makes a woman sexy.
quotes.author: Wale

quotes.text: Be true to yourself. Make each day a masterpiece. Help others. Drink deeply from good books. Make friendship a fine art. Build a shelter against a rainy day.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: I love to be comfortable, but I also love to play up the glamour.
quotes.author: Jessica Simpson

quotes.text: I have great faith in fools - self-confidence my friends will call it.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe,  Marginalia

quotes.text: There are worse crimes than burning books. One of them is not reading them.
quotes.author: Joseph Brodsky

quotes.text: All happy families are alike; each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy,  Anna Karenina

quotes.text: …because nerds like us are allowed to be unironically enthusiastic about stuff… Nerds are allowed to love stuff, like jump-up-and-down-in-the-chair-can’t-control-yourself love it. Hank, when people call people nerds, mostly what they’re saying is ‘you like stuff.’ Which is just not a good insult at all. Like, ‘you are too enthusiastic about the miracle of human consciousness’.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.text: In a time of deceit telling the truth is a revolutionary act.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.text: The strong bond of friendship is not always a balanced equation; friendship is not always about giving and taking in equal shares. Instead, friendship is grounded in a feeling that you know exactly who will be there for you when you need something, no matter what or when.

quotes.text: Believe it or not, I have about the same success rate as anyone else. Sometimes you hit, sometimes you miss.

quotes.text: Few things in the world are more powerful than a positive push. A smile. A world of optimism and hope. A 'you can do it' when things are tough.

quotes.text: I hate to say it but I hate black humor. I feel like a Klan member saying it, but it's just not funny.

quotes.text: What the mass media offers is not popular art, but entertainment which is intended to be consumed like food, forgotten, and replaced by a new dish.
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.text: Do you know what it's like to love and be alone?
quotes.author: Abraham Polonsky

quotes.text: Life is pain, highness. Anyone who says differently is selling something.
quotes.author: William Goldman,  William Goldman: Four Screenplays

quotes.text: A girl should be two things: classy and fabulous.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.text: I was gratified to be able to answer promptly, and I did. I said I didn’t know.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: But luxury has never appealed to me, I like simple things, books, being alone, or with somebody who understands.
quotes.author: Daphne du Maurier

quotes.text: Meg Ryan is a beautiful and courageous woman. I grieve the loss of her companionship but I've not lost the friendship. We talk all the time and that was what our connection was about. She has a wonderful mind and we just like a chat.
quotes.author: Russell Crowe

quotes.text: Some say I'm an overnight success. Well, that was a very long night that lasted about 10 years. But while I do, of course, now feel the pressure having had books that have been very successful, I just know I have to concentrate on writing for myself. I can't worry about genres or markets or what might be commercial or not. That never works.
quotes.author: Kate Morton

quotes.text: Our human compassion binds us the one to the other - not in pity or patronizingly, but as human beings who have learnt how to turn our common suffering into hope for the future.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: I'm not a traditional politician, and I have a sense of humor. I'll try to soften it and become boring, maybe even very boring, but I'm not sure if I'll be able to.
quotes.author: Silvio Berlusconi

quotes.text: People are much more complicated in real life, but my characters are as subtle and nuanced as I can make them. But if you say my characters are too black and white, you've missed the point. Villains are meant to be black-hearted in popular novels. If you say I have a grey-hearted villain, then I've failed.
quotes.author: Ken Follett

quotes.text: Diplomacy is the art of saying 'Nice doggie' until you can find a rock.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: Men say they love independence in a woman, but they don't waste a second demolishing it brick by brick.

quotes.text: But who prays for Satan? Who, in eighteen centuries, has had the common humanity to pray for the one sinner that needed it most?
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Moral science is better occupied when treating of friendship than of justice.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.text: If money is your hope for independence you will never have it. The only real security that a man will have in this world is a reserve of knowledge, experience, and ability.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: I'm not too modest of a person. I've got a pretty blue sense of humor.

quotes.text: The world is full of little dictators trying to run your life.
quotes.author: Alan King

quotes.text: She had lost the art of conversation but not, unfortunately, the power of speech.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: I think Baltimore suffers from nostalgia and it keeps us from being honest in talking about what really happened here. A place doesn't have to be perfect to be beloved, and I love this city and I love it better for seeing its flaws.
quotes.author: Laura Lippman

quotes.text: Men occasionally stumble over the truth, but most of them pick themselves up and hurry off as if nothing ever happened.
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.text: Good books don't give up all their secrets at once.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.text: The lust and attraction are often a given in a romance novel - I want to dig into the elements of true friendship that form a foundation for a solid, gonna-last-forever romantic relationship.
quotes.author: Suzanne Brockmann

quotes.text: The foundation of success in life is good health: that is the substratum fortune; it is also the basis of happiness. A person cannot accumulate a fortune very well when he is sick.
quotes.author: P. T. Barnum

quotes.text: Nothing is black or white, nothing's 'us or them.' But then there are magical, beautiful things in the world. There's incredible acts of kindness and bravery, and in the most unlikely places, and it gives you hope.

quotes.text: My father was an electrical engineer who worked at Westinghouse in Pittsburgh. When I was growing up, my mother wrote humor columns for the local paper. She was the Erma Bombeck of Murrysville, Pa.
quotes.author: Jason Kilar

quotes.text: Even though it's tiring, I'm having the time of my life.
quotes.author: Big Sean

quotes.text: I wanted to start a revolution, using art to build the sort of society I myself envisioned.
quotes.author: Yayoi Kusama

quotes.text: I'd probably want to teach at university, because children would drive me insane. I suspect it would be English literature, Shakespeare and so forth. I've always been deeply, deeply in love with that kind of thing.
quotes.author: Stephen Fry

quotes.text: I love to see a young girl go out and grab the world by the lapels. Life's a bitch. You've got to go out and kick ass.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Stupid people are dangerous.
quotes.author: Suzanne Collins,  The Hunger Games

quotes.text: Everything in the world is about sex except sex. Sex is about power.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: If we listened to our intellect, we'd never have a love affair. We'd never have a friendship. We'd never go into business, because we'd be cynical. Well, that's nonsense. You've got to jump off cliffs all the time and build your wings on the way down.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.text: I never expected any sort of success with 'Mockingbird'... I sort of hoped someone would like it enough to give me encouragement.
quotes.author: Harper Lee

quotes.text: Today's students can put dope in their veins or hope in their brains. If they can conceive it and believe it, they can achieve it. They must know it is not their aptitude but their attitude that will determine their altitude.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.text: It's amazing how these little guys can say things that a mortal human could never get away with. There's some sort of unspoken license... when outlandish things come out of an inanimate object, somehow it equals humor.
quotes.author: Jeff Dunham

quotes.text: I spent most of my life locked in my bedroom, miserable about my raging acne.
quotes.author: Moon Unit Zappa

quotes.text: Good management is the art of making problems so interesting and their solutions so constructive that everyone wants to get to work and deal with them.
quotes.author: Paul Hawken

quotes.text: I love a lot of things, and I'm pretty much obsessive about most things I do, whether it be gardening, or architecture, or music. I'd be an obsessive hairdresser.
quotes.author: Gates McFadden

quotes.text: I have a theory that selflessness and bravery aren't all that different.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth,  Divergent

quotes.text: I am very interested and fascinated how everyone loves each other, but no one really likes each other.
quotes.author: Stephen Chbosky,  The Perks of Being a Wallflower

quotes.text: Peter would probably throw a party if I stopped breathing.''Well,' he says, 'I would only go if there was cake.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth,  Divergent

quotes.text: Some people are willing to betray years of friendship just to get a little bit of the spotlight.
quotes.author: Lauren Conrad

quotes.text: Four years of football are calculated to breed in the average man more of the ingredients of success in life than almost any academic course he takes.
quotes.author: Knute Rockne

quotes.text: The sea, the great unifier, is man's only hope. Now, as never before, the old phrase has a literal meaning: we are all in the same boat.
quotes.author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quotes.text: Russian humor is to adapt or make some sense or nonsense out of the insanity of their lives.
quotes.author: Ian Frazier

quotes.text: 'Secrets Of The Millionaire Mind' was born out of my own journey of self-discovery within both my personal and professional life.
quotes.author: T. Harv Eker

quotes.text: Art! Who comprehends her? With whom can one consult concerning this great goddess?
quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

quotes.text: I love to beatbox and have been doing it before I even knew what it was.
quotes.author: Cara Delevingne

quotes.text: Love is so short, forgetting is so long.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda,  Love: Ten Poems

quotes.text: I don't want to lose the boy with the bread.
quotes.author: Suzanne Collins,  The Hunger Games

quotes.text: I wonder how many people I've looked at all my life and never seen.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck,  The Winter of Our Discontent

quotes.text: Everyone sees what you appear to be, few experience what you really are.
quotes.author: Niccolò Machiavelli,  The Prince

quotes.text: The fact is, with every friendship you make, and every bond of trust you establish, you are shaping the image of America projected to the rest of the world. That is so important. So when you study abroad, you're actually helping to make America stronger.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.text: If I remain true to what's in my heart, that's all the success I need.
quotes.author: Steve Vai

quotes.text: I hope I inspire people who hear. Hearing people have the ability to remove barriers that prevent deaf people from achieving their dreams.
quotes.author: Marlee Matlin

quotes.text: I'm a big fan of independent girls who are strong-willed, vocal in their opinions, and have a sense of humor.
quotes.author: David Lambert

quotes.text: There is something inexpressibly sad in the thought of the children who crossed the ocean with the Pilgrims and the fathers of Jamestown, New Amsterdam, and Boston, and the infancy of those born in the first years of colonial life in this strange new world.
quotes.author: Alice Morse Earle

quotes.text: With an apple I will astonish Paris.
quotes.author: Paul Cezanne

quotes.text: Why should it be essential to love rarely in order to love much?
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.text: It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife.
quotes.author: Jane Austen,  Pride and Prejudice

quotes.text: Never allow someone to be your priority while allowing yourself to be their option.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: I was, if you like, a successful schoolboy in that I had a degree of talent in all the required things that make you a success at school.
quotes.author: Damian Lewis

quotes.text: Given the scale of trauma caused by the genocide, Rwanda has indicated that however thin the hope of a community can be, a hero always emerges. Although no one can dare claim that it is now a perfect state, and that no more work is needed, Rwanda has risen from the ashes as a model or truth and reconciliation.
quotes.author: Wole Soyinka

quotes.text: One thing my family has shown me is that having a sense of humor is everything.
quotes.author: Zoey Deutch

quotes.text: In real life, it is the hare who wins. Every time. Look around you. And in any case it is my contention that Aesop was writing for the tortoise market. Hares have no time to read. They are too busy winning the game.
quotes.author: Anita Brookner

quotes.text: Every production of an artist should be the expression of an adventure of his soul.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.text: My mother's from Thailand, and they're very strict about girls in bikinis, but I would love to do a shoot in the floating market in Thailand.
quotes.author: Christine Teigen

quotes.text: Percy wouldn't notice a joke if it danced naked in front of him wearing one of Dobby's hats.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quotes.text: Man is least himself when he talks in his own person. Give him a mask, and he will tell you the truth.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: Education is what remains after one has forgotten what one has learned in school.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: Friendship may, and often does, grow into love, but love never subsides into friendship.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.text: I think the success of a talk show depends on how true it is to the personality of the person hosting it. The shows I really admire, like 'Oprah' and 'Ellen,' are distinctively like their hosts, so I think my show will be successful only if we try to stay consistent to my own sense of myself.
quotes.author: Jane Pauley

quotes.text: I wish I had invented blue jeans. They have expression, modesty, sex appeal, simplicity - all I hope for in my clothes.
quotes.author: Yves Saint Laurent

quotes.text: I need to end up with someone who is strong, intelligent, independent, someone I really admire - sensitive, sensuous, warm, a sense of humor.
quotes.author: Pam Dawber

quotes.text: I enjoy my life. I think I have a very good life. And I think I'm very satisfied with the direction of my career and just my lifestyle and everything like that. So I wouldn't change a single thing.
quotes.author: Macaulay Culkin

quotes.text: I'm afraid that if you look at a thing long enough, it loses all of its meaning.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.text: I enjoy my fun time and everything like that but I love what I do.
quotes.author: Christina Milian

quotes.text: I like your Christ, I do not like your Christians. Your Christians are so unlike your Christ.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: When you have eliminated all which is impossible, then whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle,  The Case-Book of Sherlock Holmes

quotes.text: True friendship ought never to conceal what it thinks.
quotes.author: St. Jerome

quotes.text: Success in show business depends on your ability to make and keep friends.
quotes.author: Sophie Tucker

quotes.text: Come, gentlemen, I hope we shall drink down all unkindness.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: Good humor isn't a trait of character, it is an art which requires practice.
quotes.author: David Seabury

quotes.text: It's a wonderful world. You can't go backwards. You're always moving forward. It's the wonderful part about life. And that's terrific.
quotes.author: Harvey Fierstein

quotes.text: I never called my work an 'art'. It's part of show business, the business of building entertainment.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Our goal has been to stay true to what people most love about the original Pirates! while upgrading, enhancing, and in some cases, re-inventing the game to make it a great experience for today's gamers.
quotes.author: Sid Meier

quotes.text: I am a badass, and I recognize that you, too, are a badass.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.text: I have loved the stars too fondly to be fearful of the night.
quotes.author: Sarah Williams

quotes.text: And, in the endThe love you takeis equal to the love you make.
quotes.author: Paul McCartney,  The Beatles Illustrated Lyrics

quotes.text: A youth, when at home, should be filial and, abroad, respectful to his elders. He should be earnest and truthful. He should overflow in love to all and cultivate the friendship of the good. When he has time and opportunity, after the performance of these things, he should employ them in polite studies.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Fame always brings loneliness. Success is as ice cold and lonely as the North Pole.
quotes.author: Vicki Baum

quotes.text: Our uniqueness, our individuality, and our life experience molds us into fascinating beings. I hope we can embrace that. I pray we may all challenge ourselves to delve into the deepest resources of our hearts to cultivate an atmosphere of understanding, acceptance, tolerance, and compassion. We are all in this life together.
quotes.author: Linda Thompson

quotes.text: Even celebrities, most people have a sense of humor. Most of the people we meet who we've done on the show, like it.
quotes.author: Matt Stone

quotes.text: Life is full of tough decisions, and nothing makes them easy. But the worst ones are really your personal koans, and tormenting ambivalence is just the sense of satori rising. Try, trust, try, and trust again, and eventually you'll feel your mind change its focus to a new level of understanding.
quotes.author: Martha Beck

quotes.text: You don't take a photograph, you make it.
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.text: You don't always have to be a leader and be as vocal as I am. I'm sure some people would love it if I didn't talk as much as I did.
quotes.author: Chris Paul

quotes.text: Some people feel the rain. Others just get wet.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.text: The very essence of romance is uncertainty.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde,  The Importance of Being Earnest and Other Plays

quotes.text: For prayer is nothing else than being on terms of friendship with God.
quotes.author: Saint Teresa of Avila

quotes.text: The most important thing for any athlete is to know his ability. If you know your ability and have even a little bit of a strong mindset, you can get success, because your ability takes you to success.
quotes.author: Virender Sehwag

quotes.text: You are as young as your self-confidence, as old as your fears; as young as your hope, as old as your despair.
quotes.author: Samuel Ullman

quotes.text: Sometimes I'll be sitting with my friends; I'll say something Koothrappali-esque and make a face. There is a lot of Koothrappali in me as a human being. A lot of mannerism, humor, mischievousness, my innocence. So I don't know if I bring him home so much as I bring myself to him at work.
quotes.author: Kunal Nayyar

quotes.text: The more horrifying this world becomes, the more art becomes abstract.
quotes.author: Ellen Key

quotes.text: I have done all kinds of roles, but Tony Montana's role in 'Scarface' is something I would love to play.
quotes.author: Sanjay Dutt

quotes.text: The cure for boredom is curiosity.There is no cure for curiosity.
quotes.author: Ellen Parr

quotes.text: No tears in the writer, no tears in the reader. No surprise in the writer, no surprise in the reader.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: I took a deep breath and listened to the old brag of my heart. I am, I am, I am.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath,  The Bell Jar

quotes.text: The world is indeed full of peril, and in it there are many dark places; but still there is much that is fair, and though in all lands love is now mingled with grief, it grows perhaps the greater.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien,  The Fellowship of the Ring

quotes.text: I really wasn't even aware that Batman and Superman had this kind of grudging friendship.
quotes.author: Mark Valley

quotes.text: Starting a band is the easy part. Once you've formed the band, you have to tell a story, and that story requires songs. And not just good songs, but great songs. After a while, great songs won't do - they have to be the best. Success doesn't make it any easier. Each time I start a new record, it's a brand-new search.
quotes.author: The Edge

quotes.text: You just have to keep trying to do good work, and hope that it leads to more good work. I want to look back on my career and be proud of the work, and be proud that I tried everything. Yes, I want to look back and know that I was terrible at a variety of things.
quotes.author: Jon Stewart

quotes.text: They say you don't want to meet your heroes, but those two guys, you do want to meet them, because they do not disappoint. Walken has this amazing sense of humor, and Pacino is like just a sweetheart of a guy.
quotes.author: Bill Burr

quotes.text: Automobiles have always been part of my life, and I'm sure they always will be. What is it about them that moves me? The sound of a great engine, the unity and uniqueness of an automobile's engineering and coachwork, the history of the company and the car, and, of course, the sheer beauty of the thing.
quotes.author: Edward Herrmann

quotes.text: Art doesn't transform. It just plain forms.
quotes.author: Roy Lichtenstein

quotes.text: Write because you love it and not because it is something that you think you should do. Always write about something or somebody you know about - something that you feel deeply and passionately about. Never try and force it.

quotes.text: Whatever it is you're seeking won't come in the form you're expecting.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.text: Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: Happiness is understanding that friendship is more precious than mere things, more precious than getting your own way, more precious than being in situations where true principles are not at stake.

quotes.text: The Great Idea in advertising is far more than the sum of the recognition scores, the ratings and all the other superficial indicators of its success; it is in the realm of myth, to which measurements cannot apply.

quotes.text: Where there's tea there's hope.
quotes.author: Arthur Wing Pinero

quotes.text: Okay, sense of humor: plus one. Being able to laugh at yourself: plus one. Being able to laugh at other people without being mean: plus one. Vanity: minus one.
quotes.author: Katie Aselton

quotes.text: I thank God I'm myself and for the life I'm given to live and for friends and lovers and beloveds, and I thank God for knowing that all those people have already paid for me.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Once an object has been incorporated in a picture it accepts a new destiny.
quotes.author: Georges Braque

quotes.text: The loneliest moment in someone’s life is when they are watching their whole world fall apart, and all they can do is stare blankly.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald,  The Great Gatsby

quotes.text: Reading was my escape and my comfort, my consolation, my stimulant of choice: reading for the pure pleasure of it, for the beautiful stillness that surrounds you when you hear an author's words reverberating in your head.
quotes.author: Paul Auster,  The Brooklyn Follies

quotes.text: To want friendship is a great fault. Friendship ought to be a gratuitous joy, like the joys afforded by art or life.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.text: People should decide what success means for them, and not be distracted by accepting others' definitions of success.
quotes.author: Tony Levin

quotes.text: I think it's realistic to have hope. One can be a perverse idealist and say the easiest thing: 'I despair. The world's no good.' That's a perverse idealist. It's practical to hope, because the hope is for us to survive as a human species. That's very realistic.
quotes.author: Studs Terkel

quotes.text: I really wouldn't want to live in America. I found New York claustrophobic and dirty. I missed England when I was there, simple things like smells and the British sense of humor.
quotes.author: Jonny Lee Miller

quotes.text: What you get is a living, what you give is a life.
quotes.author: Lillian Gish

quotes.text: A guilty conscience needs to confess. A work of art is a confession.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.text: You don't suffer, kill yourself and take the risks I take just for money. I love bike racing.
quotes.author: Greg LeMond

quotes.text: My nightmares are usually about losing you. I'm okay once I realize you're here.
quotes.author: Suzanne Collins,  Catching Fire

quotes.text: The difference between the right word and the almost right word is the difference between lightning and a lightning bug.
quotes.author: Mark Twain,  The Wit and Wisdom of Mark Twain

quotes.text: Nothing of me is original. I am the combined effort of everyone I've ever known.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Invisible Monsters

quotes.text: Show me a genuine case of platonic friendship, and I shall show you two old or homely faces.

quotes.text: In Hollywood a marriage is a success if it outlasts milk.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.text: You just hope that you will get the opportunity to do what you love and pay your bills, and that is being a success as an actor.
quotes.author: Debra Messing

quotes.text: A good sense of humor will get you everywhere.
quotes.author: Josh Bowman

quotes.text: The trouble with life isn't that there is no answer, it's that there are so many answers.
quotes.author: Ruth Benedict

quotes.text: A good painting to me has always been like a friend. It keeps me company, comforts and inspires.

quotes.text: But I love Halloween, and I love that feeling: the cold air, the spooky dangers lurking around the corner.
quotes.author: Evan Peters

quotes.text: That's the thing about books. They let you travel without moving your feet.
quotes.author: Jhumpa Lahiri,  The Namesake

quotes.text: Books are my friends, my companions. They make me laugh and cry and find meaning in life.
quotes.author: Christopher Paolini,  Eragon

quotes.text: If all else perished, and he remained, I should still continue to be; and if all else remained, and he were annihilated, the universe would turn to a mighty stranger.
quotes.author: Emily Brontë,  Wuthering Heights

quotes.text: We're all going to die, all of us, what a circus! That alone should make us love each other but it doesn't. We are terrorized and flattened by trivialities, we are eaten up by nothing.

quotes.text: 'Shake It Up' definitely teaches kids about the importance of reaching for your dreams and setting high goals. It also teaches great lessons about friendship and family.
quotes.author: Zendaya

quotes.text: Success needs no explanation. Failure does not have one that matters.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.text: Next year, I hope there will be even more parties, lots of holidays and just having a good time, really. Plus wing-walking, air shows and learning to fly, as they are all things I want to do. I won't be restricted by age.
