quotes.text: As long as there was coffee in the world, how bad could things be?
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Ashes

quotes.text: You are the one girl that made me risk eveything for a future worth having.
quotes.author: Simone Elkeles,  Perfect Chemistry

quotes.text: there is a place in the heart thatwill never be filleda spaceand even during thebest momentsandthe greatest timestimeswe will know itwe will know itmore thaneverthere is a place in the heart thatwill never be filledandwe will waitandwaitin that space.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.text: The task of the modern educator is not to cut down jungles, but to irrigate deserts.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: At the time, my life just seemed too complete, and maybe we have to break everything to make something better out of ourselves.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Fight Club

quotes.text: After all, tomorrow is another day!
quotes.author: Margaret Mitchell,  Gone with the Wind

quotes.text: We learn from failure, not from success!
quotes.author: Bram Stoker,  Dracula

quotes.text: All I'd ever wanted was to forget. but even when I thought I had, pieces had kept emerging, like bits of wood floating up to the surface that only hint at the shipwreck below.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen,  Just Listen

quotes.text: My father, Oliver Hynes, was an educator. He was originally just a teacher, a very good one, but then he was promoted to be in charge of education for the entire area. He was always an inspirational teacher. He was my big personal supporter, always coming here for the Tony Awards. My mother, Carmel, was a homemaker.
quotes.author: Garry Hynes

quotes.text: America is the most grandiose experiment the world has seen, but, I am afraid, it is not going to be a success.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.text: Friendship, like the immortality of the soul, is too good to be believed.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Wear your heart on your skin in this life.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.text: One of the most difficult things everyone has to learn is that for your entire life you must keep fighting and adjusting if you hope to survive. No matter who you are or what your position is you must keep fighting for whatever it is you desire to achieve.
quotes.author: George Allen, Sr.

quotes.text: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Good humor is one of the best articles of dress one can wear in society.
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.text: To me, photography is an art of observation. It's about finding something interesting in an ordinary place... I've found it has little to do with the things you see and everything to do with the way you see them.
quotes.author: Elliott Erwitt

quotes.text: Sometimes God allows what he hates to accomplish what he loves.
quotes.author: Joni Eareckson Tada,  The God I Love

quotes.text: To love and win is the best thing.To love and lose, the next best.
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.text: God does not play dice with the universe; He plays an ineffable game of His own devising, which might be compared, from the perspective of any of the other players [i.e. everybody], to being involved in an obscure and complex variant of poker in a pitch-dark room, with blank cards, for infinite stakes, with a Dealer who won't tell you the rules, and who smiles all the time.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett,  Good Omens: The Nice and Accurate Prophecies of Agnes Nutter, Witch

quotes.text: It was only a sunny smile, and little it cost in the giving, but like morning light it scattered the night and made the day worth living.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.text: Do you not see how necessary a world of pains and troubles is to school an intelligence and make it a soul?
quotes.author: John Keats,  Letters of John Keats

quotes.text: Are you always a smartass?'Nope. Sometimes I'm asleep.
quotes.author: Jim Butcher,  Blood Rites

quotes.text: The power of pop culture stories should not be underestimated, and there is an enormous potential for inspirational stories that can have a positive, transformative effect on our lives.
quotes.author: Anita Sarkeesian

quotes.text: There is probably a perverse pride in my administration... that we were going to do the right thing, even if short-term it was unpopular. And I think anybody who's occupied this office has to remember that success is determined by an intersection in policy and politics and that you can't be neglecting of marketing and P.R. and public opinion.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: I sacrificed a lot, in terms of friendship and family, from working so much at such a young age, but I wouldn't be where I am if I hadn't.
quotes.author: Sasha Grey

quotes.text: To my young friends out there: Life can be great, but not when you can't see it. So, open your eyes to life: to see it in the vivid colors that God gave us as a precious gift to His children, to enjoy life to the fullest, and to make it count. Say yes to your life.
quotes.author: Nancy Reagan

quotes.text: Hope founded upon a human being, a man-made philosophy or any institution is always misplaced... because these things are unreliable and fleeting.
quotes.author: Charles Stanley

quotes.text: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: Humor is an antidote to all ills.
quotes.author: Patch Adams

quotes.text: Be true to yourself, help others, make each day your masterpiece, make friendship a fine art, drink deeply from good books - especially the Bible, build a shelter against a rainy day, give thanks for your blessings and pray for guidance every day.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: I live in my own little world. But its ok, they know me here.
quotes.author: Lauren Myracle

quotes.text: Love is a decision, it is a judgment, it is a promise. If love were only a feeling, there would be no basis for the promise to love each other forever. A feeling comes and it may go. How can I judge that it will stay forever, when my act does not involve judgment and decision.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm,  The Art of Loving

quotes.text: Have courage for the great sorrows of life and patience for the small ones; and when you have laboriously accomplished your daily task, go to sleep in peace. God is awake.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: The heart is the toughest part of the body. Tenderness is in the hands.
quotes.author: Carolyn Forché,  The Country Between Us

quotes.text: I write differently from what I speak, I speak differently from what I think, I think differently from the way I ought to think, and so it all proceeds into deepest darkness.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.text: If you're a bird... I'm a bird...
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Notebook

quotes.text: I think that's a great opportunity, to pick a script where you can build up a good skill. I think the main thing I look for when I look at scripts is if it's inspirational. If it's something that teenagers can relate to. And is it something that the audience is going to get something out of. If not, then it's really not worth doing.
quotes.author: Carly Schroeder

quotes.text: You will be a failure, until you impress the subconscious with the conviction you are a success. This is done by making an affirmation which 'clicks.'
quotes.author: Florence Scovel Shinn

quotes.text: Although the troops have struck us, we throw it all behind and are glad to meet you in peace and friendship.
quotes.author: Black Kettle

quotes.text: People will always have an opinion, but you have to live life the way you want to. It's very easy to tell others what to do, but difficult to implement it on yourself.
quotes.author: Preity Zinta

quotes.text: I am not the same man I was 35 years ago. And I hope that five years and ten years from now, I'll be a better man, a more mature man, a wiser man, a more humble man and a more spirited man to serve the good of my people and the good of humanity.
quotes.author: Louis Farrakhan

quotes.text: Expand the definition of 'reading' to include non-fiction, humor, graphic novels, magazines, action adventure, and, yes, even websites. It's the pleasure of reading that counts; the focus will naturally broaden. A boy won't read shark books forever.
quotes.author: Jon Scieszka

quotes.text: It is the supreme art of the teacher to awaken joy in creative expression and knowledge.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: I am not a teacher, but an awakener.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: Life isn't fair, it's just fairer than death, that's all.
quotes.author: William Goldman,  The Princess Bride

quotes.text: It’s fascinating. You know all these words, and they’re all English, but when you string them together into sentences, they just don’t make any sense.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Fallen Angels

quotes.text: So what? All writers are lunatics!
quotes.author: Cornelia Funke,  Inkspell

quotes.text: Much of what was said did not matter, and that much of what mattered could not be said.
quotes.author: Katherine Boo,  Behind the Beautiful Forevers: Life, Death, and Hope in a Mumbai Undercity

quotes.text: There is only one page left to write on. I will fill it with words of only one syllable. I love. I have loved. I will love.
quotes.author: Audrey Niffenegger,  The Time Traveler's Wife

quotes.text: Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Never marry at all, Dorian. Men marry because they are tired, women, because they are curious: both are disappointed.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde,  The Picture of Dorian Gray

quotes.text: To you, I'm an atheist.To God, I'm the loyal opposition.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.text: We can complain because rose bushes have thorns, or rejoice because thorn bushes have roses.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: People have an annoying habit of remembering things they shouldn't.
quotes.author: Christopher Paolini,  Eragon

quotes.text: When beetles fight these battles in a bottle with their paddles and the bottle's on a poodle and the poodle's eating noodles......they call this a muddle puddle tweetle poodle beetle noodle bottle paddle battle.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss,  Fox in Socks

quotes.text: I try not to put anything political on the forefront of what I'm trying to do creatively. At the same time, I do think it's wonderful when I hear people say that it's inspirational that I'm an Indian woman on camera. My life is very diverse, and my friends are a diverse group of people.
quotes.author: Mindy Kaling

quotes.text: Success and failure are equally disastrous.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.text: Accountability in friendship is the equivalent of love without strategy.
quotes.author: Anita Brookner

quotes.text: In some parts of the world, students are going to school every day. It's their normal life. But in other part of the world, we are starving for education... it's like a precious gift. It's like a diamond.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.text: Hope is a necessity for normal life and the major weapon against the suicide impulse.
quotes.author: Karl A. Menninger

quotes.text: Love doesn't make the world go 'round. Love is what makes the ride worthwhile.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.text: If you're playing a good guy, you show some darkness. If you're playing a dark guy, you show something different, like humor, that will mix it up and hopefully surpass the audience's expectations. What I'm battling all the time is complacency in the audience. I try to bring a little mystery to what might happen because that engages people more.
quotes.author: Campbell Scott

quotes.text: Excellence is an art won by training and habituation. We do not act rightly because we have virtue or excellence, but we rather have those because we have acted rightly. We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act but a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: No matter what happens, or how bad it seems today, life does go on, and it will be better tomorrow.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Ho! Ho! Ho! To the bottle I goTo heal my heart and drown my woeRain may fall, and wind may blowAnd many miles be still to goBut under a tall tree will I lieAnd let the clouds go sailing by
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.text: When you don't talk, there's a lot of stuff that ends up not getting said.
quotes.author: Catherine Gilbert Murdock,  Dairy Queen

quotes.text: Because paper has more patience than people.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.text: I'll fight it. I'll fight it for you. Don't you worry about me, Hazel Grace. I'm okay. I'll find a way to hang around and annoy you for a long time.
quotes.author: John Green,  The Fault in Our Stars

quotes.text: I'd far rather be happy than right any day.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams,  The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy

quotes.text: A literary academic can no more pass a bookstore than an alcoholic can pass a bar.
quotes.author: Carolyn G. Heilbrun

quotes.text: Books to the ceiling,Books to the sky,My pile of books is a mile high.How I love them! How I need them!I'll have a long beard by the time I read them.
quotes.author: Arnold Lobel

quotes.text: Some people, they can't just move on, you know, mourn and cry and be done with it. Or at least seem to be. But for me... I don't know. I didn't want to fix it, to forget. It wasn't something that was broken. It's just...something that happened. And like that hole, I'm just finding ways, every day, of working around it. Respecting and remembering and getting on at the same time.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen,  The Truth About Forever

quotes.text: I love a lot of the New York bands, but Patti Smith stands out. I just read 'Just Kids' and it's an inspirational, well-written account of an emerging New York artist in the late seventies.
quotes.author: James Iha

quotes.text: When everything happens to you when you're so young, you're very lucky, but by the same token, you're never going to have that same feeling again. The first time anything happens to you - your first love, your first success - the second one is never the same.
quotes.author: Lauren Bacall

quotes.text: Friendship is one of the most tangible things in a world which offers fewer and fewer supports.
quotes.author: Kenneth Branagh

quotes.text: Children should be able to live a life free from bullying and harassment and it is time that we all took a stand against this.
quotes.author: Katherine Jenkins

quotes.text: When you are kind to someone in trouble, you hope they'll remember and be kind to someone else. And it'll become like a wildfire.
quotes.author: Whoopi Goldberg

quotes.text: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
quotes.author: David Viscott

quotes.text: I think that what comes through in Chicago humor is the affection. Even though you're poking fun at someone or something, there's still an affection for it.
quotes.author: Bob Newhart

quotes.text: Creative without strategy is called 'art.' Creative with strategy is called 'advertising.'
quotes.author: Jef I. Richards

quotes.text: We don't make mistakes, just happy little accidents.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: Let me be, was all I wanted. Be what I am, no matter how I am.
quotes.author: Henry Miller,  Stand Still Like the Hummingbird

quotes.text: I am not an angel,' I asserted; 'and I will not be one till I die: I will be myself. Mr. Rochester, you must neither expect nor exact anything celestial of me - for you will not get it, any more than I shall get it of you: which I do not at all anticipate.
quotes.author: Charlotte Brontë,  Jane Eyre

quotes.text: thus with a kiss I die
quotes.author: William Shakespeare,  Romeo and Juliet

quotes.text: Even though you may want to move forward in your life, you may have one foot on the brakes. In order to be free, we must learn how to let go. Release the hurt. Release the fear. Refuse to entertain your old pain. The energy it takes to hang onto the past is holding you back from a new life. What is it you would let go of today?
quotes.author: Mary Manin Morrissey

quotes.text: I wondered what happened when you offered yourself to someone, and they opened you, only to discover you were not the gift they expected and they had to smile and nod and say thank you all the same.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult,  My Sister's Keeper

quotes.text: There is nothing like puking with somebody to make you into old friends.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath,  The Bell Jar

quotes.text: Perhaps the rare and simple pleasure of being seen for what one is compensates for the misery of being it.
quotes.author: Margaret Drabble

quotes.text: Afterward, I had the last laugh. I made an air bubble at the bottom of the lake. Our friends kept waiting for us to come up, but hey-when you are the son of Poseidon, you don't have to hurry. And it was pretty much the best underwater kiss of all time.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.text: For instance, this new idea that You-Know-Who can kill with a single glance from his eyes. That’s a basilisk, listeners. One simple test: Check whether the thing that’s glaring at you has got legs. If it has, it’s safe to look into its eyes, although if it really is You-Know-Who, that’s still likely to be the last thing you ever do.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quotes.text: If only she could be so oblivious again, to feel such love without knowing it, mistaking it for laughter.
quotes.author: Markus Zusak,  The Book Thief

quotes.text: Well, we all make mistakes, dear, so just put it behind you. We should regret our mistakes and learn from them, but never carry them forward into the future with us.
quotes.author: L.M. Montgomery,  Anne of Avonlea

quotes.text: So I wanted to sing inspirational music, and that's exactly how I approached it - only the words have been changed to declare my relationship with God.
quotes.author: Smokey Robinson

quotes.text: I did stand-up comedy for 18 years. Ten of those years were spent learning, four years were spent refining, and four years were spent in wild success. I was seeking comic originality, and fame fell on me as a byproduct. The course was more plodding than heroic.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.text: Taft was Roosevelt's handpicked successor. I didn't know how deep the friendship was between the two men until I read their almost four hundred letters, stretching back the to early '30s. It made me realize the heartbreak when they ruptured was much more than a political division.
quotes.author: Doris Kearns Goodwin

quotes.text: One of life's most painful moments comes when we must admit that we didn't do our homework, that we are not prepared.
quotes.author: Merlin Olsen

quotes.text: I have a 6-year-old niece who doesn't look like the majority of girls on the covers of magazines. I hope that by the time she's 16, the world will have changed.
quotes.author: Prabal Gurung

quotes.text: Friends can help each other. A true friend is someone who lets you have total freedom to be yourself - and especially to feel. Or, not feel. Whatever you happen to be feeling at the moment is fine with them. That's what real love amounts to - letting a person be what he really is.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.text: Now, Richard Pryor was unique. Many misunderstood his humor. He lit up the hallway, but they didn't understand his use of profanity. He didn't use it just to be using it; he used it in the context of his satire.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.text: Politics is the art of looking for trouble, finding it everywhere, diagnosing it incorrectly and applying the wrong remedies.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.text: Science is not only compatible with spirituality; it is a profound source of spirituality.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan,  The Demon-Haunted World: Science as a Candle in the Dark

quotes.text: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius,  Meditations

quotes.text: I talk to God but the sky is empty.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.text: Romance is thinking about your significant other, when you are supposed to be thinking about something else.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.text: There comes a point when you either embrace who and what you are, or condemn yourself to be miserable all your days. Other people will try to make you miserable; don't help them by doing the job yourself.
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.text: There’s no such thing as ruining your life. Life’s a pretty resilient thing, it turns out.
quotes.author: Sophie Kinsella,  The Undomestic Goddess

quotes.text: I, um, I have this problem. I broke up with my boyfriend, you see. And I'm pretty upset about it, so I wanted to talk to my best friend. [...] The thing is, they're both you.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult,  The Pact

quotes.text: You might as well ask an artist to explain his art, or ask a poet to explain his poem. It defeats the purpose. The meaning is only clear thorough the search.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.text: The more I read, the more I acquire, the more certain I am that I know nothing.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: We cannot change the cards we are dealt, just how we play the hand.
quotes.author: Randy Pausch,  The Last Lecture

quotes.text: I was a late bloomer. But anyone who blooms at all, ever, is very lucky.
quotes.author: Sharon Olds

quotes.text: President Obama called for a 'we' nation in his Inauguration Address. Art convenes. It is not just inspirational. It is aspirational. It pricks the walls of our compartmentalized minds, opens our hearts and makes us brave. And that's what we need most in our country today.
quotes.author: Anna Deavere Smith

quotes.text: I love kite surfing and mountain bike riding. It's kind of interesting; my kite surfing ability has probably deteriorated with the rate of Kaggle's success.
quotes.author: Anthony Goldbloom

quotes.text: My aim is to create a happy society with genuine friendship. Friendship between Tibetan and Chinese peoples is very essential.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: I'm getting married because I'm in love with a girl and want to spend my life with her. You can't live your life doing what other people want you to or you'll be miserable. At some point you just have to be yourself.
quotes.author: Dan Marino

quotes.text: Marriage is like putting your hand into a bag of snakes in the hope of pulling out an eel.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: In some sort of crude sense, which no vulgarity, no humor, no overstatement can quite extinguish, the physicists have known sin; and this is a knowledge which they cannot lose.
quotes.author: J. Robert Oppenheimer

quotes.text: Simplicity is natures first step, and the last of art.
quotes.author: Philip James Bailey

quotes.text: Men are from Earth, women are from Earth. Deal with it.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.text: If you do not breathe through writing, if you do not cry out in writing, or sing in writing, then don't write, because our culture has no use for it.
quotes.author: Anaïs Nin

quotes.text: Cut out all these exclamation points. An exclamation point is like laughing at your own joke.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.text: Happiness makes up in height for what it lacks in length.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: What they have done in Japan, which I find so inspirational, is they've brought the toilet out from behind the locked door. They've made it conversational. People go out and upgrade their toilet. They talk about it. They've sanitized it.
quotes.author: Rose George

quotes.text: Success is steady progress toward one's personal goals.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Few things tend more to alienate friendship than a want of punctuality in our engagements. I have known the breach of a promise to dine or sup to break up more than one intimacy.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.text: Each person must live their life as a model for others.
quotes.author: Rosa Parks

quotes.text: Solitude is not something you must hope for in the future. Rather, it is a deepening of the present, and unless you look for it in the present you will never find it.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.text: Love is like a friendship caught on fire. In the beginning a flame, very pretty, often hot and fierce, but still only light and flickering. As love grows older, our hearts mature and our love becomes as coals, deep-burning and unquenchable.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: The key to humor is often self-loathing or sarcasm. In a sense, that's how self-loathing is made palatable.
quotes.author: James Gray

quotes.text: Riding a race bike is an art - a thing that you do because you feel something inside.
quotes.author: Valentino Rossi

quotes.text: I'm for truth, no matter who tells it. I'm for justice, no matter who it is for or against. I'm a human being, first and foremost, and as such I'm for whoever and whatever benefits humanity as a whole.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.text: God save us from people who mean well.
quotes.author: Vikram Seth,  A Suitable Boy

quotes.text: If the facts don't fit the theory, change the facts.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Sometimes you have to kind of die inside in order to rise from your own ashes and believe in yourself and love yourself to become a new person.
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.text: Someday you'll find someone special again. People who've been in love once usually do. It's in their nature.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks,  Message in a Bottle

quotes.text: I had an inspirational teacher at my junior school: Peter Nixon. He was enthusiastic, knowledgeable and slightly scary - a good combination for a teacher.
quotes.author: Stephen Mangan

quotes.text: I think you can have 10,000 explanations for failure, but no good explanation for success.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.text: On one side, citizens have great respect for the United States; they have a great feeling of friendship. That is solid. But in the opposition and in the political arena I often find criticism of the closeness of relations with the United States. That is a reality.
quotes.author: Vicente Fox

quotes.text: One life is all we have and we live it as we believe in living it. But to sacrifice what you are and to live without belief, that is a fate more terrible than dying.
quotes.author: Joan of Arc

quotes.text: The most effective leaders are actually better at guarding against danger when they acknowledge it that it exists. Cowards, in contrast, cling to the hope that failure will never happen and may be sloppy in the face of danger - not because they don't acknowledge that it exists, but because they are just too afraid of it to look it in the eye.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.text: You can find heroism everyday, like guys working terrible jobs because they've got to support their families. Or as far as humor, the things I see on the job, on the street, are far funnier than anything you'll ever see on TV.
quotes.author: Harvey Pekar

quotes.text: Leadership is the art of getting someone else to do something you want done because he wants to do it.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.text: Happiness is like a butterfly which, when pursued, is always beyond our grasp, but, if you will sit down quietly, may alight upon you.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.text: People love a happy ending. So every episode, I will explain once again that I don't like people. And then Mal will shoot someone. Someone we like. And their puppy.
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.text: Don't let the bastards grind you down.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood,  The Handmaid's Tale

quotes.text: Why are old lovers able to become friends? Two reasons. They never truly loved each other, or they love each other still.
quotes.author: Whitney Otto,  How to Make an American Quilt

quotes.text: Marriage can wait, education cannot.
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini,  A Thousand Splendid Suns

quotes.text: I can choose either to be a victim of the world or an adventurer in search of treasure. It's all a question of how I view my life.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho,  Eleven Minutes

quotes.text: The single most important thing in a child's performance is the quality of the teacher. Making sure a child spends the maximum amount of time with inspirational teachers is the most important thing.
quotes.author: Michael Gove

quotes.text: You are loved just for being who you are, just for existing. You don't have to do anything to earn it. Your shortcomings, your lack of self-esteem, physical perfection, or social and economic success - none of that matters. No one can take this love away from you, and it will always be here.
quotes.author: Ram Dass

quotes.text: Friendship is a plant of slow growth and must undergo and withstand the shocks of adversity before it is entitled to the appellation.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.text: I think it's important for little girls growing up, and young women, to have one in every walk of life. So from that point of view, I'm proud to be a role model!
quotes.author: Sally Ride

quotes.text: Stalinism is linked with a cult of personality and massive violations of the law, with repression and camps. There is nothing like that in Russia and, I hope, will never again be.
quotes.author: Vladimir Putin

quotes.text: The sweetest of all sounds is that of the voice of the woman we love.
quotes.author: Jean de la Bruyere

quotes.text: I think people appreciate a songwriter who shows different sides. The whole angst thing is cool, but if that's all you've got, it's just boring. Everything I write, whether it's happy or sad, has a sense of humor to it.
quotes.author: Katy Perry

quotes.text: You must not fight too often with one enemy, or you will teach him all your art of war.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.text: What do I wear in bed? Why, Chanel No. 5, of course
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: People like to say love is unconditional, but it's not, and even if it was unconditional, it's still never free. There's always an expectation attached. I just don't want that responsibility.

quotes.text: Tiger got to hunt, bird got to fly;Man got to sit and wonder 'why, why, why?'Tiger got to sleep, bird got to land;Man got to tell himself he understand.

quotes.text: Can I come in?No! I'm in a towel!I'm blind!

As long as that effort gets through to the viewers, we will be inspirational. Then there will be people who watch the show that want to get in and hands-on make outfits.

quotes.text: I have drunken deep of joy,And I will taste no other wine tonight.

quotes.text: Do not train a child to learn by force or harshness; but direct them to it by what amuses their minds, so that you may be better able to discover with accuracy the peculiar bent of the genius of each.

quotes.text: I haven't any right to criticize books, and I don't do it except when I hate them. I often want to criticize Jane Austen, but her books madden me so that I can't conceal my frenzy from the reader; and therefore I have to stop every time I begin. Every time I read Pride and Prejudice I want to dig her up and beat her over the skull with her own shin-bone.

quotes.text: After a point of time, when you get success and fame, money and everything, the purpose of life has to be redefined. For me, I think that purpose is to build bridges. Artists can do that very easily, more than politicians.

quotes.text: And for my family, comedically, that was the key to a lot of the humor.

Reason with yourself when you have lost your reason.

quotes.text: No woman wants to be in submission to a man who isn't in submission to God!

quotes.text: If a thing loves, it is infinite.

I cannot live without my life! I cannot live without my soul!

quotes.text: I was a little shocked at how adult some of the humor was, because I was never that into animation before and when I watched 'Shrek' I really laughed out loud.

quotes.text: People living deeply have no fear of death.

quotes.text: The building of friendship, family, community and love is complicated. We are so isolated in this country, no longer supported by tribes and villages.

quotes.text: You should eat a waffle! You can't be sad if you eat a waffle!

The worst thing you can do is straighten up and hold your head high because then you'll start to feel better. If you're going to get any joy out of being depressed, you've got to stand like this.

quotes.text: It's as if inside the White House the belief in Obama's inspirational charisma is still such that every time the ugliness of brute politics intrudes, it's a startling revelation.
quotes.author: Tina Brown

quotes.text: At the end of the day, you are solely responsible for your success and your failure. And the sooner you realize that, you accept that, and integrate that into your work ethic, you will start being successful. As long as you blame others for the reason you aren't where you want to be, you will always be a failure.
quotes.author: Erin Cummings

quotes.text: Men and women can absolutely be friends, and that's what we need to be. Part of the problem is that we aren't friends enough. Our relationships are negotiations, and that is not friendship.
quotes.author: Hill Harper

quotes.text: If you can find something you love, go for it everyday of your life, and it would be really good to you.
quotes.author: Jenifer Lewis

quotes.text: The only way I'd be caught without makeup is if my radio fell in the bathtub while I was taking a bath and electrocuted me and I was in between makeup at home. I hope my husband would slap a little lipstick on me before he took me to the morgue.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.text: I have been very blessed in my life and rewarded with good friends and good health. I am grateful and happy to be able to share this.
quotes.author: Eric Idle

quotes.text: I find any sort of acting that doesn't have any humor in it is mind-numbingly boring.
quotes.author: Andrew Scott

quotes.text: It is our art that has an opportunity to leave a footprint in the sand. They don't wrap fish in our work.
quotes.author: Hugh Newell Jacobsen

quotes.text: There is a pleasure in the pathless woods,There is a rapture on the lonely shore,There is society, where none intrudes,By the deep sea, and music in its roar:I love not man the less, but Nature more
quotes.author: George Gordon Byron

quotes.text: The God of the Old Testament is arguably the most unpleasant character in all fiction: jealous and proud of it; a petty, unjust, unforgiving control-freak; a vindictive, bloodthirsty ethnic cleanser; a misogynistic, homophobic, racist, infanticidal, genocidal, filicidal, pestilential, megalomaniacal, sadomasochistic, capriciously malevolent bully.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins,  The God Delusion

quotes.text: Relationships dont always make sense. Especially from the outside
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen,  Along for the Ride

quotes.text: No one really knows why they are alive until they know what they'd die for.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.text: He made a sound like a choked laughed before he reached out and pulled her into her arms. She was aware of Luke watching them from the window, but she shut her eyes resolutely and buried her face against Jace's shoulder. He smelled of salt and blood, and only when his mouth came close to her ear did she understand what he was saying, and it was the simplest litany of all: her name, just her name.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Bones

quotes.text: Love cannot be reduced to a catalogue of reasons why, and a catalogue of reasons cannot be put together into love.
quotes.author: Eleanor Catton,  The Luminaries

quotes.text: I ask people why they have deer heads on their walls. They always say because it's such a beautiful animal. There you go. I think my mother is attractive, but I have photographs of her.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.text: You say you love rain, but you use an umbrella to walk under it. You say you love sun, but you seek shelter when it is shining. You say you love wind, but when it comes you close your windows. So that's why I'm scared when you say you love me.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.text: A man's mind is stretched by a new idea or sensation, and never shrinks back to its former dimensions.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Sr.,  Autocrat of the Breakfast Table

quotes.text: I'm not an inspirational quote kind of person.
quotes.author: Christine Teigen

quotes.text: Never lose sight of the fact that the most important yardstick of your success will be how you treat other people - your family, friends, and coworkers, and even strangers you meet along the way.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.text: One sure way to lose another woman's friendship is to try to improve her flower arrangements.
quotes.author: Marcelene Cox

quotes.text: Lordy, lordy, lordy do I love money. It is a character flaw, no doubt, one that springs from a panicked childhood in which I always felt as if our family was only a couple missed child support payments from being tossed onto the pitiless streets of our suburban New Jersey town.
quotes.author: Michael Ian Black

quotes.text: Wherever my story takes me, however dark and difficult the theme, there is always some hope and redemption, not because readers like happy endings, but because I am an optimist at heart. I know the sun will rise in the morning, that there is a light at the end of every tunnel.
quotes.author: Michael Morpurgo

quotes.text: Without football, my life is worth nothing.
quotes.author: Cristiano Ronaldo

quotes.text: Rowling is a luminous storyteller. I love her sense of humor and the intricate wizarding world she built around Hogwarts. I think all writers aspire to be like her, to capture readers like she does. But I didn't think about 'Harry Potter' when I wrote 'The Bone Season.'
quotes.author: Samantha Shannon

quotes.text: I want to continue to do some great work. I'm nowhere close to where I want to be. I'm a diverse person who's trying to use his art to make the world better.
quotes.author: Michael Jai White

quotes.text: A baby is God's opinion that the world should go on.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.text: If you want to make God laugh, tell him about your plans.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.text: The fate of your heart is your choice and no one else gets a vote
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen,  This Lullaby

quotes.text: In youth, it was a way I had,To do my best to please.And change, with every passing ladTo suit his theories.But now I know the things I knowAnd do the things I do,And if you do not like me so,To hell, my love, with you.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker,  The Complete Poems of Dorothy Parker

quotes.text: Death is not the greatest loss in life. The greatest loss is what dies inside while still alive. Never surrender.
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.text: Ask me if I sparkle and I’ll kill you where you stand.” (Bones)
quotes.author: Jeaniene Frost,  This Side of the Grave

quotes.text: It doesn't matter who you are or what you look like, so long as somebody loves you.
quotes.author: Roald Dahl,  The Witches

quotes.text: In love, no question is ever preposterous.
quotes.author: André Brink,  Before I Forget

quotes.text: A banker is a fellow who lends you his umbrella when the sun is shining, but wants it back the minute it begins to rain.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: He stared at her, knowing with certainty that he was falling in love. He pulled her close and kissed her beneath a blanket of stars, wondering how on earth he'd been lucky enough to find her.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Last Song

quotes.text: Some men are born mediocre, some men achieve mediocrity, and some men have mediocrity thrust upon them.
quotes.author: Joseph Heller

quotes.text: Life is pleasant. Death is peaceful. It's the transition that's troublesome.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.text: There are two types of people in this world. People who hate clowns...and clowns. (Bobby Pendragon)
quotes.author: D.J. MacHale,  The Quillan Games

quotes.text: Those who can make you believe absurdities, can make you commit atrocities.
quotes.author: Voltaire,  Questions sur les Miracles à M. Claparede, Professeur de Théologie à Genève, par un Proposant: Ou Extrait de Diverses Lettres de M. de Voltaire

quotes.text: Summer night--even the starsare whispering to each other.
quotes.author: Kobayashi Issa

quotes.text: I think, aesthetically, car design is so interesting - the dashboards, the steering wheels, and the beauty of the mechanics. I don't know how any of it works, I don't want to know, but it's inspirational.
quotes.author: Paloma Picasso

quotes.text: If you wish to be a success in the world, promise everything, deliver nothing.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.text: Nobody ever chooses the already unfortunate as objects of his loyal friendship.
quotes.author: Lucan

quotes.text: No matter how dark the moment, love and hope are always possible.
quotes.author: George Chakiris

quotes.text: Faith is not simply a patience that passively suffers until the storm is past. Rather, it is a spirit that bears things - with resignations, yes, but above all, with blazing, serene hope.
quotes.author: Corazon Aquino

quotes.text: Water and air, the two essential fluids on which all life depends, have become global garbage cans.
quotes.author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quotes.text: I thought my family was really funny. Everybody in my family was funny. My mom and dad both have great senses of humor and really saw the funny in stuff, so I think that's probably where it came from. I always try to see the funny in things.
quotes.author: Christine Ebersole

quotes.text: As an artist, you want to make good stories and create good art; as a businessman, you want to make money and make sure the investors are happy. The two will always clash, unfortunately.
quotes.author: Neil Jackson

quotes.text: There are only two kinds of people who are really fascinating: people who know absolutely everything, and people who know absolutely nothing.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: Happiness is the meaning and the purpose of life, the whole aim and end of human existence.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: There is some kind of a sweet innocence in being human- in not having to be just happy or just sad- in the nature of being able to be both broken and whole, at the same time.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.text: If my love were an ocean,there would be no more land.If my love were a desert,you would see only sand.If my love were a star-late at night, only light.And if my love could grow wings,I'd be soaring in flight.
quotes.author: Jay Asher,  Thirteen Reasons Why

quotes.text: Is it possible, in the final analysis, for one human being to achieve perfect understanding of another?We can invest enormous time and energy in serious efforts to know another person, but in the end, how close can we come to that person's essence? We convince ourselves that we know the other person well, but do we really know anything important about anyone?
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami,  The Wind-Up Bird Chronicle

quotes.text: In real life, love has to be possible. Even if it is not returned right away, love can only survive when the hope exists that you will be able to win over the person you desire.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho,  By the River Piedra I Sat Down and Wept

quotes.text: The damage was permanent; there would always be scars. But even the angriest scars faded over time until it was difficult to see them written on the skin at all, and the only thing that remained was the memory of how painful it had been.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.text: He loved her for almost everything she was & she decided that was enough to let him stay for a very long time.
quotes.author: Brian Andreas

quotes.text: What are the chances you’d ever meet someone like that? he wondered. Someone you could love forever, someone who would forever love you back? And what did you do when that person was born half a world away? The math seemed impossible.
quotes.author: Rainbow Rowell,  Eleanor & Park

quotes.text: A Penny Saved is a Penny Earned
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Humor is almost always anger with its make-up on.
quotes.author: Stephen King,  Bag of Bones

quotes.text: Poetry is eternal graffiti written in the heart of everyone.
quotes.author: Lawrence Ferlinghetti,  Americus, Book I

quotes.text: This CD became something of a personal journey for me. The tone of the whole CD is uplifting and inspirational. It's an upper. We have enough downers in the world.
quotes.author: Roma Downey

quotes.text: Earn your success based on service to others, not at the expense of others.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.text: Anything can be done if you find friends to do it with. The lucky biographers find themselves drawn into a sort of friendship with their subject.
quotes.author: Amity Shlaes

quotes.text: Women with low self-esteem love bad boys. Women who have work to do love bad boys. Women who love themselves love good men.
quotes.author: Tracy McMillan

quotes.text: And I hope that five years and 10 years from now, I'll be a better man, a more mature man, a wiser man, a more humble man and a more spirited man to serve the good of my people and the good of humanity.
quotes.author: Louis Farrakhan

quotes.text: Having a baby is one of the most wonderful things in your life, as well as the hardest thing in your life.
quotes.author: Nuno Bettencourt

quotes.text: Writing humor for me is more like a watchful-ness. You have to watch. When you say something funny, or someone else does, it's more like you wait for the piece.
quotes.author: Ian Frazier

quotes.text: I decided at 40 I was wasting entire chunks of my brain and didn't want to blow my one chance on Earth. I'm glad I made that decision. Writing is largely about time, while visual art is largely about space. Sometimes, as with film, you can hybridize, but I think it's basically the space part of my brain wanting equal footing with the time part.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.text: Aim higher in case you fall short.
quotes.author: Suzanne Collins,  Catching Fire

quotes.text: I don't want to lose you.' His voice almost a whisper. Seeing his haggard expression, she took his hand and squeezed it, then reluctantly let it go. She could feel the tears again, and she fought them back. 'But you don't want to keep me, either, do you?' To that, he had no response.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Rescue

quotes.text: If you can love someone with your whole heart, even one person, then there's salvation in life. Even if you can't get together with that person.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami,  1Q84

quotes.text: If someone thinks that peace and love are just a cliche that must have been left behind in the 60s, that's a problem. Peace and love are eternal.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: Ideas are like rabbits. You get a couple and learn how to handle them, and pretty soon you have a dozen.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.text: For books are not absolutely dead things, but do contain a potency of life in them to be as active as that soul was whose progeny they are; nay, they do preserve as in a vial the purest efficacy and extraction of that living intellect that bred them.
quotes.author: John Milton,  Areopagitica

quotes.text: The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved -- loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: I think it pisses God off if you walk by the color purple in a field somewhere and don't notice it.
quotes.author: Alice Walker,  The Color Purple

quotes.text: Do I dare Disturb the universe? In a minute there is time For decisions and revisions which a minute will reverse.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.text: In the end you should always do the right thing even if it's hard.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Last Song

quotes.text: I am not absentminded. It is the presence of mind that makes me unaware of everything else.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.text: It would be possible to describe everything scientifically, but it would make no sense; it would be without meaning, as if you described a Beethoven symphony as a variation of wave pressure.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Everybody is special. Everybody. Everybody is a hero, a lover, a fool, a villain. Everybody. Everybody has their story to tell.
quotes.author: Alan Moore,  V for Vendetta

quotes.text: [My mom's] funny that way, celebrating special occasions with blue food. I think it's her way of saying anything is possible. Percy can pass seventh grade. Waffles can be blue. Little miracles like that.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan,  The Sea of Monsters

quotes.text: Do stuff. be clenched, curious. Not waiting for inspiration's shove or society's kiss on your forehead. Pay attention. It's all about paying attention. attention is vitality. It connects you with others. It makes you eager. stay eager.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.text: There is always something left to love.
quotes.author: Gabriel Garcí­a Márquez,  One Hundred Years of Solitude

quotes.text: Remember, Hope is a good thing, maybe the best of things, and no good thing ever dies.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.text: Somebody just gave me a shower radio. Thanks a lot. Do you really want music in the shower? I guess there's no better place to dance than a slick surface next to a glass door.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.text: A little talent is a good thing to have if you want to be a writer. But the only real requirement is the ability to remember every scar.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.text: My tastes and inspirational artists were always rather eclectic and diverse.
quotes.author: Taylor Dayne

quotes.text: Success is peace of mind, which is a direct result of self-satisfaction in knowing you made the effort to become the best of which you are capable.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: 'Mistresses' is about the lives of four women, each going through different versions of infidelity. Their longtime friendship is what gets them through extremely challenging times.
quotes.author: Rochelle Aytes

quotes.text: I love having a boyfriend but need to be secure on my own first.
quotes.author: Demi Lovato

quotes.text: If children have the ability to ignore all odds and percentages, then maybe we can all learn from them. When you think about it, what other choice is there but to hope? We have two options, medically and emotionally: give up, or Fight Like Hell.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.text: Your children are not your children. They are the sons and daughters of Life's longing for itself. They came through you but not from you and though they are with you yet they belong not to you.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.text: Think about scary movies: There's a fine line between horror and humor.
quotes.author: Roy Blount, Jr.

quotes.text: In the 1960s when the recording studio suddenly really took off as a tool, it was the kids from art school who knew how to use it, not the kids from music school. Music students were all stuck in the notion of music as performance, ephemeral. Whereas for art students, music as painting? They knew how to do that.
quotes.author: Brian Eno

quotes.text: One ChoiceOne Choice, decided your friends.One Choice, defines your beliefs.One Choice, determines your loyalties - Forever.ONCE CHOICE CAN TRANSFORM YOU
quotes.author: Veronica Roth,  Divergent

quotes.text: If there's a thing I've learned in my life it's to not be afraid of the responsibility that comes with caring for other people. What we do for love: those things endure. Even if the people you do them for don't
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.text: It is unwise to be too sure of one's own wisdom. It is healthy to be reminded that the strongest might weaken and the wisest might err.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Y'all smoke to enjoy it. I smoke to die.
quotes.author: John Green,  Looking for Alaska

quotes.text: You've got to get obsessed and stay obsessed.
quotes.author: John Irving,  The Hotel New Hampshire

quotes.text: We need never be hopeless because we can never be irreperably broken.
quotes.author: John Green,  Looking for Alaska

quotes.text: When all is said and done, more is said than done.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.text: I am awfully greedy; I want everything from life. I want to be a woman and to be a man, to have many friends and to have loneliness, to work much and write good books, to travel and enjoy myself, to be selfish and to be unselfish… You see, it is difficult to get all which I want. And then when I do not succeed I get mad with anger.
quotes.author: Simone de Beauvoir

quotes.text: The only person who can pull me down is myself, and I'm not going to let myself pull me down anymore.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.text: The great tragedy of life is not that men perish, but that they cease to love.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.text: You are the shuckiest shuck faced shuck in the world!
quotes.author: James Dashner,  The Maze Runner

quotes.text: I am simply a 'book drunkard.' Books have the same irresistible temptation for me that liquor has for its devotee. I cannot withstand them.
quotes.author: L.M. Montgomery

quotes.text: Every man's life ends the same way. It is only the details of how he lived and how he died that distinguish one man from another.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.text: If you look at a building by Mies van der Rohe, it might look very simple, but up close, the sheer quality of construction, materials and thought are inspirational.
quotes.author: David Chipperfield

quotes.text: Discipline is the soul of an army. It makes small numbers formidable; procures success to the weak, and esteem to all.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.text: I didn't have any Indigenous friends until I was in my 30s, and I'll always remember and be inspired by the remarkable friendship I had with Connie Bush, an outstanding Indigenous leader from Groot Eylandt on who was on the National Women's Advisory Council with me.
quotes.author: Quentin Bryce

quotes.text: Genuine and true love is so rare that when you encounter it in any form, it's a wonderful thing, to be utterly cherished in whatever form it takes.
quotes.author: Gwendoline Christie

quotes.text: I knew I was a winner back in the late sixties. I knew I was destined for great things. People will say that kind of thinking is totally immodest. I agree. Modesty is not a word that applies to me in any way - I hope it never will.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: Science is organized knowledge. Wisdom is organized life.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.text: I think that it's hard for vain people to be funny. I think you can look any way you want as long as you have a good sense of humor about yourself. People who are concerned with their looks and what they're wearing and how they present themselves tend to have less of a sense of humor about themselves.
quotes.author: Taran Killam

quotes.text: I am an artist, you understand? For me, a picture is like poetry. When you make art, this is not coming from an intellectual place. It's coming from the deep side of your unconscious, your soul.
quotes.author: Alejandro Jodorowsky

quotes.text: You can safely assume you've created God in your own image when it turns out that God hates all the same people you do.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.text: I think prime numbers are like life. They are very logical but you could never work out the rules, even if you spent all your time thinking about them
quotes.author: Mark Haddon,  The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time

quotes.text: Do you think, because I am poor, obscure, plain and little, I am soulless and heartless? You think wrong! - I have as much soul as you, - and full as much heart! And if God had gifted me with some beauty and much wealth, I should have made it as hard for you to leave me, as it is now for me to leave you!
quotes.author: Charlotte Brontë,  Jane Eyre

quotes.text: Pull up a chair. Take a taste. Come join us. Life is so endlessly delicious.
quotes.author: Ruth Reichl

quotes.text: You nicked-named my daughter after the Lock Ness Monster!
quotes.author: Stephenie Meyer,  Breaking Dawn

quotes.text: There is something about words. In expert hands, manipulated deftly, they take you prisoner. Wind themselves around your limbs like spider silk, and when you are so enthralled you cannot move, they pierce your skin, enter your blood, numb your thoughts. Inside you they work their magic.
quotes.author: Diane Setterfield,  The Thirteenth Tale

quotes.text: Music has always been a matter of Energy to me, a question of Fuel. Sentimental people call it Inspiration, but what they really mean is Fuel. I have always needed Fuel. I am a serious consumer. On some nights I still believe that a car with the gas needle on empty can run about fifty more miles if you have the right music very loud on the radio.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.text: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma - which is living with the results of other people's thinking. Don't let the noise of other's opinions drown out your own inner voice. And most important, have the courage to follow your heart and intuition. They somehow already know what you truly want to become. Everything else is secondary.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: I live my life in widening circles that reach out across the world.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke,  Rilke's Book of Hours: Love Poems to God

quotes.text: Look, let me just say it: He was hot. A nonhot boy stares at you relentlessly and it is, at best, awkward and, at worst, a form of assault. But a hot boy . . . well.
quotes.author: John Green,  The Fault in Our Stars

quotes.text: Anyone who loves in the expectation of being loved in return is wasting their time.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho,  The Devil and Miss Prym

quotes.text: Well, I must endure the presence of a few caterpillars if I wish to become acquainted with the butterflies.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry,  The Little Prince

quotes.text: I would probably work with Drake as he is massively inspirational to me as a writer as well as an artist. If not him, then Susan Boyle!
quotes.author: Conor Maynard

quotes.text: Forward, as occasion offers. Never look round to see whether any shall note it... Be satisfied with success in even the smallest matter, and think that even such a result is no trifle.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Marriage, for a woman at least, hampers the two things that made life to me glorious - friendship and learning.
quotes.author: Jane Harrison

quotes.text: A desire arises in the mind. It is satisfied immediately another comes. In the interval which separates two desires a perfect calm reigns in the mind. It is at this moment freed from all thought, love or hate. Complete peace equally reigns between two mental waves.
quotes.author: Swami Sivananda

quotes.text: If you hope for happiness in the world, hope for it from God, and not from the world.
quotes.author: David Brainerd

quotes.text: There's so much to appreciate about my life every single day, and I make a big point of taking time to smell the roses and noticing how lucky I am. I never want to take that for granted.
quotes.author: Josie Maran

quotes.text: Although humor is present in every one of my films, it has always been used as a way to make the darker, heavier stuff in my stories more palatable. I never set out to make 'Humpday' a comedy.
quotes.author: Lynn Shelton

quotes.text: Stand-up comedy is an art form and it dies unless you expand it.
quotes.author: Sam Kinison

quotes.text: Why it's simply impassible!Alice: Why, don't you mean impossible?Door: No, I do mean impassible. (chuckles) Nothing's impossible!
quotes.author: Lewis Carroll,  Alice's Adventures in Wonderland & Through the Looking-Glass

quotes.text: Wherever you will go, I will let you down, But this lullaby goes on.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen,  This Lullaby

quotes.text: April 1. This is the day upon which we are reminded of what we are on the other three hundred and sixty-four.
quotes.author: Mark Twain,  Pudd'nhead Wilson and Other Tales

quotes.text: If a girl starts out all casual with a guy and she doesn't tell him that she wants a relationship, it will never become a relationship. If you give the guy the impression that casual is okay with you, that's all he'll ever want. Be straight with him from the start. If he gets scared and runs away, he wasn't right for you.
quotes.author: Susane Colasanti,  Waiting for You

quotes.text: Sometimes the hardest part isn't letting go but rather learning to start over.
quotes.author: Nicole Sobon,  Program 13

quotes.text: Oh no. Don't smile. You'll kill me. I stop breathing when you smile.
quotes.author: Tessa Dare,  A Lady of Persuasion

quotes.text: A casual stroll through the lunatic asylum shows that faith does not prove anything.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: I pull a lot of the stuff that I play off the rhythm tracks - and Keith Richards has been one of the main contributors to my inspirational playing.
quotes.author: Bobby Keys

quotes.text: A rejection is nothing more than a necessary step in the pursuit of success.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.text: A passion for politics stems usually from an insatiable need, either for power, or for friendship and adulation, or a combination of both.
quotes.author: Fawn M. Brodie

quotes.text: The unconditional love for you child, it's truly amazing.
quotes.author: Jourdan Dunn

quotes.text: I hope I am remembered by my children as a good father.
quotes.author: Orson Scott Card

quotes.text: I think it's important to have closure in any relationship that ends - from a romantic relationship to a friendship. You should always have a sense of clarity at the end and know why it began and why it ended. You need that in your life to move cleanly into your next phase.
quotes.author: Jennifer Aniston

quotes.text: My dad's sense of humor was direct and sometimes surreal - his quick wit is well known amongst our family and friends. He raised me on Spike Jones records and W.C. Fields movies, and his sense of humor fell somewhere in between.
quotes.author: Tony Visconti

quotes.text: We're a depraved civilization. All this technology, all the computer games and the iPhones... nobody will sit for art anymore. What a dismaying state of humanity.
quotes.author: Diane Paulus

quotes.text: Lovers alone wear sunlight.
quotes.author: E.E. Cummings

quotes.text: To be is to do - SocratesTo do is to be - SartreDo Be Do Be Do - Sinatra
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.text: Accept what life offers you and try to drink from every cup. All wines should be tasted; some should only be sipped, but with others, drink the whole bottle.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho,  Brida

quotes.text: When you love someone, you say their name different. Like it's safe inside your mouth.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult,  Handle with Care

quotes.text: Just because you don't understand it doesn't mean it isn't so.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket,  The Blank Book

quotes.text: If there are no dogs in Heaven, then when I die I want to go where they went.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: I'm very fond of the British cinema. I'm a big fan of Martin Campbell and Daniel Craig. I actually find Daniel very inspirational, especially on the physical side of things. He really inspired me to get back into shape when I started to add on a few pounds. I think he's a great role model.
quotes.author: Steven Bauer

quotes.text: Willpower is the key to success. Successful people strive no matter what they feel by applying their will to overcome apathy, doubt or fear.
quotes.author: Dan Millman

quotes.text: Great is the victory, but the friendship of all is greater.
quotes.author: Emil Zatopek

quotes.text: Art is built on the deepest themes of human meaning: good and evil, beauty and ugliness, life and death, love and hate. No other story has incarnated those themes more than the story of Jesus.
quotes.author: John Ortberg

quotes.text: Like all parents, my husband and I just do the best we can, hold our breath and hope we've set aside enough money for our kid's therapy.
quotes.author: Michelle Pfeiffer

quotes.text: I think people are sexy when they have a sense of humor, when they are smart, when they have some sense of style, when they are kind, when they express their own opinions, when they are creative, when they have character.
quotes.author: Suzanne Vega

quotes.text: My art is not limited to the songs I create but also to the reaction it creates. I like to sit back and look at the whole thing as if it's a tornado that I'm controlling. It's creating chaos. When you create chaos, ideas are turned upside down, and everybody looks at things in a different way.
quotes.author: Marilyn Manson

quotes.text: Everyone looks retarded once you set your mind to it.
quotes.author: David Sedaris

quotes.text: It may help to understand human affairs to be clear that most of the great triumphs and tragedies of history are caused, not by people being fundamentally good or fundamentally bad, but by people being fundamentally people.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman,  Good Omens: The Nice and Accurate Prophecies of Agnes Nutter, Witch

quotes.text: Men may be stronger, but it is women who endure.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare,  Clockwork Princess

quotes.text: Poetry is the shadow cast by our streetlight imaginations.
quotes.author: Lawrence Ferlinghetti

quotes.text: The higher we soar the smaller we appear to those who cannot fly.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche,  Thus Spoke Zarathustra

quotes.text: Description begins in the writer’s imagination, but should finish in the reader’s.
quotes.author: Stephen King,  On Writing: A Memoir of the Craft

quotes.text: Better to be called something positive and inspirational than something negative.
quotes.author: Donnie Yen

quotes.text: The winner's edge is not in a gifted birth, a high IQ, or in talent. The winner's edge is all in the attitude, not aptitude. Attitude is the criterion for success.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.text: Friendship is a difficult, dangerous job. It is also (though we rarely admit it) extremely exhausting.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bibesco

quotes.text: I love the gym; I love basketball. I'm really passionate about it.
quotes.author: Kyrie Irving

quotes.text: He is the best physician who is the most ingenious inspirer of hope.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.text: The most important thing is to enjoy your life - to be happy - it's all that matters.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: If only life could be a little more tender and art a little more robust.
quotes.author: Alan Rickman

quotes.text: Wonder is the beginning of wisdom.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: Dumbledore will only leave from Hogwarts when there are none loyal to him!
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

quotes.text: Lots of things can be fixed. Things can be fixed. But many times, relationships between people cannot be fixed, because they should not be fixed. You're aboard a ship setting sail, and the other person has joined the inland circus, or is boarding a different ship, and you just can't be with each other anymore. Because you shouldn't be.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.text: A lot of America is kind of done. People have been making films about it for 100 years. Everything to me feels used up. But Jo-Burg feels unbelievably inspirational to me.
quotes.author: Neill Blomkamp

quotes.text: The new midlife is where you realize that even your failures make you more beautiful and are turned spiritually into success if you became a better person because of them. You became a more humble person. You became a more merciful and compassionate person.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.text: China has been committed to the independent foreign policy of peace and has developed friendship and cooperation with all countries on the basis of the Five Principles of Peaceful Coexistence.
quotes.author: Hu Jintao

quotes.text: I have my own high standards for what I want in a partner and how I want to be treated. I bring a lot to the table. I'm not talking about material things but what I have to offer as a person - love and loyalty and all the things that make a good relationship.
quotes.author: Jennifer Lopez

quotes.text: At twenty a man is full of fight and hope. He wants to reform the world. When he is seventy he still wants to reform the world, but he know he can't.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.text: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: I was a timid little guy when I was a kid. I used humor as a defense; I became the class clown. But deep inside, I felt real vulnerable.
quotes.author: Mike Huckabee

quotes.text: You cannot live to please everyone else. You have to edify, educate and fulfill your own dreams and destiny, and hope that whatever your art is that you're putting out there, if it's received, great, I respect you for receiving it. If it's not received, great, I respect you for not.
quotes.author: Octavia Spencer

quotes.text: [H]iding how you really feel and trying to make everyone happy doesn't make you nice, it just makes you a liar.
quotes.author: Jenny O'Connell,  The Book of Luke

quotes.text: Alice laughed. 'There's no use trying,' she said. 'One can't believe impossible things.'I daresay you haven't had much practice,' said the Queen. 'When I was your age, I always did it for half-an-hour a day. Why, sometimes I've believed as many as six impossible things before breakfast. There goes the shawl again!
quotes.author: Lewis Carroll

quotes.text: I want morning and noon and nightfall with you. I want your tears, your smiles, your kisses...the smell of your hair, the taste of your skin, the touch of your breath on my face. I want to see you in the final hour of my life...to lie in your arms as I take my last breath.
quotes.author: Lisa Kleypas,  Again the Magic

quotes.text: Picking five favorite books is like picking the five body parts you'd most like not to lose.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.text: Sometimes, if you stand on the bottom rail of a bridge and lean over to watch the river slipping slowly away beneath you, you will suddenly know everything there is to be known.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.text: If you can capture a woman's imagination, then you will have her. But imagination is a strange creature. It needs time and distance to function properly.
quotes.author: Kathleen Tessaro

quotes.text: I believe in the city as a natural human environment, but we must humanize it. It's art that will re-define public space in the 21st Century. We can make our cities diverse, inspirational places by putting art, dance and performance in all its forms into the matrix of street life.
quotes.author: Antony Gormley

quotes.text: Ambition is the path to success, persistence is the vehicle you arrive in.
quotes.author: William Eardley IV

quotes.text: 'Safe Harbor' is a state of mind... it's the place - in reality or metaphor - to which one goes in times of trouble or worry. It can be a friendship, marriage, church, garden, beach, poem, prayer, or song.
quotes.author: Luanne Rice

quotes.text: This year I hope to introduce legislation that would require Power Administrations to list direct and indirect costs associated with ESA compliance as a line item on customer's power bills.
quotes.author: Cathy McMorris Rodgers

quotes.text: My senior year of high school, I was voted 'Wittiest.' So, several years later, I decided to try my hand at writing humor to see if I could be witty enough to make some money.
quotes.author: Barbara Park

quotes.text: Great art is the outward expression of an inner life in the artist, and this inner life will result in his personal vision of the world.
quotes.author: Edward Hopper

quotes.text: I think it is all a matter of love; the more you love a memory the stronger and stranger it becomes
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.text: Last night I lost the world, and gained the universe.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.text: Love sucks. Sometimes it feels good. Sometimes it's just another way to bleed.
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton,  Blue Moon

quotes.text: Humanity takes itself too seriously. It is the world's original sin. If the cave-man had known how to laugh, History would have been different.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde,  The Picture of Dorian Gray

quotes.text: That what I need to survive is not Gale's fire, kindled with rage and hatred. I have plenty of fire myself. What I need is the dandelion in the spring. The bright yellow that means rebirth instead of destruction. The promise that life can go on, no matter how bad our losses. That it can be good again. And only Peeta can give me that.
quotes.author: Suzanne Collins,  Mockingjay

quotes.text: You know, it's hard work to write a book. I can't tell you how many times I really get going on an idea, then my quill breaks. Or I spill ink all over my writing tunic.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres,  The Funny Thing Is...

quotes.text: A thinker sees his own actions as experiments and questions--as attempts to find out something. Success and failure are for him answers above all.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: Mockingbirds don’t do one thing but make music for us to enjoy. They don’t eat up people’s gardens, don’t nest in corncribs, they don’t do one thing but sing their hearts out for us. That’s why it’s a sin to kill a mockingbird.
quotes.author: Harper Lee,  To Kill a Mockingbird

quotes.text: He - and if there is a God, I am convinced he is a he, because no woman could or would ever fuck things up this badly.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.text: Authority without wisdom is like a heavy axe without an edge, fitter to bruise than polish.
quotes.author: Anne Bradstreet

quotes.text: It is by acts and not by ideas that people live.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.text: The level of our success is limited only by our imagination and no act of kindness, however small, is ever wasted.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.text: Friendship is almost always the union of a part of one mind with the part of another; people are friends in spots.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.text: There is not love where there is no will.
quotes.author: Indira Gandhi

quotes.text: Democracy still has a real hope and chance in Iraq, and true freedom in this country would be the greatest testament to those who gave their lives for it.
quotes.author: Mary Landrieu

quotes.text: We do not remember days, we remember moments.
quotes.author: Cesare Pavese

quotes.text: My view of life is colored by humor and looking at the best in any situation.
quotes.author: Michael J. Fox

quotes.text: Interpretation is the revenge of the intellectual upon art.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.text: This must be Thursday,' said Arthur to himself, sinking low over his beer. 'I never could get the hang of Thursdays.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams,  The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy

quotes.text: Your mother died to save you. If there is one thing Voldemort cannot understand, it is love. Love as powerful as your mother's for you leaves it's own mark. To have been loved so deeply, even though the person who loved us is gone, will give us some protection forever.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

quotes.text: With mirth and laughter let old wrinkles come.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare,  The Merchant of Venice

quotes.text: Never complain, never explain. Resist the temptation to defend yourself or make excuses.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: Nothing ever happens like you imagine it will
quotes.author: John Green,  Paper Towns

quotes.text: We're all a little weird. And life is a little weird. And when we find someone whose weirdness is compatible with ours, we join up with them and fall into mutually satisfying weirdness — and call it love — true love.
quotes.author: Robert Fulghum,  True Love

quotes.text: Anyone who is in love is making love the whole time, even when they're not. When two bodies meet, it is just the cup overflowing. They can stay together for hours, even days. They begin the dance one day and finish it the next, or--such is the pleasure they experience--they may never finish it. No eleven minutes for them.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho,  Eleven Minutes

quotes.text: You are speaking of my future lover. Be more respectful.
quotes.author: Charlaine Harris,  Club Dead

quotes.text: I am the happiest creature in the world. Perhaps other people have said so before, but not one with such justice. I am happier even than Jane; she only smiles, I laugh.
quotes.author: Jane Austen,  Pride and Prejudice

quotes.text: Actual happiness always looks pretty squalid in comparison with the overcompensations for misery. And, of course, stability isn't nearly so spectacular as instability. And being contented has none of the glamour of a good fight against misfortune, none of the picturesqueness of a struggle with temptation, or a fatal overthrow by passion or doubt. Happiness is never grand.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley,  Brave New World

quotes.text: May the forces of evil become confused on the way to your house.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.text: Growing up is losing some illusions, in order to acquire others.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.text: I have always believed, and I still believe, that whatever good or bad fortune may come our way we can always give it meaning and transform it into something of value.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.text: Success is only meaningful and enjoyable if it feels like your own.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.text: Friendship is also about liking a person for their failings, their weakness. It's also about mutual help, not about exploitation.
quotes.author: Paul Theroux

quotes.text: Light makes photography. Embrace light. Admire it. Love it. But above all, know light. Know it for all you are worth, and you will know the key to photography.
