quotes.text: To be poor does not mean you lack the means to extend charity to another. You may lack money or food, but you have the gift of friendship to overwhelm the loneliness that grips the lives of so many.
quotes.author: Stanley Hauerwas

quotes.text: Life is one grand, sweet song, so start the music.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.text: There are only really a few stories to tell in the end, and betrayal and the failure of love is one of those good stories to tell.
quotes.author: Sean Lennon

quotes.text: We have always had gross humor. But we try for funny, not gross.
quotes.author: Shawn Wayans

quotes.text: It is a law woven into the nature of man, attested by history, by science, by literature and art, and by dally experience, that strength of mind and force of character are the supreme rulers of human affairs.
quotes.author: Lucius Quintus Cincinnatus Lamar II

quotes.text: There are people who are generic. They make generic responses and they expect generic answers. They live inside a box and they think people who don't fit into their box are weird. But I'll tell you what, generic people are the weird people. They are like genetically-manipulated plants growing inside a laboratory, like indistinguishable faces, like droids. Like ignorance.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.text: I mean, at the end of the day, what the hell does it matter who I end up with if it can't be you?
quotes.author: Tabitha Suzuma,  Forbidden

quotes.text: Moving on is easy. It's staying moved on that's trickier.
quotes.author: Katerina Stoykova Klemer

quotes.text: Oh, aye, Sassenach. I am your master . . . and you're mine. Seems I canna possess your soul without losing my own.
quotes.author: Diana Gabaldon,  Outlander

quotes.text: When two people are under the influence of the most violent, most insane, most delusive, and most transient of passions, they are required to swear that they will remain in that excited, abnormal, and exhausting condition continuously until death do them part.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw,  Getting Married

quotes.text: I feel that life is divided into the horrible and the miserable. That's the two categories. The horrible are like, I don't know, terminal cases, you know, and blind people, crippled. I don't know how they get through life. It's amazing to me. And the miserable is everyone else. So you should be thankful that you're miserable, because that's very lucky, to be miserable.
quotes.author: Woody Allen,  Annie Hall: Screenplay

quotes.text: Fake it 'till you make it.
quotes.author: Gayle Forman,  If I Stay

quotes.text: A single day is enough to make us a little larger or, another time, a little smaller.
quotes.author: Paul Klee

quotes.text: If you dare nothing, then when the day is over, nothing is all you will have gained.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman,  The Graveyard Book

quotes.text: I believe that sex is one of the most beautiful, natural, wholesome things that money can buy.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.text: Time takes it all, whether you want it to or not.
quotes.author: Stephen King,  The Green Mile

quotes.text: People don't realize how a man's whole life can be changed by one book.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.text: Our lives are defined by opportunities, even the ones we miss.
quotes.author: Eric Roth,  The Curious Case of Benjamin Button Screenplay

quotes.text: Joy is the infallible sign of the presence of God.
quotes.author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quotes.text: Homework is not an option. My bed is sending out serious nap rays. I can't help myself. The fluffy pillows and warm comforter are more powerful than I am. I have no choice but to snuggle under the covers.
quotes.author: Laurie Halse Anderson,  Speak

quotes.text: Comedy was my sport. It taught me how to roll with the punches. Failure is the exact same as success when it comes to comedy because it just keeps coming. It never stops.

quotes.text: I begin my reign with profound emotion at the honour of accepting the Crown, aware of the responsibility it entails and with the greatest hope for the future of Spain.
quotes.author: King Felipe VI

quotes.text: Friendship is a disinterested commerce between equals; love, an abject intercourse between tyrants and slaves.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.text: I've had a very laughable career and what has seen me through is my sense of humor.
quotes.author: Linda Gray

quotes.text: Dear God! how beauty varies in nature and art. In a woman the flesh must be like marble; in a statue the marble must be like flesh.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: Any intelligent fool can make things bigger, more complex, and more violent. It takes a touch of genius — and a lot of courage to move in the opposite direction.
quotes.author: Ernst F. Schumacher

quotes.text: What to do if you find yourself stuck in a crack in the ground underneath a giant boulder you can't move, with no hope of rescue. Consider how lucky you are that life has been good to you so far. Alternatively, if life hasn't been good to you so far, which given your current circumstances seems more likely, consider how lucky you are that it won't be troubling you much longer.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams,  The Original Hitchhiker Radio Scripts

quotes.text: Walk on with hope in your heart, and you'll never walk alone
quotes.author: Shah Rukh Khan

quotes.text: A woman knows very well that, though a wit sends her his poems, praises her judgment, solicits her criticism, and drinks her tea, this by no means signifies that he respects her opinions, admires her understanding, or will refuse, though the rapier is denied him, to run through the body with his pen.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf,  Orlando

quotes.text: In a closed society where everybody's guilty, the only crime is getting caught. In a world of thieves, the only final sin is stupidity.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson,  Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas

quotes.text: No! Try not. Do, or do not. There is no try.
quotes.author: George Lucas,  The Star Wars Trilogy

quotes.text: Wrong does not cease to be wrong because the majority share in it.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy,  A Confession

quotes.text: ...and then, I have nature and art and poetry, and if that is not enough, what is enough?
quotes.author: Vincent van Gogh

quotes.text: Love is what you make it. Unfortunately, I can’t make it today, as I have a doctor’s appointment.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quotes.text: The greater part of our happiness or misery depends upon our dispositions, and not upon our circumstances.

quotes.text: Given the choice between the experience of pain and nothing, I would choose pain.
quotes.author: William Faulkner,  The Wild Palms

quotes.text: Nerd girls are the world’s most underutilized romantic resource. And guys, do not tell me that nerd girls are not hot because that shows a Paris Hilton-esque failure to understand hotness.

quotes.text: How would your life be different if…You walked away from gossip and verbal defamation? Let today be the day…You speak only the good you know of other people and encourage others to do the same.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quotes.text: The soul, fortunately, has an interpreter - often an unconscious but still a faithful interpreter - in the eye.
quotes.author: Charlotte Brontë,  Jane Eyre

quotes.text: Success means your options multiply. Size increases complexity, and complexity can confuse vision.
quotes.author: Andy Stanley

quotes.text: I want to show another side of Middle Easterners. My hope is that I would be able to play a variety of parts, and not always be the guy with the accent.
quotes.author: Maz Jobrani

quotes.text: A friend is a beloved mystery; dearest always because he is not ourself, and has something in him which it is impossible for us to fathom. If it were not so, friendship would lose its chief zest.

quotes.text: I'm the one that has to die when it's time for me to die, so let me live my life, the way I want to.
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.text: Who could refrain that had a heart to love and in that heart courage to make love known?

quotes.text: I was born in England - though both of my parents are American - and there's something about the 'Muppets' where they have this combination of English and American humor.
quotes.author: Nicholas Stoller

quotes.text: We have been so successful in the past century at the art of living longer and staying alive that we have forgotten how to die. Too often we learn the hard way. As soon as the baby boomers pass pensionable age, their lesson will be harsher still.

quotes.text: One of the things that makes me who I am is the loyalty I have to people I hold close to my heart.
quotes.author: Simone Elkeles,  Perfect Chemistry

quotes.text: If I know what love is, it is because of you.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.text: Invisible things are the only realities.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe,  Loss of Breath

quotes.text: Without words, without writing and without books there would be no history, there could be no concept of humanity.

quotes.text: To be creative means to be in love with life. You can be creative only if you love life enough that you want to enhance its beauty, you want to bring a little more music to it, a little more poetry to it, a little more dance to it.

quotes.text: Don’t sacrifice yourself too much, because if you sacrifice too much there’s nothing else you can give and nobody will care for you.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.text: Very occasionally, if you pay really close attention, life doesn't suck.
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.text: Love makes you want to be a better man—right, right. But maybe love, real love, also gives you permission to just be the man you are.
quotes.author: Gillian Flynn,  Gone Girl

quotes.text: I said hello to the poodle.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan,  The Lightning Thief

quotes.text: The rights of every man are diminished when the rights of one man are threatened.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.text: She leaned forward and caught at his hand, pressing it between her own. The touch was like white fire through his veins. He could not feel her skin only the cloth of her gloves, and yet it did not matter. You kindled me, heap of ashes that I am, into fire. He had wondered once why love was always phrased in terms of burning. The conflagration in his own veins, now, gave the answer.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare,  Clockwork Princess

quotes.text: Tears, idle tears, I know not what they mean, Tears from the depths of some devine despairRise in the heart, and gather to the eyes, In looking on the happy autumn fields, And thinking of the days that are no more.

quotes.text: There are two kinds of people I don't trust: people who don't drink and people who collect stickers.

quotes.text: Amateurs sit and wait for inspiration, the rest of us just get up and go to work.
quotes.author: Stephen King,  On Writing: A Memoir of the Craft

quotes.text: She is free in her wildness, she is a wanderess, a drop of free water. She knows nothing of borders and cares nothing for rules or customs. 'Time' for her isn’t something to fight against. Her life flows clean, with passion, like fresh water.
quotes.author: Roman Payne

quotes.text: Action expresses priorities.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Christian, you are the state lottery, the cure for cancer, and the three wishes from Aladdin's lamp all rolled into one
quotes.author: E.L. James,  Fifty Shades Freed

quotes.text: I have survived. I am here. Confused, screwed up, but here. So, how can I find my way? Is there a chain saw of the soul, an ax I can take to my memories or fears?

quotes.text: Don't think about making life better for other people who don't even deserve you, rather, focus on making your life the best, for yourself and those who love you.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.text: You never knew the last time you were seeing someone. You didn't know when the last argument happened, or the last time you had sex, or the last time you looked into their eyes and thanked God they were in your life.After they were gone?That was all you thought about.Day and night.
quotes.author: J.R. Ward,  Lover Mine

quotes.text: Don’t ask what the world needs. Ask what makes you come alive, and go do it. Because what the world needs is people who have come alive.
quotes.author: Howard Thurman

quotes.text: Adam was but human—this explains it all. He did not want the apple for the apple's sake, he wanted it only because it was forbidden. The mistake was in not forbidding the serpent; then he would have eaten the serpent.

quotes.text: Oft hope is born when all is forlorn.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien,  The Return of the King

quotes.text: Years of imprisoning and beheading writers never succeeded in shutting them out. However, placing them in the heart of a market and rewarding them with a lot of commercial success, has.

quotes.text: By definition, intelligence deals with the unclear, the unknown, the deliberately hidden. What the enemies of the United States hope to deny we work to reveal.

quotes.text: Even an animal, if you show genuine affection, gradually trust develops... If you always showing bad face and beating, how can you develop friendship?

quotes.text: A 'naughty pickle' is how I'd best describe myself. I think fun and laughter is the whole point of life.

quotes.text: I look at things logically. The humor I do is to go from A to B to C to D, and F is the funny.

quotes.text: Ye are Blood of my Blood, and Bone of my Bone,I give ye my Body, that we Two might be One.I give ye my Spirit, 'til our Life shall be Done.

quotes.text: Did I really want to stay on this road longer, knowing it was only going to end in devastation?

quotes.text: But remember, boy, that a kind act can sometimes be as powerful as a sword.

quotes.text: April is the cruelest month, breedinglilacs out of the dead land, mixingmemory and desire, stirringdull roots with spring rain.

quotes.text: Though much is taken, much abides; and thoughWe are not now that strength which in old daysMoved earth and heaven, that which we are, we are;One equal temper of heroic hearts,Made weak by time and fate, but strong in willTo strive, to seek, to find, and not to yield.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson,  Idylls of the King and a Selection of Poems

quotes.text: Dusk is just an illusion because the sun is either above the horizon or below it. And that means that day and night are linked in a way that few things are there cannot be one without the other yet they cannot exist at the same time. How would it feel I remember wondering to be always together yet forever apart?
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Notebook

quotes.text: You know what the fellow said – in Italy, for thirty years under the Borgias, they had warfare, terror, murder and bloodshed, but they produced Michelangelo, Leonardo da Vinci and the Renaissance. In Switzerland, they had brotherly love, they had five hundred years of democracy and peace – and what did that produce? The cuckoo clock.

quotes.text: I believe that what we become depends on what our fathers teach us at odd moments, when they aren't trying to teach us. We are formed by little scraps of wisdom.

quotes.text: I'm unpredictable, I never know where I'm going until I get there, I'm so random, I'm always growing, learning, changing, I'm never the same person twice. But one thing you can be sure of about me; is I will always do exactly what I want to do.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.text: That's the difference between me and the rest of the world! Happiness isn't good enough for me! I demand euphoria!

quotes.text: Second hand books are wild books, homeless books; they have come together in vast flocks of variegated feather, and have a charm which the domesticated volumes of the library lack.

quotes.text: We seldom realize, for example that our most private thoughts and emotions are not actually our own. For we think in terms of languages and images which we did not invent, but which were given to us by our society.

quotes.text: I believe that truth has only one face: that of a violent contradiction.

quotes.text: People should fall in love with their eyes closed.

quotes.text: Personally, I don't like the term 'success.' It's too arbitrary and too relative a thing. It's usually someone else's definition, not yours.

quotes.text: These people are real to me, and situations keep coming up where their emergence feels natural. It's like meeting old friends. I hope readers feel the same way.

quotes.text: All, everything that I understand, I understand only because I love.

quotes.text: Life imitates art far more than art imitates Life.

quotes.text: I want love to conquer all. But love can't conquer anything. It can't do anything on it's own.It relies on us to do the conquering on its behalf.

quotes.text: I know you're tired but come, this is the way.

quotes.text: The future is something which everyone reaches at the rate of sixty minutes an hour, whatever he does, whoever he is.

quotes.text: Never rearrange your life in order to meet Mr. Darcy half way. If he couldn’t see your worth at the moment you met then he won’t two years later. May the halls of Pemberly be filled with his regrets and your life filled with thankfulness because of this revelation.

quotes.text: If I were two-faced, would I be wearing this one?
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: All The Woulda-Coulda-ShouldasLayin' In The Sun,Talkin' 'Bout The ThingsThey Woulda-Coulda-Shoulda Done...But All Those Woulda-Coulda-ShouldasAll Ran Away And HidFrom One Little Did.
quotes.author: Shel Silverstein

quotes.text: In truth,there was only one christian and he died on the cross.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: In a world filled with hate, we must still dare to hope. In a world filled with anger, we must still dare to comfort. In a world filled with despair, we must still dare to dream. And in a world filled with distrust, we must still dare to believe.
quotes.author: Michael Jackson

quotes.text: Let us never forget to pray. God lives. He is near. He is real. He is not only aware of us but cares for us. He is our Father. He is accessible to all who will seek Him.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley,  Standing for Something: 10 Neglected Virtues That Will Heal Our Hearts and Homes

quotes.text: When you get into a tight place and everything goes against you, till it seems as though you could not hang on a minute longer, never give up then, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.text: You learn a lot about yourself when you have success for a while. Like, a lot of things that you think are really important aren't. But you need that process.

quotes.text: I made 'Bowling for Columbine' in the hope the school shootings would stop and that we would address the issue of how easy it is to get a gun in the United States, and tragically, those school shootings continue.

quotes.text: The greatest sweetener of human life is Friendship. To raise this to the highest pitch of enjoyment, is a secret which but few discover.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.text: People grow through experience if they meet life honestly and courageously. This is how character is built.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Disneyland is a work of love. We didn't go into Disneyland just with the idea of making money.

quotes.text: I like men who have goals, something that they are passionate about and work hard to achieve. A good sense of humor is important too. And I like tall guys!
quotes.author: Ana Ivanovic

quotes.text: When you create art, the world has to wait.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.text: I've never forgotten him. Dare I say I miss him? I do. I miss him. I still see him in my dreams. They are nightmares mostly, but nightmares tinged with love. Such is the strangeness of the human heart. I still cannot understand how he could abandon me so unceremoniously, without any sort of goodbye, without looking back even once. The pain is like an axe that chops my heart.
quotes.author: Yann Martel,  Life of Pi

quotes.text: There are women who make things better... simply by showing up. There are women who make things happen. There are women who make their way. There are women who make a difference. And women who make us smile. There are women of wit and wisdom who- through strength and courage- make it through. There are women who change the world everyday... Women like you.
quotes.author: Ashley Rice

quotes.text: Laughter is poison to fear.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin,  A Game of Thrones

quotes.text: In all of living, have much fun and laughter. Life is to be enjoyed, not just endured.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.text: No. No, I don't believe you'd betray me with her. I don't believe you'd cheat on me. But I'm afraid, and I'm sick in my heart that you might look at her, then at me. And regret.
quotes.author: J.D. Robb,  Innocent in Death

quotes.text: In writing, you must kill all your darlings.

quotes.text: Though lovers be lost, love shall not; And death shall have no dominion.
quotes.author: Dylan Thomas

quotes.text: Remember that everyone you meet is afraid of something, loves something and has lost something.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quotes.text: I just got out of the hospital. I was in a speed reading accident. I hit a book mark and flew across the room.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.text: It is wise to direct your anger towards problems -- not people; to focus your energies on answers -- not excuses.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.text: The person you became with her is worth being.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth,  Allegiant

quotes.text: Your conscience is the measure of the honesty of your selfishness.Listen to it carefully.
quotes.author: Richard Bach,  Illusions: The Adventures of a Reluctant Messiah

quotes.text: I guess what I'm trying to say is that you are there, in everything I am, in everything I've ever done, and looking back, I know that I should have told you know much you've always meant to me.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Wedding

quotes.text: to love is to destroy, and that to be loved is to be the one destroyed.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Bones

quotes.text: Reality means you live until you die...the real truth is nobody wants reality.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Survivor

quotes.text: Follow your bliss and the universe will open doors where there were only walls.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.text: Fame necessarily isn't really tied to success at all. Fame is just being recognized for doing what you do, whether it's good or bad. Osama bin Laden was famous.

quotes.text: And as far as false hope, there is no such thing. There is only hope or the absence of hope-nothing else.
quotes.author: Patti Davis

quotes.text: Most people are enduring a marginalized isolation. One of the great obstacles to modern friendships is the 'religion of rush.' People are rushing all the time through time. Friendship takes time.
quotes.author: John O'Donohue

quotes.text: Far and away the best prize that life has to offer is the chance to work hard at work worth doing.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: The only way to get love is to be lovable. It's very irritating if you have a lot of money. You'd like to think you could write a check: 'I'll buy a million dollars' worth of love.' But it doesn't work that way. The more you give love away, the more you get.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.text: There's public humor, and there's private humor, and they're all appropriate in their own way, and you shouldn't - just as you wouldn't have a megaphone and say certain things that you would say around your friends - things that are perfectly all right within your close social group with whom you share a certain context.
quotes.author: Robert Mankoff

quotes.text: The art of pleasing is the art of deception.
quotes.author: Luc de Clapiers

quotes.text: I've always loved you, and when you love someone, you love the whole person, just as he or she is, and not as you would like them to be.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy,  Anna Karenina

quotes.text: You are, after all, what you think. Your emotions are the slaves to your thoughts, and you are the slave to your emotions.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert,  Eat, Pray, Love

quotes.text: Stephen kissed me in the spring,Robin in the fall,But Colin only looked at meAnd never kissed at all.Stephen’s kiss was lost in jest,Robin’s lost in play,But the kiss in Colin’s eyesHaunts me night and day.
quotes.author: Sara Teasdale,  The Collected Poems

quotes.text: And now I know why they invented words for love, why they had to: It's the only thing that can come close to describing what I feel in that moment, the baffling mixture of pain and pleasure and fear and joy, all running sharply through me at once.
quotes.author: Lauren Oliver,  Delirium

quotes.text: Just because you fall once, doesn't mean you're fall at everything. Keep trying, hold on, and always trust yourself, because if you don't then who will??
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: There's more beauty in truth, even if it is dreadful beauty.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck,  East of Eden

quotes.text: No one can say that death found in me a willing comrade, or that I went easily.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare,  Clockwork Princess

quotes.text: Ever since I’ve met you, I’ve wanted to break every rule.” Aiden turned away, the muscles in his neck tensing. He sighed. “You’ll become the centre of someone’s world one day. And he’ll be the luckiest son of a bitch on this earth.
quotes.author: Jennifer L. Armentrout,  Pure

quotes.text: If there were such a thing as terminal literalism, you'd have died in childhood.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Bones

quotes.text: A man's true character comes out when he's drunk.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.text: Don't ask for guarantees. And don't look to be saved in any one thing, person, machine, or library. Do your own bit of saving, and if you drown, at least die knowing you were heading for shore.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury,  Fahrenheit 451

quotes.text: We must live together as brothers or perish together as fools.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.text: My success is the team's success. It's one of those things to a certain degree that it's effort and ability but also how I benefit from what my teammates do, and then it is up to me to perform.
quotes.author: Jason Babin

quotes.text: I think the thing about film is, as it gets proved by a lot of young filmmakers now, that the medium will just go on reinventing itself, and so you just hope to be a part of that and not a part of some kind of endless regurgitation or 'Here I am doing what you know I do' kind of thing.
quotes.author: Alan Rickman

quotes.text: People are roasting each other at parties, at work events, around the fire. It's so fun. People are busting each other's chops, and it's a sign of affection, truly. It's a true test of love and friendship: can you make a man laugh at himself? So what makes a good burn? Go after targets you love and respect. And hit 'em hard.
quotes.author: Jeff Ross

quotes.text: If you want to do really important things in life and big things in life, you can't do anything by yourself. And your best teams are your friends and your siblings.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.text: It is good to realize that if love and peace can prevail on earth, and if we can teach our children to honor nature's gifts, the joys and beauties of the outdoors will be here forever.
quotes.author: Jimmy Carter

quotes.text: When I started, I wanted to be thought of as tortured and seductive, not funny, but humor tends to be a reflexive part of a person's sensibility. It's an almost impossible thing to teach anyone, which leads me to believe that it's intuitive.
quotes.author: Mark Leyner

quotes.text: Love is the strangest, most illogical thing in the world.
quotes.author: Jennifer E. Smith,  The Statistical Probability of Love at First Sight

quotes.text: I just wanted to tell you that I understand if you go. It’s okay if you have to leave us. It’s okay if you want to stop fighting.
quotes.author: Gayle Forman,  If I Stay

quotes.text: The power of finding beauty in the humblest things makes home happy and life lovely.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.text: If I let myself love you, I won't throw myself in front of her. I'll throw myself in front of you.
quotes.author: Richelle Mead,  Vampire Academy

quotes.text: Writing is a way of talking without being interrupted.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.text: If it’s true that our species is alone in the universe, then I’d have to say the universe aimed rather low and settled for very little.
quotes.author: George Carlin,  Napalm & Silly Putty

quotes.text: How can you tell? That I like books, I mean.The look on your face when you walked in, somehow I doubted you were that impressed by me.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Bones

quotes.text: The best discoveries always happened to the people who weren't looking for them.
quotes.author: Morgan Matson,  Amy and Roger's Epic Detour

quotes.text: Whatever the mind can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill,  Think and Grow Rich: A Black Choice

quotes.text: This is my simple religion. No need for temples. No need for complicated philosophy. Your own mind, your own heart is the temple. Your philosophy is simple kindness.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.text: She wasnt exactly sure when it happened. Or even when it started. All she knew for sure was that right here and now, she was falling hard and she could only pray that he was feeling the same way.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks,  Safe Haven

quotes.text: Laughter is the sound of the soul dancing. My soul probably looks like Fred Astaire.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quotes.text: I am a happy camper so I guess I’m doing something right. Happiness is like a butterfly; the more you chase it, the more it will elude you, but if you turn your attention to other things, it will come and sit softly on your shoulder.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: Who is more to be pitied, a writer bound and gagged by policemen or one living in perfect freedom who has nothing more to say?
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.text: The books transported her into new worlds and introduced her to amazing people who lived exciting lives. She went on olden-day sailing ships with Joseph Conrad. She went to Africa with Ernest Hemingway and to India with Rudyard Kipling. She travelled all over the world while sitting in her little room in an English village.
quotes.author: Roald Dahl,  Matilda

quotes.text: Never knock on death's door. Ring the doorbell then run. He totally hates that. - T-shirt
quotes.author: Darynda Jones,  First Grave on the Right

quotes.text: Great, tell me when you've defeated Voldemort for me, will you?
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quotes.text: We are an impossibility in an impossible universe.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.text: There's nothing wrong with reading a book you love over and over. When you do, the words get inside you, become a part of you, in a way that words in a book you've read only once can't.
quotes.author: Gail Carson Levine,  Writing Magic: Creating Stories that Fly

quotes.text: If a black cat crosses your path, it signifies that the animal is going somewhere.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.text: Come away, O human child!To the waters and the wildWith a faery, hand in hand,For the world's more full of weeping than you can understand.
quotes.author: W.B. Yeats,  The Collected Poems of W.B. Yeats

quotes.text: A good novel tells us the truth about its hero; but a bad novel tells us the truth about its author.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton,  Heretics

quotes.text: The easiest thing to be in the world is you. The most difficult thing to be is what other people want you to be. Don't let them put you in that position.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.text: Humor keeps us alive. Humor and food. Don't forget food. You can go a week without laughing.
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.text: I never worry about diets. The only carrots that interest me are the number you get in a diamond.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.text: Science investigates; religion interprets. Science gives man knowledge, which is power; religion gives man wisdom, which is control. Science deals mainly with facts; religion deals mainly with values. The two are not rivals.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.text: Someone is sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.text: It is no coincidence that our country has not been attacked since 9-11. Our initiatives to protect the homeland and aggressively take the fight to the terrorists have been factors in that success.
quotes.author: Roger Wicker

quotes.text: A lot of tragedy can befall us, but there's always something else; there's always hope.
quotes.author: Chris Pine

quotes.text: For me my friendship with Omar Rodriguez from Mars Volta that friendship really means a lot to me because he's another creative person who works as hard as I do.
quotes.author: John Frusciante

quotes.text: Holding on to anger, resentment and hurt only gives you tense muscles, a headache and a sore jaw from clenching your teeth. Forgiveness gives you back the laughter and the lightness in your life.
quotes.author: Joan Lunden

quotes.text: I'm very shy, and I shy away from people. But the moment I hit the stage, it's a different feeling I get nerve from somewhere; maybe it's because it's something I love to do.

quotes.text: M*A*S*H offered real characters and everybody identified with them because they had such soul. The humor was intelligent and it always assumed that you had an intellect.
quotes.author: Loretta Swit

quotes.text: I don't listen to punk any more, unless it's right before I play. Not that I don't like it, it's nostalgic. But, it's for kids and it should be... it's not art, it's expression.
quotes.author: Tom DeLonge

quotes.text: I heard a definition once: Happiness is health and a short memory! I wish I'd invented it, because it is very true.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: When a child asks you something, answer him, for goodness sake. But don't make a production of it. Children are children, but they can spot an evasion faster than adults, and evasion simply muddles 'em.
quotes.author: Harper Lee,  To Kill a Mockingbird

quotes.text: My Life is My Message
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: You don’t believe things because they make your life better, you believe them because they’re true.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth,  Allegiant

quotes.text: For what is it to die but to stand naked in the wind and to melt into the sun? And when the earth shall claim your limbs, then shall you truly dance.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.text: Prime numbers are what is left when you have taken all the patterns away. I think prime numbers are like life. They are very logical but you could never work out the rules, even if you spent all your time thinking about them.
quotes.author: Mark Haddon,  The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time

quotes.text: The most incomprehensible thing about the world is that it is at all comprehensible.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: There are no random acts...We are all connected...You can no more separate one life from another than you can separate a breeze from the wind...
quotes.author: Mitch Albom,  The Five People You Meet in Heaven

quotes.text: Don't kiss me like a woman if you're going to treat me like a child.
quotes.author: Jeaniene Frost,  Halfway to the Grave

quotes.text: For Nirvana, putting out their first major-label record was like getting into a new car. But the runaway success was like suddenly discovering that the car was a Ferrari and the accelerator pedal was Krazy Glued to the floorboard.
quotes.author: Michael Azerrad

quotes.text: I'm naturally an optimist, but my basis for hope is rooted in my understanding of human nature.
quotes.author: Al Gore

quotes.text: It is one of the severest tests of friendship to tell your friend his faults. So to love a man that you cannot bear to see a stain upon him, and to speak painful truth through loving words, that is friendship.

quotes.text: The essential lesson I've learned in life is to just be yourself. Treasure the magnificent being that you are and recognize first and foremost you're not here as a human being only. You're a spiritual being having a human experience.

quotes.text: The way I see it is that love can put an end to this bureaucracy people go through in their relationships. But it can't blind you to the fact that maybe there are bombs, there are problems and the ozone layer is depleting.
quotes.author: Adrienne Shelly

quotes.text: In business, there are times when you disagree, and sometimes it turns out that you're just plain wrong. Humor takes away tension and helps you realize you're wrong.
quotes.author: Craig Newmark

quotes.text: Art is nothing but the expression of our dream; the more we surrender to it the closer we get to the inner truth of things, our dream-life, the true life that scorns questions and does not see them.
quotes.author: Franz Marc

quotes.text: The story of life is quicker than the wink of an eye, the story of love is hello and goodbye...until we meet again
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.text: Don't interrupt me while I'm interrupting.
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.text: Nothing is permanent in this wicked world, not even our troubles.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.text: I sustain myself with the love of family.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Well,” Tessa said, sighting along the line of the knife, “you behave as if you dislike me. In fact, you behave as if you dislike us all.”“I don’t,” Gabriel said. “I just dislike him.” He pointed at Will.“Dear me,” said Will, and he took another bite of his apple. “Is it because I’m better-looking than you?
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare,  Clockwork Prince

quotes.text: If you dont have any shadows you're not in the light
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.text: So why in the name of Merlin’s saggy left —”“Don’t talk to your mother like that.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quotes.text: I wish...I wish I were dead...”“And what use would that be to anyone?
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quotes.text: We have to recognise that there cannot be relationships unless there is commitment, unless there is loyalty, unless there is love, patience, persistence.
quotes.author: Cornel West,  Breaking Bread: Insurgent Black Intellectual Life

quotes.text: A book is a gift you can open again and again.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.text: We were not a hugging people. In terms of emotional comfort it was our belief that no amount of physical contact could match the healing powers of a well made cocktail.
quotes.author: David Sedaris,  Naked

quotes.text: Remember, if you ever need a helping hand, it's at the end of your arm, as you get older, remember you have another hand: The first is to help yourself, the second is to help others.

quotes.text: Man is a mystery. It needs to be unravelled, and if you spend your whole life unravelling it, don't say that you've wasted time. I am studying that mystery because I want to be a human being.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quotes.text: God is a comedian playing to an audience that is too afraid to laugh.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: Some people claim that marriage interferes with romance. There's no doubt about it. Anytime you have a romance, your wife is bound to interfere.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.text: Spend enough time around success and failure, and you learn a reverence for possibility.
quotes.author: Dale Dauten

quotes.text: I don't think I'm romantic at all. I have a lot of faith in the right thing happening. I don't really hope for a lot of particulars, I just have faith that the right thing will happen most of the time.
quotes.author: Juliana Hatfield

quotes.text: Love is friendship set on fire.
quotes.author: Jeremy Taylor

quotes.text: People come together with their families to celebrate Easter. What better way to celebrate than to spend a few hours going on the journey of Christ's life.
quotes.author: Roma Downey

quotes.text: I love Mickey Mouse more than any woman I have ever known.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: I've never used my weight to get a laugh. That is, used my size as the subject for humor. You never saw me stuck in a door-way or stuck in a chair.

quotes.text: Art is not supposed to change the world, to change practical things, but to change perceptions. Art can change the way we see the world. Art can create an analogy.
quotes.author: JR

quotes.text: Happiness is not a possession to be prized, it is a quality of thought, a state of mind.
quotes.author: Daphne du Maurier,  Rebecca

quotes.text: Nobody owns life, but anyone who can pick up a frying pan owns death.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.text: Life is funny. Things change, people change, but you will always be you, so stay true to yourself and never sacrifice who you are for anyone.
quotes.author: Zayn Malik

quotes.text: How far would you go to keep the hope of love alive?
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Choice

quotes.text: I don't think that there are any limits to how excellent we could make life seem.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer,  Everything Is Illuminated

quotes.text: I felt like one of Apollo's sacred cows- slow, dumb, and bright red.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan,  The Last Olympian

quotes.text: Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the body.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.text: There is no intensity of love or feeling that does not involve the risk of crippling hurt. It is a duty to take this risk, to love and feel without defense or reserve.

quotes.text: The most common form of despair is not being who you are.
quotes.author: Søren Kierkegaard

quotes.text: So Matilda’s strong young mind continued to grow, nurtured by the voices of all those authors who had sent their books out into the world like ships on the sea. These books gave Matilda a hopeful and comforting message: You are not alone.

quotes.text: I went away in my head, into a book. That was where I went whenever real life was too hard or too inflexible.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman,  The Ocean at the End of the Lane

quotes.text: Because God is never cruel, there is a reason for all things. We must know the pain of loss; because if we never knew it, we would have no compassion for others, and we would become monsters of self-regard, creatures of unalloyed self-interest. The terrible pain of loss teaches humility to our prideful kind, has the power to soften uncaring hearts, to make a better person of a good one.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz,  The Darkest Evening of the Year

quotes.text: Learn the rules like a pro, so you can break them like an artist.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: Only love of a good woman will make a man question every choice, every action. Only love makes a warrior hesitate for fear that his lady will find him cruel. Only love makes a man both the best he will ever be, and the weakest. Sometimes all in the same moment. -Wicked
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.text: This is Annabeth,” Jason said. “Uh, normally she doesn't judo-flip people.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan,  The Mark of Athena

quotes.text: Many people, meeting Aziraphale for the first time, formed three impressions: that he was English, that he was intelligent, and that he was gayer than a treeful of monkeys on nitrous oxide.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett,  Good Omens: The Nice and Accurate Prophecies of Agnes Nutter, Witch

quotes.text: Seldom, very seldom, does complete truth belong to any human disclosure; seldom can it happen that something is not a little disguised or a little mistaken.
quotes.author: Jane Austen,  Emma

quotes.text: A good poem is a contribution to reality. The world is never the same once a good poem has been added to it. A good poem helps to change the shape of the universe, helps to extend everyone's knowledge of himself and the world around him.

quotes.text: If at first you don't succeed then skydiving definitely isn't for you.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.text: The most valuable of all talents is that of never using two words when one will do.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: There are some things, after all, that Sally Owens knows for certain: Always throw spilled salt over your left shoulder. Keep rosemary by your garden gate. Add pepper to your mashed potatoes. Plant roses and lavender, for luck. Fall in love whenever you can.
quotes.author: Alice Hoffman,  Practical Magic

quotes.text: With self-discipline most anything is possible.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Remember you will not always win. Some days, the most resourceful individual will taste defeat. But there is, in this case, always tomorrow - after you have done your best to achieve success today.

quotes.text: A lot of times when you're making a record, you put your head down and charge forward until you're done. You just hope that the ideas hold up, because you're kind of lost in your own storm.
quotes.author: Robbie Robertson

quotes.text: I made my first white women friends in college; they loved me and were loyal to our friendship, but I understood, as they did, that they were white women and that whiteness mattered.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.text: The whole notion of pain, and how every individual experiences pain, is up for debate. We don't know how another person experiences pain - physical pain or psychic pain. Some of these clinics where assisted suicide or euthanasia is practiced, they call it 'weariness of life.'

quotes.text: Humor is a very important thing. It is a natural predilection. It is an emotional release.
quotes.author: Ray Stevenson

quotes.text: My own interest in art was because of my mother. My father didn't like contemporary art, so he didn't give her large sums to spend. So, she began buying prints and drawings. During my school days, I remember sitting in on many of the early meetings.
quotes.author: David Rockefeller

quotes.text: Certain thoughts are prayers. There are moments when, whatever be the attitude of the body, the soul is on its knees.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: I've come to believe that each of us has a personal calling that's as unique as a fingerprint - and that the best way to succeed is to discover what you love and then find a way to offer it to others in the form of service, working hard, and also allowing the energy of the universe to lead you.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi Jr.

quotes.text: Live your truth. Express your love. Share your enthusiasm. Take action towards your dreams. Walk your talk. Dance and sing to your music. Embrace your blessings. Make today worth remembering.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quotes.text: Always remember, your focus determines your reality.
quotes.author: George Lucas

quotes.text: Though the road's been rocky it sure feels good to me.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.text: He that breaks a thing to find out what it is has left the path of wisdom.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien,  The Fellowship of the Ring

quotes.text: I am very happyBecause I have conquered myselfAnd not the world.I am very happyBecause I have loved the worldAnd not myself.
quotes.author: Sri Chinmoy

quotes.text: There is no such thing as a moral or an immoral book.Books are well written, or badly written. That is all.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde,  The Picture of Dorian Gray

quotes.text: Because there is no glory in illness. There is no meaning to it. There is no honor in dying of.
quotes.author: John Green,  The Fault in Our Stars

quotes.text: You must take life the way it comes at you and make the best of it.
quotes.author: Yann Martel,  Life of Pi

quotes.text: If you only had 48 hours left to live, would you spend it like you normally spend your weekends? If not, why spend 2/7th of your life wasting your free time? After all, free time isn’t free. Free time is the most expensive time you have, because nobody pays for it but you. But that also makes it the most valuable time you have, as you alone stand to reap the profits from spending it wisely.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz,  I Should Have Renamed This

quotes.text: The price of greatness is responsibility.
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.text: But when I do feel all the strength go out of me, and I fall to my knees beside the table and I think I cry, then, or at least I want to, and everything inside me screams for just one more kiss, one more word, one more glance, one more.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth,  Allegiant

quotes.text: One is not born, but rather becomes, a woman.
quotes.author: Simone de Beauvoir,  The Second Sex

quotes.text: Despite the enormous quantity of books, how few people read! And if one reads profitably, one would realize how much stupid stuff the vulgar herd is content to swallow every day.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: Everyone here has the sense that right now is one of those moments when we are influencing the future.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Success depends almost entirely on how effectively you learn to manage the game's two ultimate adversaries: the course and yourself.
quotes.author: Jack Nicklaus

quotes.text: I certainly hope 'Dragon' can leave some legacy behind.
quotes.author: Donnie Yen

quotes.text: It is difficult to obtain the friendship of a cat. It is a philosophical animal... one that does not place its affections thoughtlessly.
quotes.author: Theophile Gautier

quotes.text: The primary source of the appeal of Christianity was Jesus - His incarnation, His life, His crucifixion, and His resurrection.
quotes.author: Kenneth Scott Latourette

quotes.text: We abuse land because we regard it as a commodity belonging to us. When we see land as a community to which we belong, we may begin to use it with love and respect.
quotes.author: Aldo Leopold

quotes.text: I was that weird kid that checked out all of the non-fiction paranormal studies books from the library. I've always been fascinated by the supernatural, particularly movies and TV shows that manage to blend humor with the horror - 'Supernatural', 'Buffy', 'Angel.'
quotes.author: Molly Harper

quotes.text: Art never harms itself by keeping aloof from the social problems of the day: rather, by so doing, it more completely realises for us that which we desire.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: Being brave is when you have to do something because you know it is right, but at the same time, you are afraid to do it, because it might hurt or whatever. But you do it anyway.
quotes.author: Meg Cabot,  All-American Girl

quotes.text: Forever and ever, kid, until you're sick and tired of seeing me.
quotes.author: Marie Lu,  Legend

quotes.text: Be melting snow.Wash yourself of yourself.
quotes.author: Rumi,  The Essential Rumi

quotes.text: Choose your love. Love your choice.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.text: The tattoo is just setting below his hp bone. H e l l i s e m p t y a n d a l l t h e d e v i l s a r e h e r eI kiss my way across the words.Kissing away the devils.Kissing away the pain.
quotes.author: Tahereh Mafi,  Ignite Me

quotes.text: If you hang out with chickens, you're going to cluck and if you hang out with eagles, you're going to fly.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quotes.text: We all need to be mocked from time to time, lest we take ourselves too seriously.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.text: Some of you say, “Joy is greater than sorrow,” and others say, “Nay, sorrow is the greater.”But I say unto you, they are inseparable.Together they come, and when one sits alone with you at your board, remember that the other is asleep upon your bed.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran,  The Prophet

quotes.text: Yes... it wasn't over, it still isn't over.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.text: Weeping is not the same thing as crying. It takes your whole body to weep, and when it's over, you feel like you don't have any bones left to hold you up.
quotes.author: Sarah Ockler,  Twenty Boy Summer

quotes.text: When you forgive, you love. And when you love, God’s light shines upon you.
quotes.author: Jon Krakauer,  Into the Wild

quotes.text: They're in love. Fuck the war.
quotes.author: Thomas Pynchon,  Gravity's Rainbow

quotes.text: What is it with you today?” says Christina on the way to breakfast. Her eyes are stillswollen from sleep and her tangled hair forms a fuzzy halo around her face.“Oh, you know,” I say. “Sun shining. Birds chirping.”She raises an eyebrow at me, as if reminding me that we are in an undergroundtunnel.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth,  Divergent

quotes.text: Are you upset little friend? Have you been lying awake worrying? Well, don't worry...I'm here. The flood waters will recede, the famine will end, the sun will shine tomorrow, and I will always be here to take care of you.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.text: As mothers and daughters, we are connected with one another. My mother is the bones of my spine, keeping me straight and true. She is my blood, making sure it runs rich and strong. She is the beating of my heart. I cannot now imagine a life without her.
quotes.author: Kristin Hannah,  Summer Island

quotes.text: Procrastinate now, don't put it off.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.text: You buy furniture. You tell yourself, this is the last sofa I will ever need in my life. Buy the sofa, then for a couple years you're satisfied that no matter what goes wrong, at least you've got your sofa issue handled. Then the right set of dishes. Then the perfect bed. The drapes. The rug. Then you're trapped in your lovely nest, and the things you used to own, now they own you.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Fight Club

quotes.text: Your children are the greatest gift God will give to you, and their souls the heaviest responsibility He will place in your hands. Take time with them, teach them to have faith in God. Be a person in whom they can have faith. When you are old, nothing else you've done will have mattered as much.
quotes.author: Lisa Wingate

quotes.text: I turned silences and nights into words. What was unutterable, I wrote down. I made the whirling world stand still.
quotes.author: Arthur Rimbaud,  A Season in Hell/The Drunken Boat

quotes.text: We are like sculptors, constantly carving out of others the image we long for, need, love or desire, often against reality, against their benefit, and always, in the end, a disappointment, because it does not fit them.
quotes.author: Anaïs Nin

quotes.text: My parents were very open about what kind of talent I had. They never pushed me to become an accountant because they knew that would be just absolutely ridiculous. So they were encouraging in what I am able to do with some success.

It's a society where relationships are built on love.

And while men admire the quality of the first they love the produce of the second.

When it is over, I don't want to wonderif I have made of my life something particular, and real.I don't want to find myself sighing and frightened,or full of argument. I don't want to end up simply having visited this world.

quotes.text: Killing is not so easy as the innocent believe.

Don't get me wrong - the humor and ideas are often sophisticated - but the books aren't hard to read. I wanted kids who hate reading to find these books irresistible.

quotes.text: Love is a serious mental disease.

quotes.text: The magic is only in what books say, how they stitched the patches of the universe together into one garment for us.

quotes.text: I AM IGNORANT of absolute truth. But I am humble before my ignorance and therein lies my honor and my reward.

quotes.text: The more you love someone, he came to think, the harder it is to tell them. It surprised him that strangers didn't stop each other on the street to say I love you.

quotes.text: Grown ups are complicated creatures, full of quirks and secrets.

quotes.text: The sense of unhappiness is so much easier to convey than that of happiness. But happiness annihilates us: we lose our identity.

quotes.text: A small daily task, if it be really daily, will beat the labours of a spasmodic Hercules.

quotes.text: If you love something so much let it go. If it comes back it was meant to be; if it doesn't it never was
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.text: The only drink I like ice in is water, because you can’t water down water. I’m like that with love, too. Don’t you dare add any ice to the hot liquid loving I’m trying to pour all over you.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.

quotes.text: Wait. Why am I thinking about Krispy Kremes? We’re supposed to be exercising.
quotes.author: Meg Cabot,  Big Boned

quotes.text: What can I do with my happiness? How can I keep it, conceal it, bury it where I may never lose it? I want to kneel as it falls over me like rain, gather it up with lace and silk, and press it over myself again.
quotes.author: Anaïs Nin,  Henry & June

quotes.text: My soul is impatient with itself, as with a bothersome child; its restlessness keeps growing and is forever the same. Everything interests me, but nothing holds me. I attend to everything, dreaming all the while. […]. I'm two, and both keep their distance — Siamese twins that aren't attached.
quotes.author: Fernando Pessoa,  The Book of Disquiet

quotes.text: When you love someone, its never over. You move on, because you have to but you take them with you in your heart
quotes.author: Elizabeth Chandler,  Kissed by an Angel

quotes.text: If you've never eaten while crying you don t know what life tastes like.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.text: There is nothing more frightful than ignorance in action.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe,  Collected Works

quotes.text: To love is to recognize yourself in another.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.text: If you haven't got anything nice to say about anybody come sit next to me.
quotes.author: Alice Roosevelt Longworth

quotes.text: It's true, I am afraid of dying. I am afraid of the world moving forward without me, of my absence going unnoticed, or worse, being some natural force propelling life on. Is it selfish? Am I such a bad person for dreaming of a world that ends when I do? I don't mean the world ending with respect to me, but every set of eyes closing with mine.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer,  Everything Is Illuminated

quotes.text: You looove me. (holds out arms) You love me this much.
quotes.author: James Patterson,  Saving the World and Other Extreme Sports

quotes.text: Letting go gives us freedom, and freedom is the only condition for happiness. If, in our heart, we still cling to anything - anger, anxiety, or possessions - we cannot be free.
quotes.author: Hanh Nhat Thich,  The Heart of the Buddha's Teaching: Transforming Suffering into Peace, Joy, and Liberation

quotes.text: There are no coincidences in life. What person that wandered in and out of your life was there for some purpose, even if they caused you harm. Sometimes, it doesn’t make sense the short periods of time we get with people, or the outcomes from their choices. However, if you turn it over to God he promises that you will see the big picture in the hereafter. Nothing is too small to be a mistake.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.text: Once we believe in ourselves, we can risk curiosity, wonder, spontaneous delight, or any experience that reveals the human spirit.
quotes.author: e. e. cummings

quotes.text: While I was doing stand-up, I thought I knew for sure that success meant getting everyone to like me. So I became whoever I thought people wanted me to be. I'd say yes when I wanted to say no, and I even wore a few dresses.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.text: Some men don't have the opportunity to be the type of father they need to be, and I hope my example teaches them to step up.
quotes.author: Marvin Sapp

quotes.text: A friend is an emotional bond, just like friendship is a human experience.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.text: Meditation is to dive all the way within, beyond thought, to the source of thought and pure consciousness. It enlarges the container, every time you transcend. When you come out, you come out refreshed, filled with energy and enthusiasm for life.
quotes.author: David Lynch

quotes.text: Do what you love. Know your own bone; gnaw at it, bury it, unearth it, and gnaw it still.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: The Muslims in the Cape are associated with having a very good sense of humor.
quotes.author: Riaad Moosa

quotes.text: Nothing is as dangerous in architecture as dealing with separated problems. If we split life into separated problems we split the possibilities to make good building art.
quotes.author: Alvar Aalto

quotes.text: Everything with me is either worship and passion or pity and understanding. I hate rarely, though when I hate, I hate murderously. For example now, I hate the bank and everything connected with it. I also hate Dutch paintings, penis-sucking, parties, and cold rainy weather. But I am much more preoccupied with loving.
quotes.author: Anaïs Nin,  Henry and June: From "A Journal of Love"--The Unexpurgated Diary of Anaïs Nin

quotes.text: To the world you may be one person but to one person you may be the world.
quotes.author: Bill Wilson

quotes.text: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.text: Patience and wisdom walk hand in hand, like two one-armed lovers.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz,  $3.33

quotes.text: At some point we all look up and realize we are lost in a maze.
quotes.author: John Green,  Looking for Alaska

quotes.text: People say that eyes are windows to the soul.
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini,  The Kite Runner

quotes.text: In my rush, I hadn’t tied my shoelaces. Noah was now tying them for me. He looked up at me through his dark fringe of lashes and smiled. The expression on his face melted me completely. I knew I had the goofiest grin plastered on my lips, and didn’t care. “There,” he said as he finished tying the laces on my left shoe. “Now you won’t fall.”Too late.
quotes.author: Michelle Hodkin,  The Unbecoming of Mara Dyer

quotes.text: But still, I find the need to remind myself of the temporariness of a day, to reassure myself that I got through yesterday, I'll get through today.
quotes.author: Gayle Forman,  Where She Went

quotes.text: Do you know what breakfast cereal is made of? It's made of all those little curly wooden shavings you find in pencil sharpeners!
quotes.author: Roald Dahl

quotes.text: You save yourself or you remain unsaved.
quotes.author: Alice Sebold

quotes.text: Maturity is a bitter disappointment for which no remedy exists, unless laughter could be said to remedy anything.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.text: I do not care so much what I am to others as I care what I am to myself.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.text: I'm a kind of paranoiac in reverse. I suspect people of plotting to make me happy.
quotes.author: J.D. Salinger,  Raise High the Roof Beam, Carpenters & Seymour: An Introduction

quotes.text: A woman must have money and a room of her own if she is to write fiction.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf,  A Room of One's Own

quotes.text: I want words at my funeral. But I guess that means you need life in your life.
quotes.author: Markus Zusak,  The Book Thief

quotes.text: I have no idea what's awaiting me, or what will happen when this all ends. For the moment I know this: there are sick people and they need curing.
quotes.author: Albert Camus,  The Plague

quotes.text: Write it. Shoot it. Publish it. Crochet it, sauté it, whatever. MAKE.
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.text: Why do people always assume that volume will succeed when logic won’t? - Damon
quotes.author: L.J. Smith,  Nightfall

quotes.text: For one human being to love another human being: that is perhaps the most difficult task that has been given to us, the ultimate, the final problem and proof, the work for which all other work is merely preparation.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke,  The Selected Poetry of Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.text: I'm not saying I'm gonna change the world, but I guarantee that I will spark the brain that will change the world.
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.text: You are the only you God made... God made you and broke the mold.
quotes.author: Max Lucado,  Cure for the Common Life: Living in Your Sweet Spot

quotes.text: I am no longer in love with her, that's certain, but maybe I love her. Love is so short, forgetting is so long.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda,  Twenty Love Poems and a Song of Despair

quotes.text: Yesterday is but a dream,Tomorrow is only a vision. But today well lived makes every yesterday a dream of happiness, and every tomorrow a vision of hope.
quotes.author: Kālidāsa,  The complete works of Kalidasa

quotes.text: I write for the same reason I breathe - because if I didn't, I would die.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.text: All that you touchYou Change.All that you ChangeChanges you.The only lasting truthis Change.Godis Change.
quotes.author: Octavia E. Butler

quotes.text: A truly great book should be read in youth, again in maturity and once more in old age, as a fine building should be seen by morning light, at noon and by moonlight.
quotes.author: Robertson Davies

quotes.text: There's more to life than success, and if you can try to be more well-rounded, you'll be able to enjoy your success more. It won't own you or control you.
quotes.author: Ricky Williams

quotes.text: I hope to refine music, study it, try to find some area that I can unlock. I don't quite know how to explain it but it's there. These can't be the only notes in the world, there's got to be other notes some place, in some dimension, between the cracks on the piano keys.
quotes.author: Marvin Gaye

quotes.text: Many that live deserve death. And some that die deserve life. Can you give it to them? Then do not be too eager to deal out death in judgement. For even the very wise cannot see all ends.
quotes.author: J. R. R. Tolkien

quotes.text: Chemistry can be a good and bad thing. Chemistry is good when you make love with it. Chemistry is bad when you make crack with it.
quotes.author: Adam Sandler

quotes.text: I seem to have a one-track mind. When I was having babies, I did nothing else. When I do pictures, I go all out. I really think it is easier to manage my seven. You can't afford to humor each one of them. They have to learn to do things when they are told.
quotes.author: Maureen O'Sullivan

quotes.text: Nobody's ever asked me to a party before, as a friend. Is that why you dyed your eyebrow, for the party? Should I do mine too?
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

quotes.text: Sometimes, just saying that you hate something, and having someone agree with you, can make you feel better about a terrible situation.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket,  The Bad Beginning

quotes.text: Supreme excellence consists of breaking the enemy's resistance without fighting.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu,  The Art of War

quotes.text: I can't set my hopes too high,'Cause every hello ends with a goodbye.
quotes.author: Demi Lovato

quotes.text: First best is falling in love. Second best is being in love. Least best is falling out of love. But any of it is better than never having been in love.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Breathe. Let go. And remind yourself that this very moment is the only one you know you have for sure.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: He had just about enough intelligence to open his mouth when he wanted to eat, but certainly no more.
quotes.author: P.G. Wodehouse

quotes.text: A fit, healthy body—that is the best fashion statement
quotes.author: Jess C. Scott

quotes.text: I would rather be ashes than dust!I would rather that my spark should burn out in a brilliant blaze than it should be stifled by dry-rot.I would rather be a superb meteor, every atom of me in magnificent glow, than a sleepy and permanent planet.The function of man is to live, not to exist.I shall not waste my days trying to prolong them.I shall use my time.
quotes.author: Jack London

quotes.text: Maybe mistakes are what make our fate... without them what would shape our lives? Maybe if we had never veered off course we wouldn't fall in love, have babies, or be who we are. After all, things change, so do cities, people come into your life and they go. But it's comforting to know that the ones you love are always in your heart... and if you're very lucky, a plane ride away
quotes.author: Candace Bushnell,  Sex and the City

quotes.text: If only we'd stop trying to be happy, we could have a pretty good time.
quotes.author: Edith Wharton

quotes.text: What does it mean to be the best? It means you have to be better than the number two guy. But what gratification is there in that? He's a loser—that’s why he's number two.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quotes.text: For I have known them all already, known them all—Have known the evenings, mornings, afternoons,I have measured out my life with coffee spoons.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot,  The Love Song of J. Alfred Prufrock and Others

quotes.text: Quit questioning God and start trusting Him!
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: You give but little when you give of your possessions.It is when you give of yourself that you truly give.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran,  The Prophet

quotes.text: Every one suspects himself of at least one of the cardinal virtues, and this is mine: I am one of the few honest people that I have ever known.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald,  The Great Gatsby

quotes.text: For marriage to be a success, every woman and every man should have her and his own bathroom. The end.
quotes.author: Catherine Zeta-Jones

quotes.text: Man, I'm 31 years old and a husband with four kids; I hope I'm no thug. I hear all those negative things and don't hear anything positive. I think that's all those people feel... that way that's all they hear about when you hear Allen Iverson did something negative or something.
quotes.author: Allen Iverson

quotes.text: I noticed that no matter where I went in the country, there was this group of questions that got asked. I would track them and keep them in categories. Like body image, school, family, friendship, you name it, the emotional life of a teenage girl.

quotes.text: The crest and crowning of all good, Life's final star, is brotherhood.
quotes.author: Edwin Markham

quotes.text: I am in you and you in me, mutual in divine love.

quotes.text: Incongruity, they say, is one of the main ingredients of humor. Maybe it's because everybody can feel superior to me. I honestly don't know.
quotes.author: Emmett Kelly

quotes.text: I'm happy to be a writer - of prose, poetry, every kind of writing. Every person in the world who isn't a recluse, hermit or mute uses words. I know of no other art form that we always use.

quotes.text: Love meant jumping off a cliff and trusting that a certain person would be there to catch you at the bottom.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult,  Second Glance

quotes.text: In the end you can't always choose what to keep. You can only choose how you let it go.
quotes.author: Ally Condie,  Crossed

quotes.text: The dog is a gentleman; I hope to go to his heaven not man's.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.text: belief is the death of intelligence.
quotes.author: Robert Anton Wilson,  Cosmic Trigger: Die letzten Geheimnisse der Illuminaten oder An den Grenzen des erweiterten Bewusstseins

quotes.text: Start a huge, foolish project, like Noah…it makes absolutely no difference what people think of you.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: You do not need to know precisely what is happening, or exactly where it is all going. What you need is to recognize the possibilities and challenges offered by the present moment, and to embrace them with courage, faith and hope.

quotes.text: You don’t take away my choices. You are my choice.
quotes.author: Colleen Houck

quotes.text: The only love that I really believe in is a mother’s love for her children.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.text: I'll think of it tomorrow, at Tara. I can stand it then. Tomorrow, I'll think of some way to get him back. After all, tomorrow is another day.
