quotes.text: A woman, especially if she have the misfortune of knowing anything, should conceal it as well as she can.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.text: His breath hitched, and he regarded me hungrily. “You’re playing with fire, you know that?” “That’s weird, considering you’re an ice prin—” I didn’t get any further, as Ash leaned in and kissed me.
quotes.author: Julie Kagawa,  Winter's Passage

quotes.text: CALVIN:This whole Santa Claus thing just doesn't make sense. Why all the secrecy? Why all the mystery?If the guy exists why doesn't he ever show himself and prove it?And if he doesn't exist what's the meaning of all this?HOBBES:I dunno. Isn't this a religious holiday? CALVIN:Yeah, but actually, I've got the same questions about God.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.text: Six hundred and forty fish later, the only thing I know is everything you love will die. The first time you meet someone special, you can count on them one day being dead and in the ground.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Survivor

quotes.text: Rich people have small TVs and big libraries, and poor people have small libraries and big TVs.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: I've said for a long time, clearly the - a, a critical key to success in the region is going to be Pakistan and our relationship with Pakistan, which was one that was broken in the late '80s and which we've worked hard to restore.
quotes.author: Michael Mullen

quotes.text: The hope of a new politics does not lie in formulating a left-wing reply to the right-it lies in rejecting conventional political categories.
quotes.author: Christopher Lasch

quotes.text: To some it may be a thrill to be known, to me it's a thrill to start a friendship even up.
quotes.author: Christopher Knight

quotes.text: I have lived pain, and my life can tell: I only deepen the wound of the world when I neglect to give thanks the heavy perfume of wild roses in early July and the song of crickets on summer humid nights and the rivers that run and the stars that rise and the rain that falls and all the good things that a good God gives.
quotes.author: Ann Voskamp

quotes.text: Christmas, my child, is love in action. Every time we love, every time we give, it's Christmas.
quotes.author: Dale Evans

quotes.text: When I look at a lot of older stuff that I've written, I think one sign of amateur humor writing is when you see people trying too hard.
quotes.author: David Sedaris

quotes.text: That's something I learned in art school. I studied graphic design in Germany, and my professor emphasized the responsibility that designers and illustrators have towards the people they create things for.
quotes.author: Eric Carle

quotes.text: The Simple PathSilence is PrayerPrayer is FaithFaith is LoveLove is ServiceThe Fruit of Service is Peace
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: So much of the language of love was like that: you devoured someone with your eyes, you drank in the sight of him, you swallowed him whole. Love was substance, broken down and beating through your bloodstream.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult,  Nineteen Minutes

quotes.text: Heaven can be found in the most unlikely corners.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom,  The Five People You Meet in Heaven - Meniti Bianglala

quotes.text: I’m bored’ is a useless thing to say. I mean, you live in a great, big, vast world that you’ve seen none percent of. Even the inside of your own mind is endless; it goes on forever, inwardly, do you understand? The fact that you’re alive is amazing, so you don’t get to say ‘I’m bored.
quotes.author: Louis C.K.

quotes.text: I challenge anyone to understand Islam, its spirit, and not to love it. It is a beautiful religion of brotherhood and devotion.
quotes.author: Yann Martel,  Life of Pi

quotes.text: Read not to contradict and confute; nor to believe and take for granted; nor to find talk and discourse; but to weigh and consider. Some books are to be tasted, others to be swallowed, and some few to be chewed and digested: that is, some books are to be read only in parts, others to be read, but not curiously, and some few to be read wholly, and with diligence and attention.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon,  The Essays

quotes.text: It doesn't have to be on Valentine's Day. It doesn't have to be by the time you turn eighteen or thirty-three or fifty-nine. It doesn't have to conform to whatever is usual. It doesn't have to be kismet at once, or rhapsody by the third date.It just has to be. In time. In place. In spirit.It just has to be.
quotes.author: David Levithan

quotes.text: Things that matter are not easy. Feelings of happiness are easy. Happiness is not. Flirting is easy. Love is not. Saying you’re friends is easy. Being friends is not.
quotes.author: David Levithan,  Naomi and Ely's No Kiss List

quotes.text: I celebrated Thanksgiving in an old-fashioned way. I invited everyone in my neighborhood to my house, we had an enormous feast, and then I killed them and took their land.
quotes.author: Jon Stewart

quotes.text: Don't join the book burners. Don't think you're going to conceal faults by concealing evidence that they ever existed. Don't be afraid to go in your library and read every book...
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.text: And you can't love, not fully, unless you are loved in return.
quotes.author: Lauren Oliver,  Requiem

quotes.text: I look up to say something but he puts his finger to my lips and whispers, “Don’t talk. You’ll just spoil my fantasy of rescuing an innocent damsel in distress as soon as you open your mouth.
quotes.author: Susan Ee,  World After

quotes.text: I didn't know that idiocy caused people to just start spontaneously bleeding from the nose.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth,  Allegiant

quotes.text: A good night sleep, or a ten minute bawl, or a pint of chocolate ice cream, or all three together, is good medicine.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury,  Dandelion Wine

quotes.text: Boys. I'd turn gay if they weren't so sexy.
quotes.author: Rachel Caine,  The Dead Girls' Dance

quotes.text: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door
quotes.author: Milton Berle

quotes.text: Never allow a person to tell you no who doesn't have the power to say yes.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: My happiness is not the means to any end. It is the end. It is its own goal. It is its own purpose.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand,  Anthem

quotes.text: I don't want to be a tree; I want to be its meaning.
quotes.author: Orhan Pamuk,  My Name is Red

quotes.text: All who joy would winMust share it -- Happiness was born a twin.
quotes.author: George Gordon Byron,  Don Juan

quotes.text: Seeking what is true is not seeking what is desirable.
quotes.author: Albert Camus,  The Myth of Sisyphus and Other Essays

quotes.text: A wise man gets more use from his enemies than a fool from his friends.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracián,  The Art of Worldly Wisdom

quotes.text: The soul becomes dyed with the colour of its thoughts.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius,  Meditations

quotes.text: Game shows are designed to make us feel better about the random, useless facts that are all we have left of our education.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Invisible Monsters

quotes.text: I never could have achieved the success that I have without setting physical activity and health goals.
quotes.author: Bonnie Blair

quotes.text: I don't want to tell your story because you're a insensitive, self-centered moron. I've told a lot of stories about young people, and I always feel there's hope.
quotes.author: Joel Schumacher

quotes.text: I've learned that friendship does not equate business, business does not equate friendship.
quotes.author: Jill Scott

quotes.text: Going by my past journey, I am not certain where life will take me, what turns and twists will happen; nobody knows where they will end up. As life changes direction, I'll flow with it.
quotes.author: Katrina Kaif

quotes.text: I love the diversity of America. I love the plain, normal sense of humor Americans have. It is not wicked, like in some countries. And I also love how new America is.
quotes.author: Antonio Banderas

quotes.text: Art doesn't interest me. Only artists interest me.
quotes.author: Marcel Duchamp

quotes.text: Colpo di fulmine. The thunderbolt, as Italians call it. When love strikes someone like lightning, so powerful and intense it can’t be denied. It’s beautiful and messy,cracking a chest open and spilling their soul out for the world to see. It turns a person inside out, and there’s no going back from it. Once the thunderbolt hits, your life isirrevocably changed.
quotes.author: J.M. Darhower,  Sempre

quotes.text: When you love you wish to do things for. You wish to sacrifice for. You wish to serve.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway,  A Farewell to Arms

quotes.text: Such short little lives our pets have to spend with us, and they spend most of it waiting for us to come home each day. It is amazing how much love and laughter they bring into our lives and even how much closer we become with each other because of them.
quotes.author: John Grogan,  Marley and Me: Life and Love With the World's Worst Dog

quotes.text: God's Final Message to His Creation:'We apologize for the inconvenience.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams,  So Long, and Thanks for All the Fish

quotes.text: On the whole human beings want to be good, but not too good, and not quite all the time.
quotes.author: George Orwell,  All Art is Propaganda: Critical Essays

quotes.text: We may ignore, but we can nowhere evade the presence of God. The world is crowded with Him. He walks everywhere incognito.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: Stay with me.Always.
quotes.author: Suzanne Collins,  Mockingjay

quotes.text: I know because I read...Your mind is not a cage. It's a garden. And it requires cultivating.
quotes.author: Libba Bray

quotes.text: You can only be in a bad mood for so long before you have to face up to the fact that it isn't a bad mood at all; it's just your sucky personality.
quotes.author: Megan McCafferty,  Sloppy Firsts

quotes.text: What about a compromise? I’ll kill them first, and if it turns out they were friendly, I’ll apologize.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan,  The Lost Hero

quotes.text: Happiness. It was the place where passion, with all its dazzle and drumbeat, met something softer: homecoming and safety and pure sunbeam comfort. It was all those things, intertwined with the heat and the thrill, and it was as bright within her as a swallowed star.
quotes.author: Laini Taylor,  Daughter of Smoke & Bone

quotes.text: Failed relationships can be described as so much wasted make-up.
quotes.author: Marian Keyes,  Watermelon

quotes.text: If you aren't cute, you may as well be clever.
quotes.author: David Sedaris,  Me Talk Pretty One Day

quotes.text: It is the possibility that keeps me going, and though you may call me a dreamer or a fool or any other thing, I believe that anything is possible.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.text: But maybe you never really had someone, she thought now. Maybe, no matter how much you loved them, they could slip through your fingers like water, and there was nothing you could do about it.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Fallen Angels

quotes.text: Be believing, be happy, don't get discouraged. Things will work out.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.text: Deliver me from writers who say the way they live doesn't matter. I'm not sure a bad person can write a good book. If art doesn't make us better, then what on earth is it for.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.text: Ah, how good it is to be among people who are reading.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke,  The Notebooks of Malte Laurids Brigge

quotes.text: V-Day…if you need this one day in a year to show everyone else you truly care for “your loved one” I think it’s quite stupid. I hate this commercialism. It’s all artificial, and has nothing to do with real love.
quotes.author: Jess C. Scott,  EyeLeash: A Blog Novel

quotes.text: The truth is that the world is full of dragons, and none of us are as powerful or cool as we’d like to be. And that sucks. But when you’re confronted with that fact, you can either crawl into a hole and quit, or you can get out there, take off your shoes, and Bilbo it up.
quotes.author: Patrick Rothfuss

quotes.text: Maybe there isn’t such a thing as fate. Maybe it’s just the opportunities we’re given, and what we do with them. I’m beginning to think that maybe great, epic romances don’t just happen. We have to make them ourselves.
quotes.author: Marissa Meyer,  Cress

quotes.text: Do not lose hope — what you seek will be found. Trust ghosts. Trust those that you have helped to help you in their turn. Trust dreams. Trust your heart, and trust your story. (from 'Instructions')
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman,  Fragile Things: Short Fictions and Wonders

quotes.text: When you look for a man- what you want to look for is a man with the heart of a poor boy and the mind of a conqueror.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.text: How hurtful it can be to deny one's true self and live a life of lies just to appease others.
quotes.author: June Ahern

quotes.text: When you love someone, you don't have a choice. Love takes your choices away.- Clary Fray
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Ashes

quotes.text: The worst memories stick with us, while the nice ones always seem to slip through our fingers.
quotes.author: Rachel Vincent,  My Soul to Save

quotes.text: Bermimpilah, karena Tuhan akan memeluk mimpi-mimpi itu.
quotes.author: Andrea Hirata,  Sang Pemimpi

quotes.text: Whenever you're successful you owe that success to the people in the community, because they are the ones buying your product.
quotes.author: Carl Karcher

quotes.text: I hope that through my example, such as my role on 'The West Wing,' I can help change attitudes on deafness and prove we can really do everything... except hear.
quotes.author: Marlee Matlin

quotes.text: I really think that technology has the greatest potential to accelerate happiness of most things in the world. The companies that will ultimately do well are the companies that chase happiness. If you find a way to help people find love, or health or friendship, the dollar will chase that.
quotes.author: Ashton Kutcher

quotes.text: Freedom means you are unobstructed in living your life as you choose. Anything less is a form of slavery.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.text: Love can do much, but duty more.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.text: I don't think arrested-adolescent humor will fade. Maybe the form will change, but I guarantee its replacement will still be based in immature behavior from mature figures.
quotes.author: Adam McKay

quotes.text: I think the art fair is very much a form of urbanism. I think something really happens to the cities when such a fair happens. The city becomes an exhibition; it's amazing.
quotes.author: Hans-Ulrich Obrist

quotes.text: The three great essentials to achieve anything worthwhile are, first, hard work; second, stick-to-itiveness; third, common sense.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.text: I've been lucky. Opportunities don't often come along. So, when they do, you have to grab them.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: I want my time to be taken up by chores, errands, appointments, and arguments. In other words, I want to get married.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz,  I Want

quotes.text: The truth is not for all men but only for those who seek it.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.text: I was waiting for the longest time, she said. I thought you forgot.It is hard to forget, I said, when there is such an empty space when you are gone.
quotes.author: Brian Andreas,  Story People: Selected Stories & Drawings of Brian Andreas

quotes.text: You can’t turn love on and off like a light switch, no matter how hard you try. All you can do is wall it off, one brick at a time, until you’ve created an impenetrable fortress around your emotions. And once that fortress is built, you camouflage it so well that even you can’t see it anymore.
quotes.author: Katherine Allred,  The Sweet Gum Tree

quotes.text: Goodbyes, they often come in waves.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz,  $3.33

quotes.text: A kind gesture can reach a wound that only compassion can heal.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quotes.text: I'll find you. There is no place in this world you can hide from me. I'm watching.Love, Dimitri
quotes.author: Richelle Mead,  Spirit Bound

quotes.text: The scientist is not a person who gives the right answers, he's one who asks the right questions.
quotes.author: Claude Lévi-Strauss

quotes.text: Being rich is not about how much money you have or how many homes you own; it's the freedom to buy any book you want without looking at the price and wondering if you can afford it.
quotes.author: John Waters,  Role Models

quotes.text: To answer your question, you want me because I'm made of awesome.
quotes.author: Gena Showalter,  Heart of Darkness

quotes.text: It seems to me that if you or I must choose between two courses of thought or action, we should remember our dying and try so to live that our death brings no pleasure to the world.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck,  East of Eden

quotes.text: She's my kitten, and no one else's.
quotes.author: Jeaniene Frost,  One Foot in the Grave

quotes.text: I want to scream sometimes, because I hate when people refer to a dead person as the “late” so and so. I’m sorry to break that bad news, but that person isn’t just late—they’re not even coming!
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz,  I Want Two apply for a job at our country's largest funeral home, and then wear a suit and noose to the job interview.

quotes.text: There is nothing on earth more beautiful to me than your smile...no sound sweeter than your laughter...no pleasure greater than holding you in my arms. I realized today that I could never live without you, stubborn little hellion that you are. In this life and the next, you’re my only hope of happiness. Tell me, Lillian, dearest love...how can you have reached so far inside my heart?
quotes.author: Lisa Kleypas,  It Happened One Autumn

quotes.text: The tears of the world are a constant quantity. For each one who begins to weep somewhere else another stops. The same is true of the laugh.
quotes.author: Samuel Beckett,  Waiting for Godot

quotes.text: FEAR stands for fuck everything and run.
quotes.author: Stephen King,  Doctor Sleep

quotes.text: Don't limit yourself. Many people limit themselves to what they think they can do. You can go as far as your mind lets you. What you believe, remember, you can achieve.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.text: It is true that the aristocracies seem to have abused their monopoly of legal knowledge; and at all events their exclusive possession of the law was a formidable impediment to the success of those popular movements which began to be universal in the western world.
quotes.author: Henry James Sumner Maine

quotes.text: I did this book 'Harvest for Hope,' and I learned so much about food. And one thing I learned is that we have the guts not of a carnivore, but of an herbivore. Herbivore guts are very long because they have to get the last bit of nutrition out of leaves and things.
quotes.author: Jane Goodall

quotes.text: All who consult on doubtful matters, should be void of hatred, friendship, anger, and pity.
quotes.author: Sallust

quotes.text: Only in the agony of parting do we look into the depths of love.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.text: Putting a little time aside for clean fun and good humor is very necessary to relieve the tensions of our time.
quotes.author: Hattie McDaniel

quotes.text: And that's what art is, a form in which people can reflect on who we are as human beings and come to some understanding of this journey we are on.
quotes.author: Wendell Pierce

quotes.text: MagicSandra’s seen a leprechaun,Eddie touched a troll,Laurie danced with witches once,Charlie found some goblins gold.Donald heard a mermaid sing,Susy spied an elf,But all the magic I have knownI've had to make myself.
quotes.author: Shel Silverstein,  Where the Sidewalk Ends: The Poems and Drawings of Shel Silverstein

quotes.text: Take it moment by moment, and you will find that we are all, as I’ve said before, bugs in amber.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.text: This is my simple religion. There is no need for temples; no need for complicated philosophy. Our own brain, our own heart is our temple; the philosophy is kindness.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV,  The Dalai Lama: A Policy of Kindness: An Anthology of Writings By and About the Dalai Lama

quotes.text: I don't like it when I outweigh my men.
quotes.author: Patricia Briggs,  Moon Called

quotes.text: That's when I finally got it. I finally understood. It wasn't the thought that counted. It was the actual execution that mattered, the showing up for somebody. The intent behind it wasn't enough. Not for me. Not anymore. It wasn't enough to know that deep down, he loved me. You had to actually say it to somebody, show them you cared. And he just didn't. Not enough.
quotes.author: Jenny Han,  It's Not Summer Without You

quotes.text: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
quotes.author: Harriet Tubman

quotes.text: Knowing can be a curse on a person's life. I'd traded in a pack of lies for a pack of truth, and I didn't know which one was heavier. Which one took the most strength to carry around? It was a ridiculous question, though, because once you know the truth, you can't ever go back and pick up your suitcase of lies. Heavier or not, the truth is yours now.
quotes.author: Sue Monk Kidd,  The Secret Life of Bees:

quotes.text: If you cannot read all your books...fondle them---peer into them, let them fall open where they will, read from the first sentence that arrests the eye, set them back on the shelves with your own hands, arrange them on your own plan so that you at least know where they are. Let them be your friends; let them, at any rate, be your acquaintances.
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.text: Love is always open arms. If you close your arms about love you will find that you are left holding only yourself.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.text: Desiring another person is perhaps the most risky endeavor of all. As soon as you want somebody—really want him—it is as though you have taken a surgical needle and sutured your happiness to the skin of that person, so that any separation will now cause a lacerating injury.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert,  Committed: A Skeptic Makes Peace with Marriage

quotes.text: You show me a capitalist, and I'll show you a bloodsucker
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.text: The Reality of The Other Person Lies Not In What He Reveals To You, But What He Cannot Reveal To You.Therefore, If You Would Understand Him, Listen Not To What He Says, But Rather To What He Does Not Say.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.text: Everybody going to be dead one day, just give them time.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman,  Anansi Boys

quotes.text: When you get to the end of all the light you know and it's time to step into the darkness of the unknown, faith is knowing that one of two things shall happen: either you will be given something solid to stand on, or you will be taught how to fly.
quotes.author: Edward Teller

quotes.text: And then the line was quite but not dead. I almost felt like he was there in my room with me, but in a way it was better, like I was not in my room and he was not in his, but instead we were together in some invisible and tenuous third space that could only be visited on the phone.
quotes.author: John Green,  The Fault in Our Stars

quotes.text: If you can't do anything about it, laugh like hell.
quotes.author: David Cook

quotes.text: We are all connected; To each other, biologically. To the earth, chemically. To the rest of the universe atomically.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.text: The great object of life is sensation- to feel that we exist, even though in pain.
quotes.author: George Gordon Byron

quotes.text: I want everything with you, America. I want the holidays and the birthdays, the busy season and lazy weekends. I want peanut butter fingertips on my desk. I want inside jokes and fights and everything. I want a life with you.
quotes.author: Kiera Cass,  The One

quotes.text: It takes three to make love, not two: you, your spouse, and God. Without God people only succeed in bringing out the worst in one another. Lovers who have nothing else to do but love each other soon find there is nothing else. Without a central loyalty life is unfinished.
quotes.author: Fulton J. Sheen,  Seven Words of Jesus and Mary: Lessons from Cana and Calvary

quotes.text: But magic is neither good nor evil. It is a tool, like a knife. Is a knife evil? Only if the wielder is evil.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan,  The House of Hades

quotes.text: In the end, it wasn't death that surprised her but the stubbornness of life.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Eugenides,  The Virgin Suicides

quotes.text: Love Jo all your days, if you choose, but don't let it spoil you, for it's wicked to throw away so many good gifts because you can't have the one you want.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott,  Little Women

quotes.text: Love wins, love always wins.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom,  Tuesdays with Morrie

quotes.text: There are so many things that demand to be said. Where did you go? Do you ever think about me? You've ruined me. Are you okay? But of course, I can't say any of that.
quotes.author: Gayle Forman,  Where She Went

quotes.text: I love her, and that's the beginning and end of everything.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald,  Dear Scott, Dearest Zelda: The Love Letters of F. Scott and Zelda Fitzgerald

quotes.text: Some people talk in their sleep. Lecturers talk while other people sleep
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.text: There is no happiness like that of being loved by your fellow creatures, and feeling that your presence is an addition to their comfort.
quotes.author: Charlotte Brontë,  Jane Eyre

quotes.text: Friendship with oneself is all important, because without it one cannot be friends with anyone else in the world.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: In time, in time they tell me, I'll not feel so bad. I don't want time to heal me. There's a reason I'm like this.I want time to set me ugly and knotted with loss of you, marking me. I won't smooth you away.I can't say goodbye.
quotes.author: China Miéville,  The Scar

quotes.text: In many cases when a reader puts a story aside because it 'got boring,' the boredom arose because the writer grew enchanted with his powers of description and lost sight of his priority, which is to keep the ball rolling.
quotes.author: Stephen King,  On Writing: A Memoir of the Craft

quotes.text: Love doesn't mean anything if you're not willing to make a commitment, and you have to think not only about what you want, but about what he wants. Not just now, but in the future.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks,  Safe Haven

quotes.text: Oh, love isn't there to make us happy. I believe it exists to show us how much we can endure.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse,  Wer lieben kann, ist glücklich. Über die Liebe

quotes.text: Definition of rock journalism: People who can't write, doing interviews with people who can't think, in order to prepare articles for people who can't read.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa,  The Real Frank Zappa Book

quotes.text: Let us remember: One book, one pen, one child, and one teacher can change the world.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.text: The secret to success is good leadership, and good leadership is all about making the lives of your team members or workers better.
quotes.author: Tony Dungy

quotes.text: Occupy Wall Street is meant more as a way of life that spreads through contagion, creates as many questions as it answers, aims to force a reconsideration of the way the nation does business and offers hope to those of us who previously felt alone in our belief that the current economic system is broken.
quotes.author: Douglas Rushkoff

quotes.text: Like any friendship or marriage, familiarity breeds more contempt, and love, and everything.
quotes.author: Martin Freeman

quotes.text: God had brought me to my knees and made me acknowledge my own nothingness, and out of that knowledge I had been reborn. I was no longer the centre of my life and therefore I could see God in everything.
quotes.author: Bede Griffiths

quotes.text: One does not kill oneself for love of a woman, but because love - any love - reveals us in our nakedness, our misery, our vulnerability, our nothingness.
quotes.author: Cesare Pavese

quotes.text: My favorite kind of humor is basically, if it was happening to you, it wouldn't be funny, but to observe it, it's hilarious.
quotes.author: Bill Burr

quotes.text: The hours I spend with you I look upon as sort of a perfumed garden, a dim twilight, and a fountain singing to it. You and you alone make me feel that I am alive. Other men it is said have seen angels, but I have seen thee and thou art enough.
quotes.author: George Edward Moore

quotes.text: i carry your heart with me(i carry it in my heart)
quotes.author: E.E. Cummings,  Selected Poems

quotes.text: Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden when the flowers are dead. The consciousness of loving and being loved brings a warmth and a richness to life that nothing else can bring.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: You had to know a person well to make them laugh like that.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare,  Clockwork Prince

quotes.text: An appeaser is one who feeds a crocodile, hoping it will eat him last.
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.text: Sometimes writing is running downhill, your fingers jerking behind you on the keyboard the way your legs do when they can’t quite keep up with gravity.
quotes.author: Rainbow Rowell,  Fangirl

quotes.text: Think, Believe, Dream, and Dare.
quotes.author: Walt Disney Company

quotes.text: We are saved by faith alone, but the faith that saves is never alone.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.text: Be happy, but never satisfied.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: People say that what we’re all seeking is a meaning for life. I don’t think that’s what we’re really seeking. I think that what we’re seeking is an experience of being alive, so that our life experiences on the purely physical plane will have resonances with our own innermost being and reality, so that we actually feel the rapture of being alive.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell,  The Power of Myth

quotes.text: I think hiccup cures were really invented for the amusement of the patient's friends.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson,  The Complete Calvin and Hobbes

quotes.text: Start by doing what is necessary, then what is possible, and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
quotes.author: Francis of Assisi

quotes.text: wisdom comes to us when it can no longer do any good.
quotes.author: Gabriel Garcí­a Márquez,  Love in the Time of Cholera

quotes.text: A man who wants to die feels angry and full of life and desperate and bored and exhausted, all at the same time; he wants to fight everyone, and he wants to curl up in a ball and hide in a cupboard somewhere. He wants to say sorry to everyone, and he wants everyone to know just how badly they've all let him down.
quotes.author: Nick Hornby,  A Long Way Down

quotes.text: Life, unfortunately, doesn't seem to care what we want.
quotes.author: Richelle Mead,  Last Sacrifice

quotes.text: He looked so lost, so soulful, so lonely. I wanted him to kiss me now. I wanted to let him know I was his for all eternity.
quotes.author: Ellen Schreiber,  Vampire Kisses

quotes.text: Words can never fully say what we want them to say, for they fumble, stammer, and break the best porcelain. The best one can hope for is to find along the way someone to share the path, content to walk in silence, for the heart communes best when it does not try to speak.
quotes.author: Margaret Weis,  Dragons of a Lost Star

quotes.text: Life's great happiness is to be convinced we are loved.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo,  Les Misérables

quotes.text: If I shot an arrow and thought about an ass, would it surprise you if it hit Erik?
quotes.author: P.C. Cast,  Tempted

quotes.text: A woman needs a man like a fish needs a bicycle.
quotes.author: Irina Dunn

quotes.text: I wish my stove came with a Save As button like Word has. That way I could experiment with my cooking and not fear ruining my dinner.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz,  Who Moved My Choose?: An Amazing Way to Deal With Change by Deciding to Let Indecision Into Your Life

quotes.text: I'm the girl nobody knows until she commits suicide. Then suddenly everyone had a class with her.
quotes.author: Tom Leveen,  Party

quotes.text: You cannot control what happens to you, but you can control your attitude toward what happens to you, and in that, you will be mastering change rather than allowing it to master you.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: You cannot be with someone just because you don’t want to hurt him. You have your own happiness to think about.
quotes.author: Melissa de la Cruz,  The Van Alen Legacy

quotes.text: If we can just let go and trust that things will work out they way they're supposed to, without trying to control the outcome, then we can begin to enjoy the moment more fully. The joy of the freedom it brings becomes more pleasurable than the experience itself.
quotes.author: Goldie Hawn

quotes.text: There are things known and there are things unknownand in between are the doors.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison,  Letters from Joe

quotes.text: Autumn is the hardest season. The leaves are all falling, and they're falling likethey're falling in love with the ground.
quotes.author: Andrea Gibson

quotes.text: Whoa, who peed in your Cheerios?
quotes.author: Becca Fitzpatrick,  Crescendo

quotes.text: What lies behind you and what lies in front of you, pales in comparison to what lies inside of you.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: I have no time for those who say there is no way Scotland could go it alone. I know first-hand the contribution Scotland and Scots make to Britain's success - so for me there's no question about whether Scotland could be an independent nation.
quotes.author: David Cameron

quotes.text: If I can have the opportunity to go into an editing room, it's like the golden ticket for me. All I want is to learn about everything else in the filmmaking process. I just directed a music video which just came out and that'd sort of be the area of the field that I'm going to move into, I hope.
quotes.author: Nikki Reed

quotes.text: One measure of friendship consists not in the number of things friends can discuss, but in the number of things they need no longer mention.
quotes.author: Clifton Fadiman

quotes.text: It's a funny thing about life; if you refuse to accept anything but the best, you very often get it.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.text: I live and love in God's peculiar light.
quotes.author: Michelangelo

quotes.text: I've got a great sense of humor, and if I'm able to say or do something in a movie that people feel like they want to repeat, that's hugely flattering.
quotes.author: Matthew McConaughey

quotes.text: I wash my hands of those who imagine chattering to be knowledge, silence to be ignorance, and affection to be art.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.text: Can officially confirm that the way to a man's heart these days is not through beauty, food, sex, or alluringness of character, but merely the ability to seem not very interested in him.
quotes.author: Helen Fielding,  Bridget Jones's Diary

quotes.text: People know what they do; frequently they know why they do what they do; but what they don't know is what what they do does.
quotes.author: Michel Foucault,  Madness and Civilization: A History of Insanity in the Age of Reason

quotes.text: Dreams are necessary to life.
quotes.author: Anaïs Nin

quotes.text: Love is scary: it changes; it can go away. That's the part of the risk. I don't want to be scared anymore.
quotes.author: Jenny Han,  To All the Boys I've Loved Before

quotes.text: Did you think you could stop me? I'll burn the world down to save her.
quotes.author: Jennifer L. Armentrout,  Origin

quotes.text: Why is there ever this perverse cruelty in humankind, that makes us hurt most those we love best?
quotes.author: Jacqueline Carey,  Kushiel's Chosen

quotes.text: I postpone death by living, by suffering, by error, by risking, by giving, by losing.
quotes.author: Anaïs Nin

quotes.text: I find my life is a lot easier the lower I keep my expectations.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.text: Women were different, no doubt about it. Men broke so much more quickly. Grief didn't break women. Instead it wore them down, it hollowed them out very slowly.
quotes.author: Cornelia Funke,  Inkdeath

quotes.text: Life is a tapestry woven by the decisions we make.
quotes.author: Sherrilyn Kenyon,  Kiss of the Night

quotes.text: Most everything you think you know about me is nothing more than memories.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami,  A Wild Sheep Chase

quotes.text: Muhammad has always been standing higher than the Christianity. He does not consider god as a human being and never makes himself equal to God. Muslims worship nothing except God and Muhammad is his Messenger. There is no any mystery and secret in it.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.text: Just because I'm not forever by your side doesn't mean that's not precisely where I want to be.
quotes.author: Stephanie Laurens,  A Rogue's Proposal

quotes.text: We must have a pie. Stress cannot exist in the presence of a pie.
quotes.author: David Mamet,  Boston Marriage

quotes.text: The most important decision you make is to be in a good mood.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: Your problem is how you are going to spend this one and precious life you have been issued. Whether you're going to spend it trying to look good and creating the illusion that you have power over circumstances, or whether you are going to taste it, enjoy it and find out the truth about who you are.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.text: I laugh because I must not cry, that is all, that is all.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: I lean to you, numb as a fossil. Tell me I'm here.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath,  The Collected Poems

quotes.text: I seem to have run in a great circle, and met myself again on the starting line.
quotes.author: Jeanette Winterson,  Oranges Are Not the Only Fruit

quotes.text: Personally, I don’t like inherently happy people. I don’t trust them. I think there’s something seriously wrong with anyone who isn’t at least a little let down by the world.
quotes.author: Tiffanie DeBartolo,  How to Kill a Rock Star

quotes.text: The fact is…I’m in love with you, and I have been for some time.
quotes.author: Colleen Houck,  Tiger's Curse

quotes.text: It is foolish and wrong to mourn the men who died. Rather, we should thank God that such men lived.
quotes.author: George S. Patton Jr.

quotes.text: No, this is not the beginning of a new chapter in my life; this is the beginning of a new book! That first book is already closed, ended, and tossed into the seas; this new book is newly opened, has just begun! Look, it is the first page! And it is a beautiful one!
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.text: Peace is always beautiful.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman,  Leaves of Grass

quotes.text: When success comes, people can try to trick you or take advantage of you.
quotes.author: Christina Aguilera

quotes.text: People like rumors. They're going to say things like, 'You was at the club with Lil' Kim, and you and Kanye West got into a fist fight.' You can't get upset. You've got to keep hope alive.
quotes.author: Bernie Mac

quotes.text: I lend people money, but I'd never lend something that would jeopardise a friendship if I didn't get it back.
quotes.author: Paloma Faith

quotes.text: After all, life hasn't much to offer except youth, and I suppose for older people, the love of youth in others.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.text: The love of truth lies at the root of much humor.
quotes.author: Robertson Davies

quotes.text: In reality art is always for everyone and for no one.
quotes.author: Eugenio Montale

quotes.text: All opinions are not equal. Some are a very great deal more robust, sophisticated and well supported in logic and argument than others.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams,  The Salmon of Doubt

quotes.text: Life, with its rules, its obligations, and its freedoms, is like a sonnet: You're given the form, but you have to write the sonnet yourself. - Mrs. Whatsit
quotes.author: Madeleine L'Engle,  A Wrinkle in Time

quotes.text: With you, intimacy colours my voice.even ‘hello’ sounds like ‘come here'.
quotes.author: Warsan Shire

quotes.text: Ah, pay no heed if your enemies laugh. They'll not be able to once you lop off their heads.
quotes.author: Christopher Paolini,  Eragon, Eldest & Brisingr

quotes.text: those who do not know how to see the precious things in life will never be happy.
quotes.author: Alex Flinn,  Beastly

quotes.text: To dream by night is to escape your life. To dream by day is to make it happen.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.text: Things work out the way they're meant to
quotes.author: Danielle Steel,  No Greater Love

quotes.text: If a man hasn't what's necessary to make a woman love him, it's his fault, not hers.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham,  The Painted Veil

quotes.text: God is a concept by which we measure our pain.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: The moment the door opened I knew an ass-kicking was inevitable. Whether I'd be giving it or receiving it was still a bit of a mystery.
quotes.author: Rachel Vincent,  Stray

quotes.text: I don't know how you feel, but I'm pretty sick of church people. You know what they ought to do with churches? Tax them. If holy people are so interested in politics, government, and public policy, let them pay the price of admission like everybody else. The Catholic Church alone could wipe out the national debt if all you did was tax their real estate.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.text: The pages are still blank, but there is a miraculous feeling of the words being there, written in invisible ink and clamoring to become visible
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov
